T04canprasu:11: nāgārjunāya praṇipatya tasmai tatkārikāṇāṃ vivṛtiṃ kariṣye /
T04canprasu:13: tatra 'na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām';
T04canprasu:23: tadaviparītasaṃprakāśatvena māhātmyamudbhāvya tatsvabhāvāvyatirekavartine paramagurave tathāgatāya śāstrapraṇayananimittakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kartukāma
T04canprasu:55: samutpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārtha iti samutpādaśabdaḥ prādurbhāve vartate /
T04canprasu:60: ityevaṃ taddhitāntamityaśabdaṃ vyutpādya prati prati ityānāṃ vināśināṃ samutpāda iti varṇayanti /
T04canprasu:62: “yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharma paśyati” ityevamādau viṣaye vīpsārthasya saṃbhavāt samāsasadbhāvācca syājjyāyasī vyutpattiḥ /
T04canprasu:63: iha tu “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam” ityevamādau viṣaye sākṣādaṅgīkṛtārthaviśeṣe
T04canprasu:70: taddhitānte cetyaśabde “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam” ityatra
T04canprasu:71: pratītyaśabdasyāvyayatvābhāvāt samāsāsadbhāvācca vibhaktiśrutau satyāṃ cakṣuḥ pratītya
T04canprasu:72: vijñānaṃ rūpāṇi ca iti nipātaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:78: tāṃstān pratyayān pratītya samutpādaḥ prāpya saṃbhava ityeke /
T04canprasu:79: prati prati vināśināmutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityanye“- iti paravyākhyānamanūdya dūṣaṇamabhidhatte,
T04canprasu:87: tena idānīṃ prāpya saṃbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityevaṃ vyutpāditena pratītyasamutpādaśabdena yadi niravaśeṣasaṃbhavipadārthaparāmarśo vivakṣitaḥ,
T04canprasu:88: tadā tāṃ tāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya saṃbhava pratītya samutpāda iti vīpsāsaṃbandhaḥ kriyate /
T04canprasu:90: tadā cakṣuḥ prāpya rūpāṇi ceti na vīpsāyāḥ saṃbandha iti //
T04canprasu:94: ayuktametat “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam” iti,
T04canprasu:98: kathamanenaiva tatprāpteḥ saṃbhava iti yuktyanupādānena pratijñāmātratvāt /
T04canprasu:121: asminsatīdaṃ bhavati hrasve dīrghaṃ yathā sati /
T04canprasu:126: tataśca yadeva dūṣyate tadevābhyupagamyate iti na yujyate /
T04canprasu:128: tadevaṃ hetupratyayāpekṣaṃ bhāvānāmutpādaṃ paridīpayatā bhagavatā ahetvekahetuviṣamahetusaṃbhūtatvaṃ svaparobhayakṛtatvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ niṣiddhaṃ
T04canprasu:129: tanniṣedhācca sāṃvṛtānāṃ padārthānāṃ yathāvasthitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamudbhāvitaṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:130: sa evedānīṃ sāṃvṛtaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvād āryajñānāpekṣayā nāsminnirodho vidyate yāvannāsminnirgamo vidyate ityanirodhādibhiraṣṭābhirviśe ṣaṇairviśiṣyate /
T04canprasu:131: yathā ca nirodhādayo na santi pratītyasamutpādasya tathā sakalaśāstreṇa pratipādayiṣyati //
T04canprasu:134: prapañcānāmupaśamo 'sminniti sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ prapaḥcopaśama ityucyate /
T04canprasu:136: yathābhihitaviśeṣaṇasya pratītyasamutpādasya deśanākriyayā īpsitatamatvāt karmaṇā nirdeśaḥ //
T04canprasu:142: paśyan sarvaparapravādāṃśca bālapralāpānivāvetya atīva prasādānugata ācāryo bhūyo
T04canprasu:144: atra ca nirodhasya pūrvaṃ prativedhaḥ utpādanirodhayoḥ paurvāparyāvasthāyāḥ siddhayabhāvaṃ dyotayitum /
T04canprasu:148: iti / tasmānnāyaṃ niyamo yat pūrvamutpādena bhavitavyaṃ paścānnirodheneti //
T04canprasu:149: idānīmanirodhādiviśiṣṭapratītyasamutpādapratipipādayiṣayā utpādapratiṣedhena nirodhādi pratiṣedhasaukarya manyamāna ācāryaḥ prathamamevotpādaprativedhamārabhate
T04canprasu:150: utpādo hi paraiḥ parikalpyamānaḥ svato vā parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:155: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
T04canprasu:156: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana // 3 //
T04canprasu:158: kvacanaśabda ādhāravacanaḥ kvacicchabdaparyāyaḥ kecanaśabda ādheyavacanaḥ kecicchabdaparyāyaḥ /
T04canprasu:159: tataścaivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ- naiva svata utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ,
T04canprasu:162: nanu ca- naiva svata utpannā ityavadhāryamāṇe parata utpannā ityaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti /
T04canprasu:165: yayā copapattyā svata utpādo na saṃbhavati, sā-
T04canprasu:166: tasmāddhi tasya bhavane na guṇo 'sti kaścij-
T04canprasu:167: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
T04canprasu:172: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ padārthānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamasti /
T04canprasu:177: prasaṅga vākyatvācca prakṛtārthaviparyayeṇa viparītārthasādhyataddharmavyaktau parasmādutpannābhāvājanmasāphalyāt janmaniro(bo?)
T04canprasu:185: pṛcchayate- svata iti hetutvena tadeva cotpadyate iti?
T04canprasu:186: na ca vidyamānasya punarutpattau prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ,
T04canprasu:188: na ca tvayā utpannasya punarutpāda iṣyate 'navasthā cāpyaniṣṭeti /
T04canprasu:190: kimiti codite paronābhyupaiti yato hetudṛṣṭāntopādānasāphalyaṃ syāt?
T04canprasu:194: tasmātsarvathā priyānumānatāmevātmanaḥ ācāryaḥ prakaṭayati asthāne 'pyanumānaṃ praveśayan /
T04canprasu:195: na ca mādhyamikasya sataḥ svatantramanumānaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ pakṣāntarābhyupagamābhāvāt /
T04canprasu:200: yadi kācana pratijñā syānme tata eva me bhaveddoṣaḥ /
T04canprasu:201: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ //
T04canprasu:205: tadā kutaḥ “nādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni” iti svatantrā pratijñā yasyāṃ sāṃkhyāḥ pratyavasthāpyante /
T04canprasu:206: ko 'rya pratijñārthaḥ kiṃ kāryātmakatvātsvata uta kāraṇātmakatvāditi /
T04canprasu:210: kuto 'smākaṃ vidyamānatvāditi heturyasya siddhasādhanaṃ viruddhārthatā vā syāt,
T04canprasu:211: yasya siddhasādhanasya yasyāśca viruddhārthatāyāḥ parihārārthaṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
T04canprasu:214: svata utpattipratiṣedhapratijñātārthasādhanaṃ mā bhūdubhayasiddhena vānumānena parapratijñānirākaraṇam /
T04canprasu:215: parapratijñāyāstu svata evānumānavirodhacodanayā svata eva pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntadoṣarahitaiḥ pakṣādibhirbhavitavyam /
T04canprasu:216: tataśca tadanabhidhānāt taddoṣāparihārācca sa eva doṣa iti /
T04canprasu:221: tena svaniścayavadanyeṣāṃ niścayotpādanecchayā yayā upapattyā asāvartho 'dhigataḥ saivopapattiḥ parasmai upadeṣṭavyā /
T04canprasu:226: iti nirupapattikapakṣābhyupagamāt svātmānamevāyaṃ kevalaṃ visaṃvādayan na śaknoti
T04canprasu:228: idamevāsya spaṣṭataraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ yaduta svapratijñātārthasādhanāsāmarthyamiti kimatrānumānabādhodbhāvanayā prayojanam?
T04canprasu:234: atra hi tadityanena svātmanā vidyamānasya parāmarśaḥ /
T04canprasu:237: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamiti /
T04canprasu:238: anena ca vākyena sādhyasādhanadharmānugatasya paraprasiddhasya sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasyopādānam /
T04canprasu:248: iha hi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ puro 'vasthitaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ punarutpādānapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭam,
T04canprasu:249: tathā ca mṛtpiṇḍādyavasthāyāmapi yadi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ ghaṭādikamiti manyase,
T04canprasu:250: tadāpi tasya svātmanā vidyamānasya nāstyutpāda iti /
T04canprasu:251: evaṃ svātmanā vidyamānatvena upanayābhivyaktena punarutpādapratiṣedhāvyabhicāriṇā hetunā svata eva sāṃkhyasyānumānavirodhodbhāvanamanuṣṭhitameveti
T04canprasu:253: na ca kevalaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:256: sāṃkhyā hi naiva abhivyaktarūpasya puro 'vasthitasya ghaṭasya punarabhivyaktimicchanti /
T04canprasu:259: anabhivyaktarūpasya ca śaktirūpāpannasya utpattipratiṣedhaviśiṣṭasādhyatvāt kutaḥ siddhasādhanapakṣadoṣāśaṅkā,
T04canprasu:264: athavā / ayamanyaḥ prayogamārgaḥ- puruṣavyatiriktāḥ padārthāḥ svata utpattivādinaḥ /
T04canprasu:269: yadyapi ca abhivyaktivādina utpādapratiṣedho na bādhakaḥ,
T04canprasu:270: tathāpi abhivyaktāvutpādaśabdaṃ nipātya pūrvaṃ paścācca anupalabdhyupalabdhisādharmyeṇa utpādaśabdenābhivyakterevābhidhānādayaṃ pratiṣedho na abādhakaḥ //
T04canprasu:271: kathaṃ punarayaṃ yathoktārthābhidhānaṃ vinā vyastavicāro labhyata iti cet, taducyate /
T04canprasu:274: tāni ca vyākhyāyamānāni yathoktamarthātmānaṃ prasūyanta iti nātra kiṃcidanupāttaṃ saṃbhāvyate //
T04canprasu:278: parasya ca yāvadbahavo doṣāḥ prasaṅgaviparītāpattyā āpadyante,
T04canprasu:280: kuto nu khalu aviparītācāryanāgārjunamatānusāriṇaḥ ācāryabuddhapālitasya sāvakāśavacanābhidhāyitvam,
T04canprasu:284: na hi śabdāḥ dāṇḍapāśikā iva vaktāramasvatantrayanti,
T04canprasu:287: tathā ca ācāryo bhūyasā prasaṅgāpattimukhenaiva parapakṣaṃ nirākaroti sma / tadyathā-
T04canprasu:293: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
T04canprasu:294: ityādinā / atha arthavākyatvādācāryavākyānāṃ mahārthatve sati anekaprayoniṣpattihetutvaṃ parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:303: tatra yattāvadevamuktam- atra prayogavākyaṃ bhavati- na paramārthataḥ ādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni,
T04canprasu:312: “sa cāyaṃ bījahetuko 'ṅkura utpadyamāno na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto nāpyahetusamutpanno niśvarakālāṇuprakṛtisvabhāvasaṃbhūtaḥ” iti
T04canprasu:314: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
T04canprasu:315: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanucchedaaśāśvatadharmatā //
T04canprasu:317: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
T04canprasu:323: satyadvayāviparītadarśanaparibhraṣṭā eva hi tīrthikā yāvadubhayathāpi niṣidhyante tāvad guṇa eva saṃbhāvyata iti /
T04canprasu:327: loko hi svataḥ parata ityevamādikaṃ vicāramanavatārya kāraṇātkāryamutpadyate ityetāvanmātraṃ pratipannaḥ /
T04canprasu:330: api ca / yadi saṃvṛtyā utpattipratiṣedhanirācikīrṣuṇā viśeṣaṇametadupādīyate,
T04canprasu:336: sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthata utpattipratiṣedhād utpattipratiṣedhaviśeṣaṇe paramārthagrahaṇamiti cet,
T04canprasu:337: evaṃ tarhi evameva vaktavyaṃ syāt- sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthato nāstyutpattiriti /
T04canprasu:340: prajñaptisatāmanabhyupagamāt parato 'siddhādhāraḥ pakṣadoṣaḥ syāditi na yuktametat //
T04canprasu:341: atha syāt- yathā anityaḥ śabda iti dharmadharmisāmānyameva gṛhyate na viśeṣaḥ,
T04canprasu:343: tathā hi- yadi cāturmahābhautikaḥ śabdo gṛhyate,
T04canprasu:347: tathā vaiśeṣikasya śabdānityatāṃ pratijānānasya yadi kāryaḥ śabdo gṛhyate,
T04canprasu:364: yadā ca aviparyāsādabhūtaṃ nādhyāropitaṃ vitaimirikeṇeva keśādi,
T04canprasu:371: ato viduṣāmaviparītāvasthāyāṃ viparītasyāsaṃbhavātkutaḥ sāṃvṛtaṃ cakṣuḥ yasya dharmitvaṃ syāt?
T04canprasu:376: tatra hi śabdasāmānyamanityatāsāmānyaṃ ca avivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ dvayorapi saṃvidyate /
T04canprasu:377: na tvevaṃ cakṣuḥ sāmānyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāvādibhyāṃ saṃvṛtyā aṅgīkṛtaṃ nāpi paramārthataḥ /
T04canprasu:387: asya paropakṣiptasya sādhanasyedaṃ dūṣaṇamabhihitamanena- ko hi bhavatāmabhipreto 'tra hetvarthaḥ?
T04canprasu:395: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate //
T04canprasu:397: tataśca paramārthato nirvartyanirvartakatvāsiddheḥ asiddhārthatā viruddhārthatā vā hetoriti //
T04canprasu:399: tasmātsarveṣvevānumāneṣu vastu dharmopanyastahetukeṣu svata evaṃ hetvādīnāmasiddhatvāt sarvāṇyeva sādhanāni vyāhanyante /
T04canprasu:403: athavā- na pare paramārthena vivakṣitāḥ cakṣurādyādhyātmikāyatananirvartakāḥ pratyayā iti pratīyante,
T04canprasu:407: yathā cānena- utpannā eva ādhyātmikā bhāvāḥ,
T04canprasu:409: atha samāhitasya yoginaḥ prajñācakṣuṣā bhāvayāthātmyaṃ paśyataḥ utpādagatyādayaḥ santi paramārthata iti sādhyate,
T04canprasu:415: na paramārthataḥ sabhāgaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati,
T04canprasu:426: utāho ghaṭādivat svata utpadyantāmiti ghaṭādīnāṃ sādhyasamatvānnānaikāntikateti cet,
T04canprasu:430: evaṃ svānumāneṣvapi yathoktadūṣaṇaprasaṅge sati sa eva asiddhādhārāsiddhahetvādidoṣaḥ prāpnoti,
T04canprasu:432: na tenaikaścodyo bhavatīti sarvametaddūṣaṇamayuktaṃ jāyata iti /
T04canprasu:436: tathā hi- paraḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti pratipannaḥ /
T04canprasu:439: tasmād yatra yatra svātmādarśanaṃ tatra tatra paradarśanamapi nāsti,
T04canprasu:443: tataśca svātmādarśanaviruddhaṃ nīlādiparadarśanaṃ svaprasiddhenaivānumānena virudhyata iti etāvanmātramasmadanūmānairudbhāvyata iti kuto 'smatpakṣe
T04canprasu:449: kadāciddhi loke arthipratyarthibhyāṃ pramāṇīkṛtasya sākṣiṇo vacanena jayo bhavati parājayo vā,
T04canprasu:451: paravacanena tu na jayo nāpi parājayaḥ /
T04canprasu:455: ata eva kaiściduktam- na parataḥ prasiddhibalādanumānabādhā,
T04canprasu:460: tenāpi laukikīṃ vyavasthāmanurudhyamānena anumāne yathokta eva nyāyo 'bhyupeyaḥ //
T04canprasu:461: tathā hi nobhayaprasiddhena vā āgamena bādhā,
T04canprasu:471: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
T04canprasu:473: tataśca parābhāvādeva nāpi parata utpadyante / api ca-
T04canprasu:479: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- na parata utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
T04canprasu:480: sarvataḥ sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- tadatra prasaṅgavākyatvāt sādhyasādhanaviparyayaṃ kṛtvā,
T04canprasu:481: svataḥ ubhayataḥ ahetuto vā utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
T04canprasu:486: pūrvameva pratipāditatvād dūṣaṇāntaḥpātitvācca parapratijñātārthadūṣaṇeneti yatkiṃcidetaditi na punaryatna āsthīyate //
T04canprasu:490: syādubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādekaikakṛtaṃ yadi / iti //
T04canprasu:492: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
T04canprasu:499: atrācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- atrāpi prasaṅgavākyatvāt yadi viparītasādhyasādhanavyaktivākyārtha iṣyate,
T04canprasu:500: tadā etaduktaṃ bhavati- hetuta utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
T04canprasu:512: yattarhi bhagavatoktam- avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā avidyānirodhātsaṃskāranirodha iti, tathā-
T04canprasu:515: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukhaḥ //
T04canprasu:516: tathā- utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
T04canprasu:517: eko dharmaḥ sattvasthitaye yaduta catvāra āhārāḥ,
T04canprasu:518: dvau dharmau lokaṃ pālayato hrīścāpatrāpyaṃ cetyādi,
T04canprasu:528: tattvadarśanāpekṣayā tūktaṃ bhagavatā- etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
T04canprasu:530: tathā- nāstyatra tathatā vā avitathatā vā /
T04canprasu:539: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ /
T04canprasu:542: yasyaivaṃ deśanābhiprāyānabhijñatayā saṃdehaḥ syāt- kā hyatra deśanā tattvārthā,
T04canprasu:545: tayorubhayorapi vineyajanayoḥ ācāryo yuktyāgamābhyāṃ saṃśayamithyājñānāpākaraṇārthaṃ śāstramidamārabdhavān //
T04canprasu:549: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā //
T04canprasu:561: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥ sattvanirjīvaniḥ pudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāḥ ta ucyante nītārthāḥ /
T04canprasu:566: yasmin punaḥ pudgalasattvapūruṣā neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān //
T04canprasu:568: nanu ca- utpādādīnāmabhāve sati yadi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvapratipādanārthamidamārabdhavānācāryaḥ nanvevaṃ sati yanmṛṣā na tadastīti na santyakuśalāni
T04canprasu:575: saṃvṛtisatyavyapekṣayā lokasya idaṃsatyābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛṣārthatā bhāvānāṃ pratipādyate 'smābhiḥ /
T04canprasu:576: naiva tvāryāḥ kṛtakāryāḥ kiṃcidupalabhante yanmṛṣā amṛṣā vā syāditi /
T04canprasu:578: yena hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ parijñātaṃ kiṃ tasya karmāṇi santi,
T04canprasu:580: na cāpyasau kasyaciddharmassya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vopalabhate /
T04canprasu:582: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
T04canprasu:584: yannopalabhyate tannaiva atītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
T04canprasu:597: kiṃ punaḥ- mṛṣāsvabhāvā api padārthāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti /
T04canprasu:601: tadyathā kulaputra māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaścidrāgaparītacittāḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakrāmet,
T04canprasu:608: tathā mṛṣāsvabhāvā api bhāvā bālānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti //
T04canprasu:610: atha khalu tāni pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavato dharmadeśanāmanavatarantyanavagāhamānānyanadhimucyamānāni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni /
T04canprasu:611: atha bhagavān [tasyāṃ velāyāṃ] yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣavo gacchanti sma,
T04canprasu:612: tasmin mārge dvau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma //
T04canprasu:613: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena [mārgeṇa] tau dvau bhikṣū [nirmitakau] tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
T04canprasu:618: tamāvāṃ nāvatarāvo nāvagāhāvahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāvaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāvahe /
T04canprasu:619: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan- vayamapyāyuṣmanto bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /
T04canprasu:621: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ /
T04canprasu:625: nirmitakāvavocatām- kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣapayiṣyatha?
T04canprasu:626: tānyavocan- na te 'dhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,
T04canprasu:628: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmanto mā kalpayata,
T04canprasu:630: yadā cāyuṣmanto na kalpayiṣyatha na vikalpayiṣyatha,
T04canprasu:650: bhikṣūnetadavocat- kutrāyuṣmanto gatāḥ kuto vāgatāḥ te 'vocan- na kvacidgamanāya na kutaścidāgamanāya bhadanta subhūte bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ āha- ko nāmāyuṣmatāṃ śāstā?
T04canprasu:655: āhuḥ- yasya na kāyo na cittam /
T04canprasu:662: āha- kiyaccireṇāyuṣmantaḥ parinirvāsyanti āhuḥ- yadā tathāgatanirmitāḥ parinirvāsyanti /
T04canprasu:672: āhuḥ- na kāyena na vācā na manasā /
T04canprasu:681: iti hyāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ paripṛcchatasteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ prativisarjayatāṃ tasyāṃ parṣadi aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
T04canprasu:682: dvātriṃśataśca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurviśuddham / iti //
T04canprasu:683: ityevaṃ mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyāṃ tathāgatanirmitābhyāṃ bhikṣubhyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ vyavadānanibandhanaṃ kṛtamiti //
T04canprasu:685: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍaṃ ca pratītya mathanīṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya hastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavatīti agnirabhinirvartate /
T04canprasu:686: sa cāgnisaṃtāpo na kāṇḍasaṃniśrito na mathanīsaṃniśrito na puruṣahastavyāyāmasaṃniśritaḥ /
T04canprasu:687: evameva mañjuśrīḥ asadviparyāsamohitasya puruṣapudgalasya utpadyate rāgaparidāho dveṣaparidāho mohaparidāhaḥ /
T04canprasu:688: sa ca paridāho nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇa sthitaḥ //
T04canprasu:689: api tu mañjuśrīḥ yaducyate moha iti,
T04canprasu:691: atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmairmohastenocyate moha iti /
T04canprasu:692: tathā narakamukhā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā idaṃ dhāraṇīpadam /
T04canprasu:697: tatkiṃ manyase mañjuśrīḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtā narakā uta svabhāvasaṃbhūtāḥ?
T04canprasu:698: āha- svavikalpenaiva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanāṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokaṃ saṃjānanti /
T04canprasu:699: te ca asatsamāropeṇa duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti duḥkhamanubhavanti triṣvapyapāyeṣu //
T04canprasu:700: yathā cāhaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakaṃ duḥkham /
T04canprasu:701: tadyathā bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
T04canprasu:702: sa tatra kvathitāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmanekapauruṣāyāṃ lohakumbhyāṃ prakṣiptamātmānaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt /
T04canprasu:703: sa tatra kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ tŌṣvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayet /
T04canprasu:704: sa tatra mānasaṃ paridāhaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt uttraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta /
T04canprasu:705: sa tatra pratibuddhaḥ samānaḥ- aho duḥkham,
T04canprasu:708: atha tasya mitrajñāti sālohitāḥ paripṛccheyuḥ- kena tatte duḥkhamiti /
T04canprasu:709: sa tān mitrajñātisālohitānevaṃ vadet- nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhūtam /
T04canprasu:710: sa tānākrośet paribhāṣet- ahaṃ ca nāma nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhavāmi /
T04canprasu:711: yūyaṃ ca me uttari paripṛcchatha kenaitattava duḥkhamiti /
T04canprasu:712: atha te mitrajñātisālohitāstaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ- mā bhairmoḥ puruṣa /
T04canprasu:718: tadyathā bhagavan sa puruṣo 'satsamāropeṇa suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīyāt,
T04canprasu:719: evameva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanā asadbhāgaparyavanaddhāḥ strīnimittaṃ kalpayanti /
T04canprasu:720: te strīnimittaṃ kalpayitvā tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ ramamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānanti /
T04canprasu:724: tasya tena cchandarāgaparyavasthitena cittena bhogaparyeṣṭiṃ cittaṃ krāmayanti /
T04canprasu:727: sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti //
T04canprasu:728: tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti- mā bhaiḥ,
T04canprasu:732: evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti- nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na pudgalaḥ
T04canprasu:741: te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti /
T04canprasu:744: te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti /
T04canprasu:747: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike /
T04canprasu:748: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam //
T04canprasu:749: na ca kāraku kāraṇa santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ /
T04canprasu:750: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ //
T04canprasu:752: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena //
T04canprasu:753: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ /
T04canprasu:754: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ //
T04canprasu:755: tadevamete 'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam //
T04canprasu:756: yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyam //
T04canprasu:757: atrāha- yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato 'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ,
T04canprasu:758: tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate /
T04canprasu:764: idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ /
T04canprasu:769: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
T04canprasu:776: atra kecitparicodayanti- anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya utāpramāṇajaḥ?
T04canprasu:778: tadedaṃ vaktavyam- kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi,
T04canprasu:779: kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato 'hetuto veti /
T04canprasu:783: anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto 'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā bhāvā iti /
T04canprasu:784: yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato 'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati,
T04canprasu:786: yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ- anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
T04canprasu:788: atha te nāsti niścayo 'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti,
T04canprasu:800: kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati- svataḥ parata ubhayato 'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ //
T04canprasu:802: kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām- na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate /
T04canprasu:811: kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ,
T04canprasu:813: yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante,
T04canprasu:816: devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet- santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā /
T04canprasu:817: te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ /
T04canprasu:818: evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kvacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ parikliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ /
T04canprasu:820: yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam,
T04canprasu:822: yathā ca parabhūtebhyo jvālāṅgārādibhyo 'ṅkurasyotpattirnāsti iti abhyupetam,
T04canprasu:833: gantṛgantavyagamanādiko 'pi niravaśeṣo viśeṣo nāsti pratītyasamutpādasyeti pratipādanārtham //
T04canprasu:834: atha syāt- eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko 'smābhiḥ śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti,
T04canprasu:839: yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt,
T04canprasu:844: tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyanta ityādinā vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ vihito doṣaḥ /
T04canprasu:846: kiṃ ca / yadi svasāmānyalakṣaṇadvayānurodhena pramāṇadvayamuktaṃ yasya tallakṣaṇadvayam,
T04canprasu:848: yadyasti, tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
T04canprasu:850: tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
T04canprasu:856: iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam /
T04canprasu:858: tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo 'rthāntaratvāt sa eva doṣaḥ //
T04canprasu:859: atha syāt- jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti, ucyate /
T04canprasu:861: tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ /
T04canprasu:862: tena hi tallakṣyata iti kṛtvā prasiddhānugatāṃ ca (Pp_21)
T04canprasu:864: vijñānasya ca karaṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānenetyuktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇasyaiva karmatā svalakṣaṇāntarasya karaṇabhāvaśceti /
T04canprasu:866: tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyamiti sa eva doṣaḥ //
T04canprasu:867: atha syāt- yatpṛthivyādigataṃ kāṭhinyādikaṃ vijñānagamyaṃ tattasya karmāstyeva,
T04canprasu:869: evaṃ tarhi vijñānasvalakṣaṇasya karmatvābhāvātprameyatvaṃ na syāt,
T04canprasu:871: tataśca dvividhaṃ prameyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca ityetadviśeṣya vaktavyam- kiṃcitsvalakṣaṇaṃ prameyaṃ yallakṣyata ityevaṃ vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:873: atha tadapi karmasādhanaṃ tadā tasyānyena karaṇena bhavitavyam /
T04canprasu:876: tatastayā svasaṃvityā grahaṇātkarmatāyā satyāmastyeva prameyāntarbhāva iti, ucyate /
T04canprasu:877: vistareṇa madhyamakāvatāre svasaṃvittiniṣedhāt svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇāntareṇa lakṣyate,
T04canprasu:880: tadapi nāma jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāsiddherasaṃbhavāllakṣyābhāve nirāśrayalakṣaṇapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvathā nāstīti kutaḥ svasaṃvittiḥ?
T04canprasu:891: tadyathāpi nāma tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā na śakyate chettum,
T04canprasu:893: evameva na tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyaṃ draṣṭum /
T04canprasu:894: tasyaivaṃ yoniśaḥ prayuktasya yā cittasyānavasthānatā anucchedāśāśvatatā na kūṭasthatā nāhetukī na pratyayaviruddhā na tato nānyato na saiva nānyā /
T04canprasu:895: tāṃ cittadhārāṃ cittalatāṃ cittadharmatāṃ cittānavasthitatāṃ cittāpracāratāṃ cittādṛśyatāṃ cittasvalakṣaṇatāṃ tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā tathatāṃ na ca nirodhayati /
T04canprasu:896: tāṃ ca cittavivekatāṃ tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati /
T04canprasu:900: kiṃ ca / bhedena vā tallakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyātsyādabhedena vā?
T04canprasu:913: na ca vinā tattvānyatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇasiddhau anyā gatirasti /
T04canprasu:916: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // iti //
T04canprasu:919: avācyatā hi nāma parasparavibhāgaparijñānābhāve sati bhavati /
T04canprasu:923: iti viśeṣataḥ paricchedāsaṃbhave sati dvayorapyabhāva eveti /
T04canprasu:925: api ca / yadi jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayasya paricchede, kaḥ kartā?
T04canprasu:926: na ca kartāramantareṇāsti karaṇādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ chidikriyāyāmiva /
T04canprasu:933: ekasyāṃ hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ guṇakriyānirvṛttidvāreṇāṅgībhāvopagamāt /
T04canprasu:938: jñānasya tu arthaviśeṣapariccheda iti nāsti jñānasya karaṇatvaṃ nāpi cittasya kartṛtvam /
T04canprasu:940: atha syāt- anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityāgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāramantareṇāpi vidyata eva kriyādivyavahāra iti,
T04canprasu:950: śarīraśiraḥśabdayohi buddhayādipāṇyādivatsahabhāvipadārthāntarasāpekṣatāpravṛttau śarīraśiraḥ śabdamātrālambano buddhayupajananaḥ sahacāripadārthāntarasākāṅkṣa eva vartate,
T04canprasu:955: iha tu kāṭhinyādivyatiriktapṛthivyādyasaṃbhave sati na yukto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ /
T04canprasu:958: na hi tīrthikaparikalpitā yuktividhurāḥ padārthāḥ svasamaye 'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyyāḥ,
T04canprasu:966: yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:969: evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:971: tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ /
T04canprasu:976: kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:980: kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhireṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyata iti /
T04canprasu:983: yā? tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣāvāhakakuśalamūlopacayahetuḥ,
T04canprasu:987: vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim /
T04canprasu:996: śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata icchāmātrapratibaddhapravṛttito (vṛttiḥ?) bhavataḥ /
T04canprasu:997: yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam /
T04canprasu:998: kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat //
T04canprasu:1000: tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:1001: evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādinimittako 'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
T04canprasu:1005: sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ /
T04canprasu:1006: ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu- na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo 'pratyakṣaḥ pṛthagupalabdho yasyopacārātpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:1012: lokavyavahārāṅgabhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:1013: nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām / yathoktam-
T04canprasu:1015: vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate // iti /
T04canprasu:1021: sarva eva ghaṭo 'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate /
T04canprasu:1026: pratigatamakṣamasminniti kṛtvā ghaṭanīlādīnāmaparokṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:1027: tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate /
T04canprasu:1028: yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati,
T04canprasu:1029: tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ /
T04canprasu:1031: atha syāt- yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati
T04canprasu:1033: tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:1034: dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
T04canprasu:1037: vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:1039: tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti /
T04canprasu:1040: āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave 'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati /
T04canprasu:1041: iha tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva
T04canprasu:1042: tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate /
T04canprasu:1043: prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ
T04canprasu:1044: pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā
T04canprasu:1046: loke pratyakṣaśabdasya prasiddhatvādvivakṣite 'rthe pratyarthaśabdasyāprasiddhatvādāśrayeṇaiva vyutpattirāśrīyata iti cet, ucyate /
T04canprasu:1050: yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabdatiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:1052: ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt,
T04canprasu:1053: ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt //
T04canprasu:1056: laukikasya ca pramāṇaprameyavyavahārasya vyākhyātumiṣṭatvād vyarthaiva pratyakṣapramāṇakalpanā saṃjāyate /
T04canprasu:1057: cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt,
T04canprasu:1058: pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat /
T04canprasu:1059: tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
T04canprasu:1061: ataḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadviṣayeṇa jñānena saha /
T04canprasu:1066: sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā //
T04canprasu:1068: tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti- satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ,
T04canprasu:1070: no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti /
T04canprasu:1073: laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā // 3 //
T04canprasu:1074: atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ- yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti,
T04canprasu:1083: tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T04canprasu:1098: ata evāvadhārayati- pratyayo nāsti pañcama iti /
T04canprasu:1100: atrocyate- naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:1101: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
T04canprasu:1103: iti / yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ sattvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:1114: athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt //
T04canprasu:1118: tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti /
T04canprasu:1122: tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate- na cakṣūrūpādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣādvijñānaṃ janayanti /
T04canprasu:1130: sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet /
T04canprasu:1133: iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate,
T04canprasu:1139: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
T04canprasu:1142: kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā /
T04canprasu:1147: atha vā jāyamānatvaṃ sarvasyaiva prasajyate // iti /
T04canprasu:1150: ata evāha- kriyā na pratyayavatī iti /
T04canprasu:1159: na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo 'bhyupagamyate /
T04canprasu:1165: tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ kathaṃ janakāḥ?
T04canprasu:1166: atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti, ucyate-
T04canprasu:1173: evaṃ parikriyādayo 'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto 'pi samutpattirbhāvānāmiti bhavatyutpādābhidhānamarthaśūnyam // 6 //
T04canprasu:1174: atrāha- kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa?
T04canprasu:1175: yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante,
T04canprasu:1180: yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā ucyante,
T04canprasu:1181: nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ?
T04canprasu:1182: apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya /
T04canprasu:1183: atha matam- pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti,
T04canprasu:1185: yat tat pratyayāntaramapratyayasya tasya pratyayatvena kalpyate,
T04canprasu:1186: tadapi pratyayatve sati asya pratyayo bhavati /
T04canprasu:1188: kiṃ ca / iha ime cakṣurādayo vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sato vā asya kalpyeran, asato vā?
T04canprasu:1192: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim // 8 //
T04canprasu:1193: asato hyarthasya avidyamānasya kathaṃ pratyayaḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:1199: evaṃ samastānāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāryotpādanāsāmarthyena apratyayatvamudbhāvya ataḥ paraṃ vyastānāmapratyayatvaṃ pratipādyate //
T04canprasu:1205: syāddhetupratyayo yadi tasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:1206: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
T04canprasu:1207: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate // 9 //
T04canprasu:1229: ayaṃ ca vidyamānānāṃ vā parikalpyeta avidyamānānāṃ vā /
T04canprasu:1233: athaivamanālambane dharme svātmanā prasiddhe kimasya ālambanayogena parikalpitena,
T04canprasu:1234: ityanālambana evāyaṃ san vidyamāno dharmaḥ cittādikaḥ kevalaṃ sālambana ityucyate bhavadbhiḥ svamanīṣikayā,
T04canprasu:1245: tenāyamarthaḥ- athaivamanālambane dharme 'sati avidyamāne bhūyaḥ kuta ālambanam?
T04canprasu:1254: tenaivaṃ pāṭhaḥ- niruddhe ca pratyayaḥ kaḥ?
T04canprasu:1258: atra vicāryate- anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kāryabhūteṣvaṅkurādiṣu nirodho nopapadyate kāraṇasya bījādeḥ /
T04canprasu:1262: evaṃ sati niruddha bīje abhāvībhūte aṅkurasya kaḥ pratyayaḥ?
T04canprasu:1264: ubhayametadahetukamityāha- niruddhe ca kaḥ pratyaya iti /
T04canprasu:1266: tena anutpanne cāṅkure bījādīnāṃ nirodhe iṣyamāṇe 'pyubhayametadahetukamapadyata iti nānantaramato yuktam /
T04canprasu:1268: na svato nāpi parata ityādinā utpādo niṣiddhaḥ,
T04canprasu:1276: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
T04canprasu:1280: bhāvānāṃ ca pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvābhāve kutastada yadasminniti kāraṇatvena vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:1283: atrāha- tantvādibhyaḥ paṭādikamupalabhya paṭādestantvādayaḥ pratyayā iti /
T04canprasu:1289: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat // 13 //
T04canprasu:1290: tatra vyasteṣu tantuturīvematasaraśalākādiṣu pratyayeṣu paṭo nāsti,
T04canprasu:1300: apratyayebhyo 'pi vīraṇādibhyaḥ kasmānnābhipravartate paṭa iti nāsti phalapravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ // 14 //
T04canprasu:1301: atrāha- yadi anyat phalaṃ syādanye ca pratyayāḥ,
T04canprasu:1302: tadā kiṃ pratyayeṣu phalamasti nāstīti cintā syāt /
T04canprasu:1313: te hi aṃśumayā aṃśuvikārā na svabhāvasiddhāḥ /
T04canprasu:1327: tathā ca bhavān bravīti- yadi asat phalaṃ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate,
T04canprasu:1329: na cāsati phale paṭakaṭākhye tantuvīraṇānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ yuktam,
T04canprasu:1333: sati hi phale ime 'sya pratyayā ime 'pratyayā iti syāt /
T04canprasu:1339: śūnyavidya na hi vidyate kvaci antarīkṣi śakunasya vā padam /
T04canprasu:1340: yo na vidyati sabhāvataḥ kvaci so na jātu parahetu bheṣyati //
T04canprasu:1341: yasya naiva hi sabhāvu labhyati so 'svabhāvu parapaccayaḥ katham /
T04canprasu:1342: asvabhāvu paru kiṃ janīṣyati eṣa hetu sugatena deśitaḥ //
T04canprasu:1343: sarva dharma acalā dṛḍhaṃ sthitā nirvikāra nirupadravāḥ śivāḥ /
T04canprasu:1345: śailaparvata yathā akampiyā evaṃ dharma avikampiyāḥ sadā /
T04canprasu:1346: no cyavati na pi copapadyayu evaṃ dharmata jinena deśitā // ityādi /
T04canprasu:1348: yo na pi jāyati nā cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ /
T04canprasu:1349: taṃ jinu deśayatī narasiṃhaḥ tatra niveśayi sattvaśatāni /
T04canprasu:1350: yasya sabhāvu na vidyati kaści no parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ /
T04canprasu:1351: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ //
T04canprasu:1352: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gati upalabhyati kāci /
T04canprasu:1353: tatra ca voharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayamī bahusattvān //
T04canprasu:1355: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pratyayaparīkṣā nāma prathamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:1360: yadi gamanaṃ nāma syānniyataṃ tadgate vā adhvajāte parikalpyeta agate gamyamāne vā /
T04canprasu:1362: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate /
T04canprasu:1366: yadgatamuparatagamikriyaṃ tadvartamānagamikriyāyogavācinā gamyate ityanena śabdenocyamānamasaṃbaddhamiti kṛtvā gataṃ tāvad gamyata iti na yujyate
T04canprasu:1376: iha hi gantā yaṃ deśamatikrāntaḥ sa tasya deśo gataḥ,
T04canprasu:1378: na ca gatāgatavyatirekeṇa tṛtīyamaparamadhvajātaṃ paśyāmo gamyamānaṃ nāma /
T04canprasu:1382: ato na tad gamikriyayā āviśyate na gamyata iti nāsti gamyamāne 'pi gamanam //
T04canprasu:1393: evaṃ paramāṇūnāmapi pūrvāparadigbhāgasaṃbandhena vicāraḥ kārya iti /
T04canprasu:1397: tatrāha- gamyata eva gamyamānam / iha hi-
T04canprasu:1398: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
T04canprasu:1399: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ // 2 //
T04canprasu:1401: yato vrajato ganturyatra deśe ceṣṭā gatiḥ tatraiva deśe /
T04canprasu:1402: sā ca ceṣṭā na gate 'dhvani saṃbhavati nāpyagate,
T04canprasu:1410: evamapi parikalpyamāne gamyamānaṃ na gamyata ityāha-
T04canprasu:1417: gamyata iti bhūyaḥ kriyāsaṃbandho gamyamānasya na yujyata iti
T04canprasu:1424: gamyata ityayaṃ vyapadeśo vinā gamanena yadā naivopapadyate,
T04canprasu:1425: tadā gamyamānaṃ gamyata iti paripūrṇo vākyārtho nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
T04canprasu:1429: evaṃ sati gamyamānavyapadeśe nāsti kriyāsaṃbandha iti na paripūrṇatā vākyārthasyetyāha-
T04canprasu:1438: yasmād gatirahitameva gamyamānaṃ sat tasya vādino gamyate,
T04canprasu:1441: atha ubhayatrāpi kriyāsaṃbandha iṣyate gamyamāne gamyate ityatra ca, evamapi-
T04canprasu:1443: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ // 5 //
T04canprasu:1446: tatra gamyamāne 'dhikaraṇabhute dvitīyaṃ gamanaṃ yena so 'dhvā gamyate /
T04canprasu:1454: yasmādavaśyaṃ kriyā svasādhanamapekṣate karma kartāraṃ vā /
T04canprasu:1457: nāsti ca ekasminneva gacchati devadatte dvitīyaḥ karteti /
T04canprasu:1467: kriyābhedācca tatsādhanasyāpi śakteḥ siddha eva bhedaḥ /
T04canprasu:1477: atrāha- yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi gantari devadatte gamanamupalabhyate devadatto gacchatīti vyapadeśāt /
T04canprasu:1480: syādevaṃ yadi gamanāśrayo gantā syāt, na tvasti /
T04canprasu:1485: tataśca gantāraṃ cetiraskṛtya pratyākhyāya gamanaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:1493: gamanavato devadattasya gacchatīti vyapadeśo na syāt,
T04canprasu:1498: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati /
T04canprasu:1502: yathā ca na gacchati tathottareṇa ślokatrayeṇa pratipādayiṣyati /
T04canprasu:1511: ko hi ganturaganturvinirmuktastṛtīyo 'sti yo gacchatīti kalpyeta?
T04canprasu:1520: ganteti tu vyapadeśe nāsti dvitīyā gamikriyā iti /
T04canprasu:1528: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
T04canprasu:1531: tasya ganturgamanamicchataḥ sagamanagantṛvyapadeśādgamanena vinā gantā gacchatīti syāt,
T04canprasu:1534: gacchatītyetasyārthe ganteti śabdo gamanena vinā gantetyatra vākye // 10 //
T04canprasu:1535: atha ubhayatrāpi gatiyoga iṣyate gantā gacchatīti, evamapi-
T04canprasu:1536: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
T04canprasu:1537: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati // 11 //
T04canprasu:1538: yena gamanena yogād gantetyucyate vyapadiśyate tadekaṃ gamanam /
T04canprasu:1542: ato gantṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavad dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
T04canprasu:1547: yasmāddevadattāśrayaivaiṣā cintā kimasau gantā san gacchati,
T04canprasu:1556: syādgamanaṃ yadi tadāramme eva syāt / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:1571: yathā ca gamanaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:1572: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
T04canprasu:1579: atha syāt- yadyapi gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gataṃ na gamyamānaṃ tathāpyagatamasti,
T04canprasu:1584: tatra gamanārambha ityasaṃbaddhametadityāha- agate gamanaṃ kutaḥ iti // 13 //
T04canprasu:1587: na cāsati gamane etāni yujyanta iti /
T04canprasu:1590: sati hi gamikriyāprārambhe yatroparatā gamikriyā tad gatamiti parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:1593: yadā tu gamikriyāprārambha eva nāsti, tadā-
T04canprasu:1594: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamanaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
T04canprasu:1604: syād gamanaṃ yadi tatpratipakṣaḥ sthānaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:1607: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
T04canprasu:1609: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tathottareṇa ślokenākhyāsyati /
T04canprasu:1616: ekayā sthityā agantā aparayā tiṣṭhatīti sthitidvayaprasaṅgāt sthātṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavaddoṣaḥ /
T04canprasu:1620: kiṃ tarhi gantaiva tiṣṭhatīti naivam / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:1629: iha gaternivartamānaḥ sthitimārabhate gamanābhāve tu na tato nivarteta /
T04canprasu:1634: tatra gantā gatādadhvano na nivartate gatyabhāvāt /
T04canprasu:1648: atra hi yadgamanaṃ sthitisiddhaye varṇitaṃ tadgatyā samaṃ gatidūṣaṇena tulyamityarthaḥ /
T04canprasu:1649: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadityādinā gatiprasiddhaye sthiterhetutvenopāttāyā dūṣaṇamuktam,
T04canprasu:1650: evamihāpi sthitiprasiddhaye gamanasya hetutvenopāttasya sthātā na gacchati tāvadityādinā ślokadvayapāṭhaparivartena dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nāsti
T04canprasu:1652: evaṃ tāvad gamanaṃ gatyā tulyaṃ pratyākhyeyam //
T04canprasu:1653: atha syāt- vidyata eva sthānaṃ tadārambhasadbhāvāt /
T04canprasu:1657: tatra yathā pūrvaṃ gate nārabhyate gantumityādinā gamanārambho niṣiddhaḥ, evamihāpi-
T04canprasu:1667: iti gatyā tulyaṃ dūṣaṇamiti nāsti sthitiḥ /
T04canprasu:1672: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
T04canprasu:1673: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate // 18 //
T04canprasu:1675: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi /
T04canprasu:1676: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca // 19 //
T04canprasu:1684: ato yadeva gamanaṃ sa eva ganteti na yujyate // 19 //
T04canprasu:1690: gantṛnirapekṣaṃ ca gamanaṃ gṛhyeta pṛthak siddhaṃ ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
T04canprasu:1691: na ca gantuḥ pṛthaksiddhaṃ gamanaṃ gṛhyata iti /
T04canprasu:1692: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate iti prasādhitametat // 20 //
T04canprasu:1695: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // 21 //
T04canprasu:1696: yayorgantṛgamanayoryathoditanyāyena ekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
T04canprasu:1698: ata āha- tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyata iti /
T04canprasu:1700: atrāha- iha devadatto gantā gacchatīti lokaprasiddham /
T04canprasu:1704: evaṃ yayā gatyā gantetyabhivyajyate tāṃ gacchatīti na yathoktadoṣaḥ /
T04canprasu:1706: gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
T04canprasu:1708: sa gantā san tāṃ tāvanna gacchati,
T04canprasu:1709: na prāpnoti yadi vā na karotītyarthaḥ /
T04canprasu:1712: yadi gantā gateḥ pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:1716: kaściddevadattaḥ kiṃcidarthāntarabhūtaṃ grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā gacchatīti dṛṣṭam /
T04canprasu:1718: tasyāḥ pūrvaṃ siddharūpo gatinirapekṣo gantā nāma asti yastāṃ gacchet // 22 //
T04canprasu:1723: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
T04canprasu:1726: tato 'nyāmapi sa gantā san na gacchati,
T04canprasu:1729: gantā san yāṃ cāparāṃ gacchatītyetad gatidvayaṃ prasaktam /
T04canprasu:1732: etena vaktā vācaṃ bhāṣate kartā kriyāṃ karoti,
T04canprasu:1735: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
T04canprasu:1743: tatra sadbhūto gantā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtaṃ triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati /
T04canprasu:1745: evamasadbhūto 'pi gantā triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati /
T04canprasu:1748: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate // 25 //
T04canprasu:1752: yatra na saṃkarṣaṇapadaṃ na niṣkarṣaṇapadaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ padam /
T04canprasu:1760: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
T04canprasu:1761: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā // iti //
T04canprasu:1763: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ // iti ca //
T04canprasu:1765: ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ alaṃkṛtam /
T04canprasu:1766: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo //
T04canprasu:1767: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /
T04canprasu:1768: mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
T04canprasu:1770: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
T04canprasu:1771: supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate //
T04canprasu:1772: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
T04canprasu:1774: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā /
T04canprasu:1775: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato //
T04canprasu:1776: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
T04canprasu:1777: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
T04canprasu:1778: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
T04canprasu:1779: na ca dṛṣṭa sthānagatiśuddhiriho na ca satvacāra supaśāntagati //
T04canprasu:1780: supinopamaṃ hi tribhavaṃ vaśikaṃ laghu bhagnamanityena māyasamam /
T04canprasu:1781: na ca āgataṃ na ca ihopagataṃ śūnyānimitta sada saṃtatiyo //
T04canprasu:1782: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā /
T04canprasu:1783: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāna iyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā //
T04canprasu:1787: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau gatāgataparīkṣā nāma dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:1789: atrāha- yadyapi gatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate,
T04canprasu:1792: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
T04canprasu:1799: yathā darśanaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:1800: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati /
T04canprasu:1801: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān // 2 //
T04canprasu:1802: tatra tadeva darśanaṃ svātmānaṃ na paśyati svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
T04canprasu:1807: tathā hi agniḥparātmānameva dahati na svātmānam,
T04canprasu:1808: evaṃ darśanaṃ parāneva drakṣyati na svātmānamiti /
T04canprasu:1812: sa na paryāpto nālaṃ na samartho na yujyata ityarthaḥ / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:1816: so 'pi saha darśanena dārṣṭāntikārthena pratyukto dūṣitaḥ /
T04canprasu:1818: yathā gataṃ na gamyate nāgataṃ na gamyamānam,
T04canprasu:1819: evamagnināpi dagdhaṃ na dahyate nādagdhaṃ dahyata ityādinā samaṃ vācyam /
T04canprasu:1820: yathā ca na gataṃ nāgataṃ na gamyamānaṃ gamyate, evam-
T04canprasu:1821: na dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate tāvadadṛṣṭaṃ naiva dṛśyate /
T04canprasu:1824: yathā ca gantā na gacchati tāvadityādyuktam,
T04canprasu:1825: evaṃ na dagdhā dahati tāvadityādi vācyam /
T04canprasu:1826: evaṃ na draṣṭā paśyati tāvadityādinā agnidṛṣṭāntena saha gamyamānagatāgatairyasmātsamaṃ dūṣaṇam,
T04canprasu:1829: tataśca siddhametat- svātmavad darśanaṃ parānapi na paśyatīti // 3 //
T04canprasu:1836: yadyapi darśanaśabdādanantaraṃ ślokabandhānurodhena darśana paśyatīti pāṭhaḥ,
T04canprasu:1837: tathāpi vyākhyānakāle paśyatīti darśanamityevaṃ kathametattu yujyate iti paṭhitavyam // 4 //
T04canprasu:1838: kiṃ cānyat- iha paśyatīti darśanamityucyamāne darśanakriyayā darśanasvabhāvasya vā cakṣuṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:1842: darśanasvabhāvasya tāvad dṛśikriyāyuktasya bhūyaḥ paśyatītyādinā saṃbandho nopapadyate dṛśikriyādvayaprasaṅgāt darśanadvayaprasaṅgācca /
T04canprasu:1844: paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyatyadarśanam / tadā
T04canprasu:1847: ye tu manyante- nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātramutpadyamānamutpadyate iti,
T04canprasu:1860: kriyāvān śāśvato nāsti nāsti sarvagate kriyā /
T04canprasu:1861: niṣkriyo nāstinā tulyo nairātmyaṃ kiṃ na te priyam // iti /
T04canprasu:1864: atrāha- naiva hi paśyatīti darśanamiti kartṛsādhanamabhyupagamyate,
T04canprasu:1875: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān //
T04canprasu:1880: na tasya karmakaraṇe vidyete tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ /
T04canprasu:1881: asti ca draṣṭuḥ karaṇaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ca karma /
T04canprasu:1892: tadā siddhasya vā darśanāpekṣā syādasiddhasya vā /
T04canprasu:1893: tatra siddho draṣṭā na hi darśanamapekṣate /
T04canprasu:1894: kiṃ siddhasya sato draṣṭuḥ punardarśanāpek ṣā kuryāt?
T04canprasu:1895: na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyata iti /
T04canprasu:1901: tadevaṃ tiraskṛtyātiraskṛtya vā darśanaṃ yadā draṣṭā nāsti, tadā-
T04canprasu:1902: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ // 6 //
T04canprasu:1903: draṣṭaryasati nirhetuke draṣṭavyadarśane na saṃbhavataḥ iti kutastatsadbhāvād draṣṭā prasetsyati?
T04canprasu:1908: iti draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ ca pratītya vijñānamutpadyate /
T04canprasu:1918: iha draṣṭurabhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane api na sta ityuktam /
T04canprasu:1930: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
T04canprasu:1934: na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca /
T04canprasu:1935: etatta paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate //
T04canprasu:1940: no cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi //
T04canprasu:1944: na kahiṃci gataṃ na cāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati //
T04canprasu:1946: sarva sayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam /
T04canprasu:1947: naiva ca cakṣu prapaśyati rūpaṃ tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ //
T04canprasu:1949: yena ca yogasamāśritacakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci //
T04canprasu:1950: yo 'pi ca śrūyati śabdu manojñaḥ so 'pi ca nāntari jātu praviṣṭaḥ /
T04canprasu:1951: saṃkramaṇaṃ na ca labhyati tasya kalpavaśāttu samucchritu śabdaḥ // iti //
T04canprasu:1953: gītaṃ na nṛtyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ svapnopamā hi ratayo 'budhamohanāśca /
T04canprasu:1954: saṃkalpalālasa gatā abudhā 'tra nāśaṃ kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhavāmi // iti //
T04canprasu:1955: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau cakṣurādīndriyaparīkṣā nāma tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:1962: syureva, yadi skandhāḥ syuḥ tatra rūpaskandhamadhikṛtyāha-
T04canprasu:1967: tadvayatiriktaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ nopalabhyate ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
T04canprasu:1973: evaṃ rūpakāraṇacaturmahābhūtavyatirikta bhautikaṃ rūpamiṣyamāṇaṃ na bhūtahetukaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:1976: idānīṃ rūpeṇāpi vinirmuktaṃ yathā rūpakāraṇaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:1981: yathā ghaṭātkuṇḍaṃ pṛthaksiddhaṃ ghaṭahetukaṃ na bhavati,
T04canprasu:1990: atha cedaṃ rūpasya kāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sati vā rūpe kāraṇatveneṣyate 'sati vā?
T04canprasu:1994: sati vā saṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam?
T04canprasu:1995: asati asaṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam,
T04canprasu:1998: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:2005: asati kāraṇe kuto nirhetukaṃ kāryaṃ rūpaṃ bhavet?
T04canprasu:2006: naiva naivetyanena sāvadhāraṇena pratiṣedhadvayena ahetukatvādasyātyaniṣṭatāṃ darśayati /
T04canprasu:2007: yataścaivaṃ rūpaṃ sarvathā vicāryamāṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:2012: api ca / idaṃ rūpakāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ niṣpādayedasadṛśaṃ vā?
T04canprasu:2018: bāhyaṃ tu rūpādyāyatanādikaṃ cakṣurvijñānādigrāhyalakṣaṇaṃ na mahābhūtasvabhāvamiti /
T04canprasu:2021: na cāpi sadṛśānāṃ śālibījādīnāṃ parasparakāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ, ityataḥ
T04canprasu:2026: yathā cedaṃ rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ sarvathā nopapadyate,
T04canprasu:2032: yathaiva hyekasya dharmasya śūnyatā pratipādayitumiṣṭā mādhyamikena,
T04canprasu:2035: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
T04canprasu:2038: śūnyatayā kāraṇabhūtayā rūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvamityevaṃ sasvabhāvavāde pratiṣiddhe,
T04canprasu:2042: yasmādvedanādīnāmapi sadbhāvaḥ sādhyena rūpasadbhāvena samo veditavyaḥ /
T04canprasu:2047: saṃskārapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ svakāraṇātsparśādeḥ tattvānyatvādinā vicāryamāṇaṃ nāstīti sarvametatsādhyasamaṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:2049: evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇakāryakāraṇāvayavyavayavādayo 'pi sarva eva padārthāḥ rūpeṇa sādhyena samā iti kutaḥ parasya parīhāra saṃbhavet?
T04canprasu:2050: sarvaṃ vacanamasya sādhyasamaṃ bhavatīti sarvatra śāstre parīhāreṇa sādhyasamatvaṃ mādhyamikenā grāhaṇīyamityācāryaḥ śikṣayati // 8 //
T04canprasu:2053: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
T04canprasu:2057: bhāvasyaikasya yo draṣṭā draṣṭā sarvasya sa smṛtaḥ /
T04canprasu:2058: ekasya śūnyatā yaiva saiva sarvasya śūnyatā // iti /
T04canprasu:2060: ekena dharmeṇa tu sarvadharmān anugacchate māyamarīcisādṛśān /
T04canprasu:2061: agrāhyatucchānalikānaśāśvatān so bodhimaṇḍaṃ nacireṇa gacchati // iti //
T04canprasu:2063: yatha ñāta tayātmasaṃjña tathaiva sarvatra peṣitā buddhiḥ /
T04canprasu:2064: sarve ca tatsvabhāvā dharma viśuddhā gaganakalpāḥ //
T04canprasu:2066: kiyadbahu pi bhāvetvā na tasyotpadyate madaḥ // iti /
T04canprasu:2067: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau skandhaparīkṣā nāma caturtha prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:2070: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā- ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣapudgala ityādi /
T04canprasu:2073: syuḥ skandhāyatanāni yadi dhātava eva syuḥ /
T04canprasu:2087: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit /
T04canprasu:2093: tataśca asati asaṃvidyamāne alakṣaṇe lakṣaṇarahite bhāve kuha idānīṃ lakṣaṇaṃpravartatāmiti nāsti lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ // 2 //
T04canprasu:2094: api ca / idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pravartamānaṃ salakṣaṇe vā pravarteta alakṣaṇe vā?
T04canprasu:2100: kiṃ hi lakṣaṇavataḥ prasiddhasya bhāvasya punarlakṣaṇakṛtyaṃ syāt?
T04canprasu:2102: na hyasau kadācinna salakṣaṇaḥ syāditi sadaiva lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ prasajyeta /
T04canprasu:2105: tatraivaṃ syāt- salakṣaṇālakṣaṇābhyāmanyatra pravartiṣyata iti / ucyate-
T04canprasu:2113: tasmādasaṃbhavādeva salakṣaṇe cālakṣaṇe ca lakṣaṇapravṛttirnopapadyate iti // 3 //
T04canprasu:2117: yadā lakṣaṇapravṛttireva nāsti tadā kathaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt?
T04canprasu:2119: atrāha- lakṣaṇapravṛttistvayā niṣiddhā na tu lakṣaṇam,
T04canprasu:2123: lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyamupapadyate iti pratipāditam / tadā
T04canprasu:2127: tadā lakṣaṇasadbhāvādvidyate lakṣyamiti yaduktaṃ tanna yataścaitadevam-
T04canprasu:2128: tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
T04canprasu:2130: atrāha- yadyāpi lakṣyalakṣaṇe na staḥ, tathā (pyā)
T04canprasu:2131: kāśamasti, bhāvarūpaṃ ca bhavadākāśa lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vā syāt /
T04canprasu:2150: yadyapi rūpaṃ syāttadā rūpābhāva ākāśamiti syāt /
T04canprasu:2151: yadā ca yathoktena nyāyena rūpameva nāsti,
T04canprasu:2155: asti ca bhavān bhāvābhāvayoḥ parīkṣakaḥ, ya evāha-
T04canprasu:2157: iti / tasmād bhavato bhāvābhāvaparīkṣakasya sadbhāvāt parīkṣyāvapi bhāvābhāvau vidyete iti /
T04canprasu:2162: tadā tayoḥ parīkṣako bhāvo va syādabhāvo vā /
T04canprasu:2169: na ca bhāvābhāvavisadṛśadharmā kaścit tṛtīyaḥ padārtho 'sti,
T04canprasu:2172: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
T04canprasu:2173: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ bhajate samādhim // iti /
T04canprasu:2175: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku balaḥ /
T04canprasu:2176: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāḥ te ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ //
T04canprasu:2177: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cinta na jātu na bhūtaḥ /
T04canprasu:2178: cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān //
T04canprasu:2181: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
T04canprasu:2187: tadevaṃ padārthānāṃ svabhāve vyavasthite avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā anādisaṃsārābhyastatayā
T04canprasu:2189: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
T04canprasu:2190: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam // 8 //
T04canprasu:2191: draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivalakṣaṇaṃ sarvakalpanājālarahitaṃ jñānajñeyanivṛttisvabhāvaṃ śivaṃ paramārthasvabhāvam /
T04canprasu:2192: paramārthamajaramamaramaprapañcaṃ nirvāṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ te na paśyanti mandabuddhitayā astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ cābhiniviṣṭāḥ santa iti /
T04canprasu:2197: astīti nāstīti ume 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
T04canprasu:2198: tasmādume anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ //
T04canprasu:2199: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /
T04canprasu:2200: vivādaprāptyā na dukhaṃ praśāmyate avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // iti /
T04canprasu:2201: tasmādasaṃbhava eva yatsāṃsārikeṇa mārgeṇa nirvāṇamadhigamyata iti // 8 //
T04canprasu:2202: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dhātuparīkṣā nāma pañcamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:2209: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā- bālo bhikṣave aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate /
T04canprasu:2211: raktaḥ san rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manaseti vistaraḥ /
T04canprasu:2213: syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavo yadi rāgādaya eva kleśāḥ syuḥ /
T04canprasu:2214: ihāyaṃ rāgaḥ parikalpyamāno bālapṛthagjanaiḥ sati rakte nare parikalpyeta asati vā?
T04canprasu:2217: taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati // 1 //
T04canprasu:2218: tatra rāgaḥ saktiradhyavasānaṃ saṅgo 'bhiniveśa iti paryāyāḥ /
T04canprasu:2220: sa yadi rakto rāgātpūrvaṃ rāgatiraskṛto rāgarahito bhavet,
T04canprasu:2221: tadā taṃ rāgatiraskṛtaṃ raktaṃ pratītya rāgo bhavet /
T04canprasu:2222: evaṃ sakti rakte rāgo bhavediti yuktam /
T04canprasu:2229: rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:2231: tadā kathamasati rakte nirāśrayo rāgaḥ setsyati?
T04canprasu:2232: na hi asati phale tatpakvatā saṃbhavatīti //
T04canprasu:2240: yasmādayaṃ rakta iṣyamāṇaḥ sati vā rāge parikalpyeta, asati vā?
T04canprasu:2242: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // 2 //
T04canprasu:2243: tatra yadi sati rāge raktaḥ parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:2244: tatrāpi eṣa eva rāgānupapattikramo 'nantarokto rakte 'pi tulyaḥ /
T04canprasu:2248: rāge 'sati punā raktaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:2251: atrāha- naiva hi rāgaraktayoḥ paurvāparyeṇa saṃbhavo yata idaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:2261: api ca / anayo rāgaraktayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ ekatve parikalpyeta pṛthaktve vā?
T04canprasu:2267: na hi rāgasvātmā rāgādavyatirikto rāgeṇa saheti vyapadiśyate //
T04canprasu:2270: na hi pṛthagbhūtayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇayorvā sahabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti // 4 //
T04canprasu:2275: tadā yatra yatraikatvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva ityekasyāpi sahabhāvaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:2276: pṛthaktve 'pi sahabhāve iṣyamāṇe yatra yatra pṛthaktvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva iti aśvādivyatiriktasya pṛthagavasthitasya goḥ asahāyasya sahabhāvaḥ syāt // 5 //
T04canprasu:2282: kiṃ rāganirapekṣo raktaḥ siddho yatastayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:2284: na tvevaṃ rāgaraktau pṛthakpṛthaksiddhāviti nāstyanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ // 6 //
T04canprasu:2295: pṛthakpṛthag rāgaraktayoḥ siddhirnāstīti kṛtvā yadyanayoḥ sahabhāvamicchasi,
T04canprasu:2298: nanvevaṃ sati itaretarāśrayāyāṃ siddhau sthitāyāṃ kasyedānīṃ siddhau satyāṃ kasya siddhirastu? // 8 //
T04canprasu:2302: nāstyeva sa pṛthagbhāvaḥ sahabhāvānapekṣo yasmin pṛthagbhāve sati sahabhāvasiddhiḥ syādityasaṃbhāvayannāha-
T04canprasu:2305: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
T04canprasu:2306: iti / yathā ca rāgaraktayorna paurvāparyeṇa siddhiḥ nāpi sahabhāvena,
T04canprasu:2311: yo rajyeta yatra vā rajyeta yena vā rajyeta,
T04canprasu:2312: yo duṣyeta yatra vā duṣyeta yena vā duṣyeta,
T04canprasu:2313: yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta yena vā muhyeta,
T04canprasu:2314: sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati taṃ dharma nopalabhate /
T04canprasu:2320: niḥkleśo vaśībhūtaḥ suvimuktacittaḥ suvimuktaprajña ājāneyo mahābhāgaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ
T04canprasu:2326: na vikalpayanti na virāgamapīha teṣām [āśu] sarvabhavabhāvavibhāvitānām //
T04canprasu:2327: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau rāgaraktaparīkṣā nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:2331: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni /
T04canprasu:2344: iyaṃ ca utpādasthitibhaṅgasamāhārasvabhāvasarvasaṃskṛtāvyabhicāriṇīti kṛtvā yadi utpādaḥ saṃskṛta iti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:2352: api ca / ime utpādādayaḥ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyamānā vyastā vā pṛthagvā lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyeran,
T04canprasu:2358: yadi utpādakāle sthitibhaṅgau na syātāṃ tadā sthitibhaṅgarahitasya ākāśasyeva saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvenānupapadya evotpādaḥ /
T04canprasu:2361: utpādabhaṅgarahitaśca padārtho nāstyeveti na asyāvidyamānasya khapuṣpavat sthitiryujyate /
T04canprasu:2365: atha syāt- pūrvaṃ śāśvato bhūtvā paścādaśāśvata iti,
T04canprasu:2366: na caikapadārthaḥ śāśvataścāśāśvataśca yukta iti notpādabhaṅgarahitasya sthitiḥ /
T04canprasu:2367: tathā yadi bhaṅgakāle sthityutpādau na syātām,
T04canprasu:2369: evaṃ tāvadutpādādayo vyastā nālaṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nālaṃ na paryāptā ityarthaḥ //
T04canprasu:2370: idānīṃ samastā api na yujyanta ityāha-
T04canprasu:2377: tasminneva tiṣṭhati vinaśyati ceti kaḥ sacetāḥ pratipadyeta?
T04canprasu:2378: tasmātsamastānāmapi utpādādīnāṃ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nāsti sāmarthyam // 2 //
T04canprasu:2380: tena yadi utpādādīnāṃ trilakṣaṇī prāptā prasaktā,
T04canprasu:2385: asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ // 3 //
T04canprasu:2386: nanu ca pakṣadvaye 'pi vihita eva doṣaḥ,
T04canprasu:2396: kiṃ pūrvaṃ syād yata uttarakālamaparaṃ bhavediti vyavasthābhāvādasaṃbhava evaṃ utpādādīnāmityabhiprāyaḥ /
T04canprasu:2399: nāsti cette na saṃskṛtā iti gatārthametat // 3 //
T04canprasu:2403: yasmādiha saṃskṛtadharmaḥ kuśalaḥ kliṣṭo vā utpadyamānaḥ ātmanā pañcadaśaḥ utpadyate /
T04canprasu:2404: sa dharmastasya cotpādaḥ samanvāgamaḥ sthitirjarā anityatā /
T04canprasu:2413: idānīmutpāda syāpara utpādaḥ yāvadanairyāṇikatānairyāṇikatetyeṣa parivārasya parivāraḥ /
T04canprasu:2414: tatra yo 'yaṃ maula utpāda sa ātmānaṃ vihāya anyāṃścaturdaśa dharmān janayati /
T04canprasu:2416: evaṃ yāvadanairyāṇikatā caturdaśa dharmān na niryāṇayati,
T04canprasu:2435: yadi tava utpādasyotpādo mūlotpādasya janaka iti matam,
T04canprasu:2436: sa kathamidānīṃ maulenotpādenānutpāditaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati? // 5 //
T04canprasu:2437: atha manyase- utpādita eva maulenotpādena utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati,
T04canprasu:2439: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
T04canprasu:2441: sa utpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādo maulena janito yadi maulaṃ janayati,
T04canprasu:2443: tasmānmaulena janitaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayatīte na yujyate /
T04canprasu:2444: tataśca parasparanirvartyanirvartakatvābhāvātsa eva anavasthāprasaṅga iti nāstyutpādaḥ // 6 //
T04canprasu:2452: sa ca ajātaḥ kathamutpādayiṣyatīti na yuktamevaitadityabhiprāyaḥ evamutpādotpāde 'pi vācyam // 7 //
T04canprasu:2453: atrāha- naiva hi utpādasyāpara utpādo 'sti yato 'navasthāprasaṅgaḥ syāt / kiṃ tarhi-
T04canprasu:2458: ucyate / syādetadevaṃ yadi pradīpaḥ svaparātmānau saṃprakāśayet /
T04canprasu:2461: kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ // 9 //
T04canprasu:2465: na cāpi pradīpo yatra deśe tiṣṭhati tatra tamo 'sti,
T04canprasu:2478: tadā anutpanne iva pradīpe utpanne 'pi ghaṭādayo nopalabhyeran,
T04canprasu:2483: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā // 10 //
T04canprasu:2486: tadā kathaṃ kena prakāreṇedānīmutpadyamānena pradīpena tamo hatamiti yuktaṃ parikalpayitum?
T04canprasu:2487: yasmācca evamutpadyamāna pradīpaḥ tamo na prāpnoti,
T04canprasu:2489: atha manyase- yathā aprāptāmeva avidyāṃ jñānaṃ nihanti,
T04canprasu:2490: aprāptameva rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati aprāptameva ayaḥ ayaskānto maṇirākarṣati,
T04canprasu:2492: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
T04canprasu:2496: ihastha eva pradīpaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ tamo nihaniṣyati,
T04canprasu:2501: atha aprāptāvapi satyāmayaskāntamaṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ yogyadeśāvasthānāmeva svakāryakṛtvaṃ debhaviṣyatīti cet,
T04canprasu:2504: aprāptatvād yogyadeśāvasthitānāmapi yogyadeśāvasthitatvaṃ na yuktamiti kuto yogyadeśāvasthitānāṃ
T04canprasu:2507: yathā hi bhavān parikalpayati na tathā loke dṛṣṭam /
T04canprasu:2508: yasmāt na lokaḥ prāptyaprāpticintāmevamādau viṣaye 'vatārya pradīpādīnāṃ prakāśakatvādikaṃ kalpayati /
T04canprasu:2509: yathoditaṃ tu vicāramanavatārya pradīpena tamo hatam,
T04canprasu:2513: tattvavicārakāle tu lokasyāprāmāṇyānna tena bādhā śakyate kartum /
T04canprasu:2518: yadyapi ceyaṃ prāptyaprāptyādicintā laukikavyavahāre nāvataratīti nirupapattikatvena mṛṣārthatvādasya,
T04canprasu:2521: yadi ca svaparātmānau pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti parikalpyate tvayā,
T04canprasu:2522: tamaso 'pi tarhi pratipakṣa bhūtasya svaparātmanoḥ pracchādanaṃ prakalpyatamityāha-
T04canprasu:2531: iha sāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā /
T04canprasu:2532: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭho eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena //
T04canprasu:2533: pravrajitvā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ /
T04canprasu:2534: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ //
T04canprasu:2535: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
T04canprasu:2536: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭhupadeśita yukti jinena // iti //
T04canprasu:2538: yathā hi dīpo layane cirasya kṛto hi gehe puruṣeṇa kenacit /
T04canprasu:2539: tatrāndhakārasya na bhoti evaṃ cirasthito nāhamito gamiṣye //
T04canprasu:2540: tamondhakārasya na śaktirasti kṛte pradīpe na vigacchanāya /
T04canprasu:2541: pratītya dīpaṃ ca vinaśyate tama ubhayaṃ pi śūnyaṃ na ca kiṃ ca manyati //
T04canprasu:2542: jñānaṃ tathā ārya pratītya nāsravaṃ ajñāna kleśopacitaṃ vigacchati /
T04canprasu:2543: saṃparka teṣāṃ na kadāci vidyate jñānasya kleśasya ca nityakālam //
T04canprasu:2544: jñānaṃ na kalpeti añānu no bhavet jñānaṃ pratītyaiva vinaśyate tamo /
T04canprasu:2545: bhayaṃ pi agrāhya khapuṣpasaṃnibhaṃ jñānaṃ tathājñānu bhayaṃ pi śūnyam // iti // 12 //
T04canprasu:2551: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ // 13 //
T04canprasu:2557: idānīṃ paramapi yathā notpādayati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2575: tataśca utpanna utpadyate ityucyamāne atītavartamānayorekakālatā syāt /
T04canprasu:2590: viśeṣata etadvaktavyaṃ syāt- asyotpattiṃ pratītya idaṃ nāmotpadyamānaṃ bhavatīti /
T04canprasu:2592: na hi tadutpadyamānaṃ viśeṣato nirdhārayituṃ śakyate idaṃ tadutpadyamānamiti,
T04canprasu:2605: yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ ityādyaviparītaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prakaṭayatā /
T04canprasu:2606: tasya ca tvayā notpadyamānaṃ notpannaṃ nānutpannamityādinā dūṣaṇaṃ vidadhatā tathāgatajananyāḥ pratītyasamutpattimāturvadha evācarita ityalaṃ bhavatā sarvanāstikena tvayeti /
T04canprasu:2609: bhavāneva tu paramagambhīrapratītyasamutpādādhimuktivirahādviparītaṃ tadarthamavadhārya asmākameva adhilayaṃ karoti /
T04canprasu:2610: nanu ca idaṃ pratītyedaṃ bhavatītyevamabhidhānena bhagavatā tathāgatena niḥsvabhāvatvameva sarvadharmāṇāṃ spaṣṭamāveditam / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:2612: yo hi padārtho vidyamānaḥ sa sasvabhāvaḥ svenātmanā svaṃ svabhāvamanapāyinaṃ bimarti /
T04canprasu:2615: iti kṛtvā sasvabhāvabhāvābhyupagame sati kutaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti bhavateva sasvabhāvatāṃ bhāvānāmabhyupagacchatā sarvathā pratītyasamutpāda eva bādhito bhavati /
T04canprasu:2616: tataśca paramadharmabuddhadarśanamapi bādhitaṃ bhavati- yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati,
T04canprasu:2617: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ paśyatītyāgamāt /
T04canprasu:2618: mayā tu yatpratītya bījākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadbhavatyaṅkurākhyaṃ kāryam,
T04canprasu:2619: tacca ubhayamapi śāntaṃ svabhāvavirahitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ pratipādayatā sarvathā bhagavatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pratītyasamutpattimātā dyotitā bhavati / yata evam-
T04canprasu:2627: tathā hi ghaṭotpattiṃ pratītya ghaṭa utpadyamāno bhavati,
T04canprasu:2631: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati // 17 //
T04canprasu:2632: yadi kaścidanutpannaḥ utpādātpūrvaṃ ghaṭo nāma kvacitsaṃvidyeta,
T04canprasu:2633: sa utpattikriyāṃ pratītyotpadyeta na caivaṃ kaścidutpādātpūrvaṃ kvacidasti /
T04canprasu:2647: yadi paṭa utpadyamānaḥ sa kathamutpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhaviṣyatīti atha naivaṃ kiṃcit,
T04canprasu:2649: kathaṃ vā sa utpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhavet?
T04canprasu:2652: api ca / evaṃ na yujyamānāyāmapyutpadyamānasyotpattau bhavato matamabhyupetyocyate-
T04canprasu:2656: idaṃ tu vaktavyam- tamidānīmutpādaḥ katamo 'paraḥ utpādamutpādayiṣyatīti // 18 //
T04canprasu:2657: atha syāt- utpādasyāpara utpādaḥ utpādakaḥ parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:2662: nanvevaṃ sati vinā utpādena utpāda utpadyate ityevaṃ prāpnoti /
T04canprasu:2663: tataśca utpādotpādyānāmapi padārthānāṃ vinaivotpādena utpattirastu bhāvatvādutpādavaditi pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2666: api ca / utpāda ātmānaṃ parāṃścotpādayatītyatra pakṣe dūṣaṇameva na vaktavyamadhunāsmābhiḥ /
T04canprasu:2670: naivāsato naiva sataḥ pratyayo 'rthasya yujyate / iti
T04canprasu:2671: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
T04canprasu:2674: svaparātmānau vā utpādayatītyasyāḥ kalpanāyā nāstyevāvatāra iti kuta etatprasetsyati- utpāda utpadyate,
T04canprasu:2677: kiṃ cānyat- ihāyamutpādaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nirudhyamānasya anityatānugatasya vartamānasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:2683: anirudhyamānasyāpi vināśarahitasya atītānāgatasya bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇasya khapuṣpasyeva nāstyutpāda iti // 21 //
T04canprasu:2684: evaṃ bhāvānāmutpādābhāvaṃ pratipādya ataḥ paraṃ sthitirvicāryate //
T04canprasu:2699: tatra sthitaṃ na tiṣṭhati tatra sthitikriyānirodhāt /
T04canprasu:2704: ihotpādapratiṣedhātko 'sāvanutpannaḥ padārtho yastiṣṭhediti sarvathā nāsti sthitiḥ // 22 //
T04canprasu:2705: api ca / iyaṃ sthitirnirudhyamānasya bhāvasya syādanirudhyamānasya vā?
T04canprasu:2706: ubhayathā ca na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2709: nirudhyamānasya nirodhābhimukhasya tāvadbhāvasya virodhinī sthitirna saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:2710: yaścāpyanirudhyamānaḥ sa bhāva eva na bhavati,
T04canprasu:2712: api ca / jarasā maraṇena ca sarva eva bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamapi na tyajyante /
T04canprasu:2713: yadā caitadevam tadā jarāmaraṇavirodhinyāḥ sthiterbhāveṣu pravṛttyavakāśa eva nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:2715: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // 24 //
T04canprasu:2716: ke hi nāma jarāmaraṇarahitā bhāvā yeṣāṃ sthitiḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:2718: yadi ca, asyāḥ sthiteranyā vā sthitiḥ sthityarthaṃ parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:2721: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
T04canprasu:2724: '; ityādinā yathā utpāda ātmānaṃ na janayati ityuktam,
T04canprasu:2735: asthitā hi ime dharmāḥ sthitiścaiṣāṃ na vidyate /
T04canprasu:2738: lokanāthaṃ viditvaivaṃ samādhiṃ tena jānathā // iti //
T04canprasu:2740: ākāśaniśrita samāruta āpakhandho tanniśritā iya mahī pṛthivī jagacca /
T04canprasu:2741: sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānamevaṃ ākāśathānu kṛta cittama etamartham //
T04canprasu:2756: sā niruddhasya bhāvasya aniruddhasya vā nirudhyamānasya vā syāt /
T04canprasu:2757: tatra niruddhaṃ nirudhyate iti na yuktam,
T04canprasu:2762: tathāpi nirudhyamānaṃ na nirudhyate ityanena saṃbandhaḥ /
T04canprasu:2766: tasmānnāstyeva nirodha iti kutastatsahacāristhityutpādasaṃbhavaḥ syāt? api ca /
T04canprasu:2770: api ca / ayaṃ nirodhaḥ sthitasya vā bhāvasya syādasthitasya vā?
T04canprasu:2777: kiṃ cānyat / yadi iha nirodhaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:2778: sa tayaivāvasthayā tasyā evāvasthāyāḥ syādanyayā vā anyasyā avasthāyāḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:2782: tayaiva tāvatkṣīrāvasthayā saiva kṣīrāvasthā na nirudhyate,
T04canprasu:2794: anyayā vā avasthayā anyāvasthā na nirudhyate,
T04canprasu:2804: api ca / nirodho nāma yadi kaścit syāt,
T04canprasu:2805: sa sato vā bhāvasya syādasato vā / tatra-
T04canprasu:2807: svabhāvādapracyutasya bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:2812: tataśca sato bhāvasya nirodha iti bruvatā bhāvābhāvayorekādhikaraṇatā abhyupagatā bhavati /
T04canprasu:2819: tasmādekatve sati bhāvābhāvayoḥ sa padārtho naiva bhāvo nāpyabhāva iti yujyate /
T04canprasu:2820: athavā, parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāravadekatve sati na hi bhāvaśca nābhāvaścopapadyate /
T04canprasu:2821: evaṃ tāvatsato bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ // 30 //
T04canprasu:2828: tadevamasato bhāvasya nirodho na saṃbhavati, sato 'pi na /
T04canprasu:2832: kiṃ cānyat / yadi nirodho nāma bhāvānāṃ nirodhaka iti kalpyate,
T04canprasu:2833: tasyedānīṃ kimanyo nirodha iṣyate, uta na?
T04canprasu:2835: na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
T04canprasu:2844: atha naṣṭo nāśayati naṣṭe kiṃ nāśyate punaḥ //
T04canprasu:2848: katham? tatra yathā utpāde gaditam- 'anya utpādayatyenam'; ityādi,
T04canprasu:2851: athāvināśo naṣṭo 'yaṃ sarvaṃ naśyatu te tathā //
T04canprasu:2852: iti / tadevaṃ parātmanāpi nirodho na saṃbhavatīti nāsti nirodhasya nirodhaḥ //
T04canprasu:2853: atha manyase- nāstyeva nirodhasya nirodha iti,
T04canprasu:2855: yadi hi nirodhasya nirodho na syāta,
T04canprasu:2857: tadevaṃ yadi vināśasya vināśaḥ parikalpyate tathāpi na yukto vināśaḥ /
T04canprasu:2861: atha syāt- tathāpi evameva vicāre sati vināśo bhavato 'pi na yujyate,
T04canprasu:2868: te ca niḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāmidaṃsatyābhiniveśināṃ vyavahārapathamupayānti
T04canprasu:2869: avicāraprasiddhenaiva nyāyeneti teṣu nāsti yathoditavicārāvatāro 'smākam māyāsvapnagandharvanagarādivattu
T04canprasu:2871: prasiddhimupagatā iti parasparāpekṣayaiva kevalaṃ prasiddhimupagatā bālairabhyupagamyante /
T04canprasu:2883: kuto vināśarahitānāṃ saṃskṛtatvamapīti sarvameva asamañjasaṃ tasya jāyate /
T04canprasu:2884: jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhāntarbhāva varṇayatā bhagavatā nanu sahetukatvaṃ spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ vināśasya /
T04canprasu:2885: jātimātrāpekṣatvāccāsya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'pi sukhasādhya iti sarvaṃ susthaṃ jāyate //
T04canprasu:2886: atha syāt- vināśo hi nāma abhāvaḥ,
T04canprasu:2892: yaśca vidyamānaḥ tasya ca kiṃ hetunā prayojanam?
T04canprasu:2895: api ca / yathā utpādaḥ sahetukaḥ pūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt,
T04canprasu:2903: kiṃ tarhi vināśa eva kriyate iti varṇayāmaḥ /
T04canprasu:2904: nanvevaṃ sati kriyamāṇatvādvināśo 'pi bhāvaḥ prāpnotīti cet,
T04canprasu:2911: cetyāgamāt kathaṃ na sahetuko vināśaḥ? api ca /
T04canprasu:2912: kalpitābhāvalakṣaṇāyāśca śūnyatāyāḥ pareṇa bhāvarūpatāmabhyupagacchatā kathamabhāvasya bhāvatvaṃ nābhyupagataṃ bhavati?
T04canprasu:2917: na saṃskṛtaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau //
T04canprasu:2922: tathāhi kāṭhinyādikaṃ sāsnādikaṃ ca tasya viśeṣalakṣaṇamupadiśyate /
T04canprasu:2928: yadā yathoktena nyāyena utpādasthitibhaṅgā eva niṣiddhāḥ,
T04canprasu:2946: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
T04canprasu:2948: yathā māyādayaḥ svabhāvenānutpannā avidyamānā māyādiśabdavācyā māyādivijñānagamyāśca lokasya,
T04canprasu:2949: evamete 'pi lokaprasiddhimātreṇa utpādādayaḥ svabhāvena avidyamānā api bhagavatā tathāvidhavineyajanānugrahacikīrṣuṇā nirdiṣṭā iti /
T04canprasu:2951: tvaksnāyumāṃsāsthisamucchraye ca utpādya saṃjñāṃ mama patnireṣā /
T04canprasu:2952: mūḍhā hi balā janayanti rāgaṃ striyo na jānanti yathaiva māyām //
T04canprasu:2953: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ sā putra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca paśyati /
T04canprasu:2954: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasthitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
T04canprasu:2955: yathaiva gandharvapuraṃ marīcikā yathaiva māyā supinaṃ yathaiva /
T04canprasu:2956: svabhāvaśūnyā tu nimittabhāvanā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
T04canprasu:2960: eṣa samādhibalī balavanto yo imu jānati śūnyakadharmān // iti // 34 //
T04canprasu:2961: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskṛtaparīkṣā nāma saptamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:2963: atrāha- vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvato vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ,
T04canprasu:2977: syādvijñānādikaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ yadi tasya niṣpādakakarmakārakau syātām /
T04canprasu:2979: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
T04canprasu:2983: tacca karaṇaṃ sadbhūtasya vā kartuḥ parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:2989: tatra sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ kriyāyuktaḥ sadbhūtaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ karma na karotītyekā pratijñā /
T04canprasu:2990: idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kriyākārakarahito 'sadbhutaṃ kriyārahitaṃ karma na karotītyaparā pratijñā // 1 //
T04canprasu:2992: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
T04canprasu:2994: karoti kriyāyukta eva kaścitsadbhūtaḥ kārakavyapadeśaṃ labhate,
T04canprasu:2995: tataśca tasyaivaṃvidhasya kriyāhetukalabdhakārakavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kuryāt /
T04canprasu:2996: kriyābhāvācca yadā kārakaḥ karma na karoti,
T04canprasu:2998: na cākartṛkaṃ karma saṃbhavati bandhyāsūnoriva ghaṭakaraṇamiti / evaṃ tāvat
T04canprasu:2999: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
T04canprasu:3000: iti doṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti /
T04canprasu:3001: idānīṃ sadbhūtamapi karma kārako na karotīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:3002: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ // 2 //
T04canprasu:3004: tasyedānīṃ kriyānibandhanalabdhakarmavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kriyeteti /
T04canprasu:3008: yadā ca na karoti karmaṇo dvitīyakriyābhāvāt, tadā (Pp_76)
T04canprasu:3009: akarmaka eva avidyamānakarmaka eva tasya karmaṇaḥ kārakaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:3012: evaṃ sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti iti saṃsādhya idānīṃ yathā asadbhūtamapi karma asadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:3016: kriyā ca kārakavyapadeśe heturiti kriyārahita kārako 'pi nirhetukaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:3018: sati ca ahetukavādābhyupagame kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca sarvamapoditaṃ syādityāha-
T04canprasu:3019: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
T04canprasu:3020: satyeva hi hetorabhyupagame hetunā yanniṣpādyate tat kāryam,
T04canprasu:3021: tasya ca yo niṣpādakaḥ tatkāraṇamiti yujyate /
T04canprasu:3027: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
T04canprasu:3029: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate // 4 //
T04canprasu:3032: kasyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ kumbhakārasya svātantryātkartṛtvaṃ syāt?
T04canprasu:3033: na cāpi mṛdāṃ tādātmyapravṛttyā sādhakatamatvena karaṇatvaṃ yujyata iti evaṃ tāvat-
T04canprasu:3034: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
T04canprasu:3037: iha yadā devadattaḥ prāṇātipātaviratikriyāsvātantryātkartā san svatantrakāryeṇa karaṇabhūtena prāṇātipātaviratikriyāṃ karoti,
T04canprasu:3039: evaṃ daśasvapi kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu kuśalakriyāniṣpādyeṣu ratnatrayamātāpitṛtadanyapūjyapūjādilakṣaṇeṣu ca kuśaladharmaprārambheṣu yojyam /
T04canprasu:3040: evamadharme 'pi prāṇātipātādilakṣaṇe kuśalaviparyayeṇa kriyākartṛkaraṇānāmabhāve sati karmaṇāmabhāvaprasaṅga udbhāvanīyaḥ //
T04canprasu:3043: dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate // 5 //
T04canprasu:3052: yadi ca mokṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ phalaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:3061: tā api sarvāḥ phalābhāve sati nopapadyanta iti /
T04canprasu:3065: saddhiḥ asadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ karma karotīti pakṣo nikṛṣṭa eveti tyājyaḥ // 6 //
T04canprasu:3070: tat sadasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karotīti / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:3072: ekaḥ padārthaḥ ekasmin kāle kriyāyuktaścākriyāyuktaśceti na yujyata evaitat /
T04canprasu:3073: tataśca sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti,
T04canprasu:3075: evaṃ same pakṣe dūṣaṇamudbhāvya viṣamapakṣasyāpi nirācikīrṣayā āha-
T04canprasu:3076: satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat /
T04canprasu:3078: satā sadbhūtena tāvatkartrā kriyāyuktena asadbhūtamasadakriyāyuktaṃ karma na kriyate / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:3079: sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi // 8 //
T04canprasu:3080: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
T04canprasu:3081: ityevaṃ tāvat sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti,
T04canprasu:3083: asadbhūtaṃ hi karma ahetukaṃ bhavet / tataśca-
T04canprasu:3084: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
T04canprasu:3087: yathā caitat satā kartrā asatkarma na kriyate iti pratipāditam,
