T04canprasu:3088: evamasatā kartrā akriyāyuktena satkarma na kriyate iti vyākhyeyamuktapathānusāreṇa // 8 //
T04canprasu:3089: evaṃ tāvadviṣamapakṣe ekaikapadaparāmarśena dūṣaṇamabhidhāya idānīmekaikasya padasya padadvaya parāmarśena dūṣaṇābhidhānamāha-
T04canprasu:3092: sa kārakaḥ sadbhūtaḥ asadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtameva vā na karotīti /
T04canprasu:3102: evaṃ tāvatsadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhutaṃ ca karma na karoti // 9 //
T04canprasu:3103: idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtaṃ ca karma na karotītyāha-
T04canprasu:3109: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ /
T04canprasu:3110: iti prasaṅgāt sadbhūtaṃ karma na kriyate /
T04canprasu:3114: idānīṃ sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ ekaika evobhayarūpaḥ san yathā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ ca bhinnasaṃketaṃ karma na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:3119: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ /
T04canprasu:3123: yataścaivaṃ samapakṣeṣu viṣamapakṣeṣu ca kartuḥ karmaṇaśca sarvathā siddhirayuktā,
T04canprasu:3124: tasmādyaduktaṃ vidyanta eva vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ taddhetukakarmakārakasadbhāvāditi,
T04canprasu:3126: atrāha- kimavadhāritametadbhavatā na santi bhāvā iti? na hi /
T04canprasu:3127: bhavatastu sasvabhāvavādinaḥ svabhāvasya bhāvānāṃ vaidhuryātsarvabhāvāpavādaḥ saṃbhāvyate /
T04canprasu:3132: yadi nāstīti tattoyaṃ gṛhṇīyānmūḍha eva saḥ //
T04canprasu:3134: nāstīti cāpi moho 'yaṃ sati mohe na mucyate //
T04canprasu:3136: yadā na labhate bhāvamevābhāvastadā kuha // iti // 11 //
T04canprasu:3139: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
T04canprasu:3142: iha akurvāṇasya karmanirapekṣasya kārakatvābhāvāt karmāpekṣya kārakasya kārakatvaṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:3144: taṃ kārakaṃ pratītya karma pravartate ityevaṃ karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ muktvā nānyatsiddhikāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ // 12 //
T04canprasu:3152: sā ca svasādhanaṃ kartāramupādātāraṃ karma copādānaṃ saṃnidhāpayati /
T04canprasu:3153: tayośca upādeyopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣayoḥ karmakārakavadeva siddhirna svābhāvikī /
T04canprasu:3154: kasmātpunaḥ svābhāvikī na bhavati ityāha- vyutsargāditi karmaṇaḥ,
T04canprasu:3158: tataśca ayamartha upapadyate- yaireva hetubhiḥ karmaṇaśca vyutsargo 'smābhiruktaḥ,
T04canprasu:3159: taireva hetubhiḥ upādātā upādeyaṃ ca pratiṣiddhaṃ veditavyam /
T04canprasu:3160: na ca kevalamanayoranyonyāpekṣikī siddhiḥ katurśca karmaṇaśca pratiṣedhenāvaseyā, api ca
T04canprasu:3165: teṣāṃ kartṛkarmavicāreṇa svabhāvato 'stitvaṃ pratiṣidhya parasparāpekṣikīmeva siddhi prājño nirmumukṣurjātijarāmaraṇādibandhanebhyo mokṣāya vibhāvayet //
T04canprasu:3167: nanu ca śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayedityanenaiva upādānopādānnoradhigatatvādupādānopādānaṃ punarayuktam /
T04canprasu:3170: tathā hi uttareṣu prakaraṇeṣu bhūyasā anayoreva vicāro bhaviṣyatīti /
T04canprasu:3172: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike /
T04canprasu:3173: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam //
T04canprasu:3174: na ca kāraku kāraṇaṃ santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ /
T04canprasu:3175: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ //
T04canprasu:3177: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena //
T04canprasu:3178: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ /
T04canprasu:3179: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ // iti // 13 //
T04canprasu:3180: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmakārakaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:3187: yasya upādātuḥ darśanaśravaṇaghrāṇarasanādīni vedanāsparśamanaskārādīni ca bhavanti,
T04canprasu:3188: sa upādātā pūrvamebhya upādānebhyo 'stīti sāṃmitīyā vadanti // 1 //
T04canprasu:3192: iha vidyamāna eva devadatto dhanopādānaṃ kurute nāvidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ /
T04canprasu:3193: evaṃ yadi tāvatpudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ vyavasthito na syāt,
T04canprasu:3195: tasmādasti asau dhanātprāgeva sthitadevadattavat darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo yo 'sya upādānaṃ kariṣyatīti // 2 //
T04canprasu:3198: yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ // 3 //
T04canprasu:3204: yaśca svakāraṇanirapekṣaḥ sa nirhetuko dhanādinirapekṣaḥ dhanikavannāstītyabhiprāyaḥ // 3 //
T04canprasu:3207: amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ // 4 //
T04canprasu:3208: yadi manyase- darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo nāmāsti,
T04canprasu:3210: nanvevaṃ sati nirastasaṃśayamamūnyapi darśanādīni vinā pudgalena bhaviṣyanti /
T04canprasu:3211: tathāhi devadatto dhanasaṃbandhātpūrvaṃ dhanavyatirikto vyavasthitaḥ san arthāntarabhūtameva pṛthaksiddhaṃ dhanamupādatte /
T04canprasu:3217: tena ca kāryeṇa kiṃcit kāraṇamabhivyajyate bījākhyam- asyedaṃ kāraṇamidamasya kāryamiti /
T04canprasu:3220: tadānīṃ syātparasparāpekṣayorupādānopādātroḥ siddhiḥ yadā tu upādātāraṃ vinā pṛthak siddhaṃ darśanādikamabhyupagamyate,
T04canprasu:3222: iti na yuktametat- darśanādibhyaḥ pṛthagavasthita upādāteti // 5 //
T04canprasu:3224: yadi sarvebhyo darśanādibhya prāgavasthita ityabhyupagataṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:3233: ucyate / etadapi na yuktaṃ darśanādirahitasya nirupādānasya nirhetukasya nirañjanasyāstitvāsaṃbhavāt /
T04canprasu:3234: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
T04canprasu:3237: yo hi sarvebhyaḥ pūrvo na bhavati,
T04canprasu:3239: tadyathā sarvebhyo vṛkṣebhya prāg vanaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:3241: sarvāsāṃ ca sikatānāṃ tailajananābhāve sati ekaikasyā api sikatāyāstailaṃ nāsti /
T04canprasu:3244: nanu sa sarvebhyo 'pi pūrvaṃ evetyabhyupagataṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:3248: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
T04canprasu:3251: na ca yuktaṃ vaktuṃ sa eva draṣṭā sa eva śroteti /
T04canprasu:3252: yadi syāt, tadā darśanakriyārahitasyāpi śroturdraṣṭṭatvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:3254: na caivaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yaddarśanakriyārahito 'pi draṣṭā syāt,
T04canprasu:3257: iti / pratikriyaṃ ca kārakabhedātkuta etadevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratipādayannāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyata iti //
T04canprasu:3258: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- ekatve hi ātmanaḥ indriyāntaragamanaprasaṅgaḥ puruṣasya syāt,
T04canprasu:3260: asya ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- sarvagatasyātmano nendriyāntaragamanamastītyayuktaḥ prasaṅgadoṣa iti /
T04canprasu:3269: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet // 9 //
T04canprasu:3270: tadyathā goranyo 'śvaḥ na hi gavi sati na bhavati yaugapadyena,
T04canprasu:3275: evaṃ sati bahava evātmānaḥ prāpnuvanti draṣṭṭaśrotṛvedakādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthak siddhayupagamāt /
T04canprasu:3276: tasmādekaikasmādapi darśanādeḥ pūrvaṃ nāsti pudgalo nāma kaścit // 9 //
T04canprasu:3277: atrāha- vidyata eva pūrvaṃ sa sarvebhyo darśanādibhya ātmā /
T04canprasu:3280: iha darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni santi yataḥ kramānnāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamiti darśanaśravaṇādīnyutpadyante
T04canprasu:3285: teṣvapi mahābhūtopādānanimittako 'pyeṣa na yujyate pūrveṇaiva hetunetyabhiprāyaḥ /
T04canprasu:3308: na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi // 11 //
T04canprasu:3309: yasya darśanādīni parikalpyante sa yadā nāstītyuktam,
T04canprasu:3310: nanu tadaiva darśanādikamapi nāstīti spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:3328: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca /
T04canprasu:3340: yaścaivamātmā darśanādibhyaḥ prāk paścād yugapacca parīkṣyamāṇo nāsti,
T04canprasu:3341: tasya idānīmanupalabdhasvabhāvasya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā kaḥ parikalpayetprājñaḥ?
T04canprasu:3342: tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣā siddhirna svābhāvikīti sthitam //
T04canprasu:3344: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
T04canprasu:3345: supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate //
T04canprasu:3346: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
T04canprasu:3348: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā /
T04canprasu:3349: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato //
T04canprasu:3350: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
T04canprasu:3351: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
T04canprasu:3352: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
T04canprasu:3353: na ca dṛṣṭisthānagatiśuddhiriha na ca sattvacārasupaśāntagati //
T04canprasu:3354: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā /
T04canprasu:3355: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣamitā paramā //
T04canprasu:3356: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvaparīkṣā nāma navamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:3358: atrāha- yadidamuktaṃ tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātrorapi na svābhāvikī siddhiriti,
T04canprasu:3371: yadi agnīndhane eva syātām, na tu staḥ /
T04canprasu:3373: niyataṃ te ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā?
T04canprasu:3380: tatra yadi tāvad yadindhanaṃ sa evāgniriti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:3388: na hi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭastannirapekṣo na dṛṣṭaḥ /
T04canprasu:3390: api ca / yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadānīm-
T04canprasu:3395: evaṃ ca sati akarmaka eva syāt // 2 //
T04canprasu:3413: evaṃ ca sati akarmako 'gniḥ kartā syāt /
T04canprasu:3419: ihānyatve 'pi sati agnīndhanayorna vinaiva indhanena agnerastitvam /
T04canprasu:3442: tadā kutaḥ kasyacijjvālāparigatiriti sa eva doṣo na vepate // 4 //
T04canprasu:3445: anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ /
T04canprasu:3458: anyo na prāpsyati na dhakṣyati na ca nirvāsyati svaliṅgavāṃśca sthāsyati /
T04canprasu:3466: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā // 6 //
T04canprasu:3477: te ca na saṃbhavantīti na yuktametadanyatve sati prāptirastīti // 7 //
T04canprasu:3500: tasmānnāsti atra kiṃcitpūrvasiddhaṃ yadapekṣya itarasya siddhi syāt // 8 //
T04canprasu:3505: evaṃ tarhi siddhasya sato 'gneḥ punarapi sādhanaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:3507: na hi avidyamāno devadatto gṛhe kaṃcidapekṣate /
T04canprasu:3511: tadā ca kimasya indhanasyāpekṣayā punaḥ kartavyam?
T04canprasu:3531: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ // 10 //
T04canprasu:3532: tatra yadi yaḥ agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ yamindhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
T04canprasu:3534: sa yadi tameva agnyākhyaṃ padārthamapekṣya sidhyati,
T04canprasu:3536: yadā ca agnyabhāve sati indhanasya siddhireva nāsti,
T04canprasu:3538: evaṃ ya indhanākhyo bhāvaḥ yamagnyākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
T04canprasu:3541: kathyatāṃ kimidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ iti /
T04canprasu:3542: yadā hi indhanābhāve sati agneḥ siddhirnāsti,
T04canprasu:3548: yo hi agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ indhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
T04canprasu:3549: saḥ asiddho vā indhanamapekṣate siddho vā?
T04canprasu:3554: na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyate vaiyarthyāt /
T04canprasu:3563: yathā ca agnirapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā indhanaṃ saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:3568: ye vayaṃ brūmaḥ- yasmādagninā idhyamānamindhanaṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyate,
T04canprasu:3586: idameva tāvatsaṃpradhāryate- kiṃ punarmūlodakādīnāmabhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kriyata iti /
T04canprasu:3587: tatra svarūpaṃ tāvanna kriyate vidyamānatvāt abhivyaktiḥ kriyata iti cet,
T04canprasu:3593: api ca iyamabhivyaktirabhivyaktasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeta anabhivyaktasya vā?
T04canprasu:3598: athāpi syāt- vidyamānasyaiva pratyayaiḥ sthaulyaṃ kriyate iti,
T04canprasu:3599: evamapi yadeva sthaulyaṃ pūrvaṃ nāstīti tadeva kriyata iti kutaḥ sthaulyāpādanamabhivyaktiḥ?
T04canprasu:3600: saukṣmyasya ca nirhetukasyāsaṃbhavāt kasya sthūlatāpādanādabhivyaktiḥ syāditi /
T04canprasu:3601: tadevaṃ sarvathā indhane agnerna saṃbhava iti indhane 'gnirna vidyate /
T04canprasu:3602: na cāvidyamānāgninā indhanasya dahanamupajāyate ityasatyamevaitadupalabhate bhavān /
T04canprasu:3603: api ca / yathā pūrvaṃ gatāgatagamyamānānāṃ dūṣaṇamuktam-
T04canprasu:3605: agninā indhanaṃ dahyamānamupalabhyate ityatra indhanaprastāve śeṣaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ gamyamānagatāgatadūṣaṇena veditavyam,
T04canprasu:3607: dagdhaṃ na dahyate tāvadadagdhaṃ naiva dahyate /
T04canprasu:3624: indhanamasyāsmin vā vidyata iti vyatirekeṇa vā vyutpādena avyatirekeṇa vā /
T04canprasu:3634: yathā cāgniḥ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:3643: tadasyātmana upādānasya ca yaḥ kramaḥ siddhiḥ,
T04canprasu:3645: kaḥ punaḥ sarvasya niravaśeṣasya ca bhedaḥ?
T04canprasu:3647: sarve ete pañcāpi pakṣāḥ agnīndhanavadātmopādānayorapyavikalā ḍhaukanīyāḥ /
T04canprasu:3649: tena niravaśeṣeṇa ātmopādānayoḥ pratiṣedho veditavyaḥ ityanena sarvātmanā pratiṣedhasāmyamagnīndhanābhyāmātmopādānayorveditavyamityupadarśanārthaṃ sarvo nirava śeṣeṇetyāha /
T04canprasu:3656: yata evaṃ pañcasu prakāreṣu ātmano na sattvam,
T04canprasu:3662: ghaṭādayo hi kāryakāraṇabhūta avayavāvayavibhūtā lakṣaṇalakṣyabhūtā guṇnaguṇibhūtā vā syuḥ /
T04canprasu:3670: tadevaṃ karmakārakavadātmopādānayorghaṭādīnāṃ ca parasparāpekṣikyāṃ siddhau vyavasthitāyāṃ
T04canprasu:3673: ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
T04canprasu:3675: tatra saha tena vartata iti satat,
T04canprasu:3685: evaṃ yena kāraṇena mṛdādinā ghaṭaḥ prajñapyate,
T04canprasu:3687: evamātmano bhāvānāṃ ca satattvaṃ ye varṇayanti,
T04canprasu:3688: na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādastha śāśvatocchedarahitasya upādāyaprajñaptyabhidhānasya tattvaṃ paśyanti /
T04canprasu:3698: evaṃ ca agnīndhanaparīkṣayā adhigatadharmatattvaparamasya yoginaḥ kalpenākālālipsitairapi naiva vapurdahyate rāgadveṣamohahutāśanairapi vā iti
T04canprasu:3700: yatha gagaṇu na jātu dagdhapūrvaṃ subahubhi kalpaśatairhi dahyamānam /
T04canprasu:3701: gaganasama vijānamāna dharmān so 'pi na dahyati jātu sāgnimadhye //
T04canprasu:3702: sarvi hi jvalamāṇi buddhakṣetre praṇidhi karoti samādhiye sthihitvā /
T04canprasu:3703: jvalata ayu praśāmyatāmaśeṣa pṛthivi vinaśyipi naivasyānyathātvam //
T04canprasu:3705: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāmu trayebhi saṃgatiḥ /
T04canprasu:3706: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtu kārya laghū nirudhyate //
T04canprasu:3707: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta ayamāgatu kutra yāti vā /
T04canprasu:3708: vidiśo diśa sarvi mārgato nāgatirnāsya gatiśca labhyati //
T04canprasu:3709: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya ādhyātmika śūnya bāhirāḥ /
T04canprasu:3711: imu īdṛśa dharmalakṣaṇā buddha dīpaṃkaradarśane tvayā //
T04canprasu:3712: anubuddha yatha tvayātmanā tatha bodhehi sadevamānuṣān //
T04canprasu:3716: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau agnīndhanaparīkṣā nāma daśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:3721: kasya pañcagatike ājavaṃjavībhāvena janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt?
T04canprasu:3722: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraḥ iti /
T04canprasu:3723: avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ tṛṣṇāgaṇḍurabaddhānāṃ saṃsaratāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyata iti /
T04canprasu:3734: yadi hi saṃsāro nāma kaścit syāt,
T04canprasu:3738: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti /
T04canprasu:3741: saṃsāra eva nāstīti nanu spaṣṭamādeśayāmāsa bhagavān /
T04canprasu:3746: atredaṃ vicāryate- yadi pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca saṃsārasya niṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā,
T04canprasu:3747: kathaṃ punaridamāha- tasmāttarhi saṃsārakṣayāya pratipatsyāmaha ityevaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam, iti? ucyate /
T04canprasu:3750: teṣāṃ tu lokottaramārgajñānāgninā dagdhāśeṣakleśavāsanāmūlaniḥśeṣapādapānāṃ bhavatyeva antaḥ iti vijñeyam //
T04canprasu:3754: yathā bījasya dṛṣṭo 'nto na cādistasya vidyate /
T04canprasu:3756: sa ca antopadeśo laukika eva vyavahāre sthitvā saṃsāracārakāvabaddhānāmutsāhanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ deśito laukikajñānāpekṣayā /
T04canprasu:3760: atrāha- yadyevaṃ laukikajñānāpekṣayā antavad ādirapi kiṃ nocyate? ucyate /
T04canprasu:3761: ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgāt laukikajñānāpekṣayāpi saṃsārasyāderabhāva ityubhayathāpyāderabhāva eveti vijñeyam // 1 //
T04canprasu:3762: atrāha- yadyāpi avarāgre na staḥ saṃsārasya,
T04canprasu:3770: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
T04canprasu:3782: ata eva saṃsārābhāvājjātijarāmaraṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparasahakramā api naiva santītyāha-
T04canprasu:3791: jarāmaraṇarahitasya bhāvasya jātau parikalpyamānāyāmanyatra amṛtasyaiva devadattasya prathamamiha jātiḥ parikalpyamānā syāt /
T04canprasu:3796: atha syāt- āmrādīnāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ vināpi jarāmaraṇasaṃbandhāt prathamameva utpādo dṛṣṭaḥ,
T04canprasu:3800: āmrādīnāmapi hi svabījanirodhe samutpadyamānatvāt nānyatrāvinaṣṭānāmutpāda iti samametat pūrveṇa //
T04canprasu:3805: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
T04canprasu:3819: yatha ukkhitte loḍhammi ukkheve atthi kāraṇaṃ /
T04canprasu:3820: ṣaḍane kāraṇaṃ ṇatthi aṇṇaṃ ukkhevakāraṇā // iti /
T04canprasu:3824: jātihetukatvāccāsyodgamanameva vināśasya heturiti kṛtvā eṣāpi gāthā sunītā bhavati-
T04canprasu:3826: sa bhāva eva dhammāṇaṃ yaṃ vibhonti samuggatā //
T04canprasu:3835: na caivaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ yajjāyamāna eva mriyate iti /
T04canprasu:3838: na hi sahabhūtayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayoranyonyahetukatā dṛṣṭeti na yuktametat // 5 //
T04canprasu:3841: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim // 6 //
T04canprasu:3842: yasyāṃ jātau yatra jarāmaraṇe ete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ na santi,
T04canprasu:3847: evamavidyamāneṣu jātyādiṣu tāṃ jātibhavidyamānāṃ bālāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti tacca jarāmaraṇaṃ yanna saṃvidyate?
T04canprasu:3851: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
T04canprasu:3852: vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana // 7 //
T04canprasu:3853: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
T04canprasu:3855: tatra yadi pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paścātkāryaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:3862: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya vyākhyānena kāryakāraṇādikaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam,
T04canprasu:3864: teṣāmapi pūrvā koṭirna vidyata iti yojyam //
T04canprasu:3865: ata eva āryaratnameghasūtre āryasarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇā mahābodhisattvena bhagavān stutaḥ-
T04canprasu:3869: ādita śūnya anāgata dharmā no gata asthita sthānaviviktāḥ /
T04canprasu:3870: nityamasāraka māyasabhāvāḥ śuddha viśuddha nabhopama sarvi //
T04canprasu:3871: yaṃ ca pabhāṣati dharma jinasya taṃ ca na paśyati so 'kṣayatāya /
T04canprasu:3872: ādinirātma nisattvimi dharmāstāṃśca ca pabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti /
T04canprasu:3873: kalpita buccati kalpitamātraṃ antu na labhyati saṃsaramāṇe /
T04canprasu:3874: koṭi alakṣaṇa yā puri āsīdeti anāgati pratyayatāye //
T04canprasu:3875: karma kriyā ca pravartati evaṃ hīnautkṛṣṭatayā samudenti /
T04canprasu:3876: jaḍḍaka dharma sadā prakṛtīye śūnya nirātma vijānatha sarvān //
T04canprasu:3878: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvāparakoṭiparīkṣā nāmaikādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:3884: tena ca duḥkhena kasyacidbhavitavyaṃ na nirāśrayeṇeti,
T04canprasu:3885: ato vidyata eva duḥkhasyāśrayaḥ, sa cātmeti /
T04canprasu:3888: taddhi bhavet svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā parakṛtaṃ vā ubhayakṛtaṃ vā heturahitaṃ vā /
T04canprasu:3889: sarvathā ca iṣyamāṇaṃ tatkāryameva nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:3891: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate // 1 //
T04canprasu:3892: tatraike vādinaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ /
T04canprasu:3896: sarvathā ca tadduḥkhamiṣyamāṇaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na yujyate,
T04canprasu:3899: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet /
T04canprasu:3901: yasmādimān maraṇāntikān skandhān pratītya ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā utpadyante tasmātsvayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti nopapadyate // 2 //
T04canprasu:3902: idānīṃ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:3904: yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
T04canprasu:3906: yadā amībhyo maraṇāntikebhyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā anye syuḥ,
T04canprasu:3907: ebhyo vā aupapattyāṃśikebhyaḥ amī maraṇāntikā skandhāḥ pare syuḥ,
T04canprasu:3911: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
T04canprasu:3912: na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // iti /
T04canprasu:3915: tadā sati anyatve etaiḥ parabhūtaiḥ skandhairamī parabhūtāḥ kṛtā iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:3918: atha syāt- na brūmo yasmādduḥkhenaiva duḥkhaṃ kṛtam,
T04canprasu:3922: ityataḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti brūmaḥ / ucyate-
T04canprasu:3924: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // 4 //
T04canprasu:3925: yadetanmanuṣyaduḥkhaṃ pañcopādānaskandhalakṣaṇaṃ svayaṃ pudgalena kṛtamiti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:3926: kalpyatāmasau pudgalo yena tadduḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam /
T04canprasu:3930: athāpi manuṣyaduḥkhopādānena pudgalena tadeva duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:3936: evaṃ tāvat svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavati // 4 //
T04canprasu:3942: tasmāttasya pudgalasya tadduḥkhaṃ parapudgalajameva bhavati / ucyate-
T04canprasu:3944: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ // 5 //
T04canprasu:3946: tena ca manuṣyapudgalena tadduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā parasmai devapudgalāya pradīyata iti sa devapudgalo devaduḥkhavinirmuktaḥ kuto yasmai pradīyeteti
T04canprasu:3947: evaṃ tāvadaparapudgalajasya duḥkhasya pratigrāhaka eva nāsti // 5 //
T04canprasu:3951: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat // 6 //
T04canprasu:3953: sa manuṣyopādānavyatiriktaḥ katamo yo devapudgalāya devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā praheṣyati?
T04canprasu:3957: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam // 7 //
T04canprasu:3962: tataḥ svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddheryadā manuṣyapudgalena svayaṃ tadduḥkhaṃ na kṛtam,
T04canprasu:3963: tadā kutaḥ parapudgalasya devākhyasya tadduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
T04canprasu:3966: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam /
T04canprasu:3968: itaśca svaparābhyāṃ duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ na yujyate,
T04canprasu:3976: sa eva tāvannātmanā kṛto nātmanā niṣpannaḥ tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt /
T04canprasu:3978: sa kathamavidyamānasvabhāvaḥ san paraṃ kariṣyatīti na yuktametat // 8 //
T04canprasu:3981: yadi hi ekaikena duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ syāt syāttadānīmubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkham /
T04canprasu:3983: na caikaikena prāṇātipāte kṛte dvābhyāṃ kṛta iti vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ //
T04canprasu:3991: tadidānīṃ kuta eva nirhetukaṃ bhaviṣyati khapuṣpasaugandhyavat?
T04canprasu:3994: evaṃ bāhyā api bījāṅkuraghaṭapaṭādayo bhāvā veditavyāḥ,
T04canprasu:3996: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
T04canprasu:4001: tatkatamena tarhi idānīṃ prakāreṇa eṣāṃ siddhiriti /
T04canprasu:4004: niyatameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ prakārāṇāmanyatamena prakāreṇa siddhiḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:4008: mṛgyate, tadā karmakārakaparīkṣāprakaraṇavihitavidhinā yathoditapakṣacatuṣṭayatiraskāreṇa idaṃpratyayatāmātrārthapratītyasamutpādasiddhayā siddhirabhyupeyā / yathoktam-
T04canprasu:4010: tārkikairiṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam // iti //
T04canprasu:4013: saṃvṛti bhāṣitu dharma jinena saṃskṛta 'saṃskṛta paśyatha eva /
T04canprasu:4014: nāstiha bhūtatu ātma naro vā ettaku lakṣaṇa sarvajagasya //
T04canprasu:4015: kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam /
T04canprasu:4016: no 'pi tu saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti //
T04canprasu:4017: sarvi bhavā alikā vasikāśca riktaka tucchaka phenasamāśca /
T04canprasu:4018: māyamarīcisamā sada śūnyā deśituḥ saṃvṛtu te ca viviktāḥ //
T04canprasu:4020: evimu saṃskṛta sarvi vijāna māyamarīcisamaṃ jagu sarvam //
T04canprasu:4022: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau duḥkhaparīkṣā nāma dvādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:4024: yataścaivaṃ samanantarātikrāntaprakaraṇavidhinā svaparobhayakṛtatvamahetusamutpanatvaṃ ca nirūpyamāṇaṃ bhāvānāmasat,
T04canprasu:4026: utpannarūpatvena caite bhāvā avidyātimiropahatamatinayanānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ khyānti,
T04canprasu:4027: tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāṃ visaṃvādakā māyākarituragādivat tadanabhijñānāṃ na tu vijñānām /
T04canprasu:4031: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā // 1 //
T04canprasu:4032: sūtre uktam- tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadidaṃ saṃskṛtam /
T04canprasu:4033: etaddhi khalu bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yadidamamoṣadharma nirvāṇam /
T04canprasu:4038: tadanena nyāyena yanmoṣadharma tanmṛṣetyevaṃ yasmāduktavāṃstathāgato bhagavān,
T04canprasu:4040: tasmānmoṣadharmakatvena te saṃskārā mṛṣā bhavanti citrakarayantradārikāvat,
T04canprasu:4043: ato niḥsvabhāvatvena mṛṣā sarvasaṃskārāḥ moṣadharmakatvāt marīcikādijalavat /
T04canprasu:4046: tataśca vihitayā upapattyā asmāccāgamāt siddhaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam /
T04canprasu:4047: śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena iti ca prajñāpāramitā- ardhaśatikāpāṭhāt // 1 //
T04canprasu:4048: atrāha- yadyevaṃ moṣadharmakatvena sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavatā,
T04canprasu:4049: nanvevaṃ sati na santi sarve bhāvā iti sarvapadārthāpavādinī mithyādṛṣṭireva syāt /
T04canprasu:4054: tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
T04canprasu:4067: tanna bhāvānāmabhāvaparidīpakam kiṃ tarhi śūnyatāparidīpakam svabhāvānutpādaparidīpakamityarthaḥ /
T04canprasu:4069: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto no tasya utpādu sabhāvato 'sti /
T04canprasu:4070: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
T04canprasu:4079: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt,
T04canprasu:4084: asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ // 3 //
T04canprasu:4087: na ca asati dharmiṇi tadāśrito dharma upapadyate /
T04canprasu:4088: na hi asati vandhyātanaye tacchayāmatopapadyata iti /
T04canprasu:4097: iha yo dharmo yaṃ padārthaṃ na vyabhicarati,
T04canprasu:4100: agnerauṣṇyaṃ hi loke tadavyabhicāritvāt svabhāva ityucyate /
T04canprasu:4105: evaṃ bhāvānāṃ sati svabhāvābhyupagame 'nyathātvameva na saṃbhavet /
T04canprasu:4108: api ca / ayamanyathābhāvo bhāvānāṃ naiva saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:4113: yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate // 5 //
T04canprasu:4114: tasyaiva tāvat prāgvat prāgavasthāyāṃ vartamānasya bhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nopapadyate /
T04canprasu:4115: tathā hi yūno yuvāvasthāyāmeva vartamānasya nāsti anyathātvam /
T04canprasu:4124: kiṃ hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ kuryāt?
T04canprasu:4125: tadāgamanāntareṇa jīrṇatābhāvājjīrṇo jīryata iti na yujyate /
T04canprasu:4135: yadi kṣīraṃ dadhi bhavatīti neṣyate parasparavirodhāt-
T04canprasu:4139: tadevamanyathātvāsaṃbhavāt kutastaddarśanāt sasvabhāvatā bhāvānāṃ prasetsyatīti na yuktametat /
T04canprasu:4141: yo na pi jāyati no cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ /
T04canprasu:4142: taṃ jinu darśayatī narasiṃha tatra nideśayi sattva maharṣī //
T04canprasu:4143: yasya svabhāva na vidyati kaści no 'parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ /
T04canprasu:4144: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ //
T04canprasu:4145: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gatī upapadyati kāci /
T04canprasu:4146: tatra ca vyoharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayasī bahusattvān //
T04canprasu:4147: sarvi vadesi nirātmaka dharmān sattvatu grāhatu mocasi lokam /
T04canprasu:4148: mukta svayaṃ gatito gatimukto tenasi pāragato na ca tīrṇaḥ //
T04canprasu:4149: pāragato 'si bhavārṇavatīrṇaḥ pāragato na ca labhyati kaści /
T04canprasu:4150: pāru na vidyati nāpi apāru pāragato 'smi vadesi ca vākyam //
T04canprasu:4151: vāca na vidyati yāṃ ca vadesi yaṃ pi vadesi na vidyati taṃ pi /
T04canprasu:4152: yasya vadesi na vidyati so 'pi yo 'pi vijānati so 'pi asanto //
T04canprasu:4153: tatra praṇaṣṭu jagaṃ imu sarvaṃ vitathavikalpaniveśavaśena /
T04canprasu:4154: śānta vijānati yo naru dharmāṃ stehi tathāgatu dṛṣṭa svayaṃbhūḥ //
T04canprasu:4155: śānta prajānati dharma praṇītān prīti sa vindati toṣati sattvān /
T04canprasu:4156: so bhavatī jinu jitvena kleśān ātma ............ /
T04canprasu:4157: tena vijānita bodhi jinānāṃ buddhiya bodhayate sa jagaṃ pi /
T04canprasu:4164: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati // 7 //
T04canprasu:4168: iha hi śūnyatā nāmeti sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamityabhyupagamāt aśūnyadharmābhāvādaśūnyataiva nāsti /
T04canprasu:4169: yadā ca aśūnyāḥ padārthā na santi,
T04canprasu:4174: tadātadāśrayā api padārthā na santīti sthitamavikalam // 7 //
T04canprasu:4175: atrāha- trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākhyāni vimuktaye vineyebhyo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni sarvatīrthikasamayāsādhāraṇāni saugata eva pravacane samupalabhyante /
T04canprasu:4176: yeṣāmupadeśārthameva buddhā bhagavanto 'śeṣatīrthyavādamahāmohāndhakārānugatajagati jagadekapradīpā nairātmyopadeśāvicchinnaśikhā utpadyante
T04canprasu:4177: sa bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena idānīṃ tāmeva śūnyatāṃ pratikṣeptumārabdhavān,
T04canprasu:4180: aho vata bhavānatyunmukha iva atyantaviparyāsānnirvāṇapuragāminaṃ śivamṛjuṃ paramaṃ panthānamavadhūya bhāvābhiniveśavyā,
T04canprasu:4181: kulitaṃ saṃsārakāntārānugameva mārgaṃ mokṣapuragāmitvena samāśrito nirmumukṣuḥ san saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ sadbhirupālabhya eva san abhimānābhiniveśagrahapavaraśatayā tānevopālabhate /
T04canprasu:4185: iha sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ sarvagrahābhiniveśānāṃ yaniḥsaraṇamapravṛttiḥ sā śūnyatā /
T04canprasu:4188: tān prati avācakā vayamiti kuto 'smadupadeśāt sakalakalpanāvyāvṛttyā mokṣo bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:4190: sa cet 'dehi bhostadeva mahyaṃ nakiṃcinnāma paṇyam,
T04canprasu:4194: kenedānīṃ sa teṣāṃ tasyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśo niṣidhyatāmiti?
T04canprasu:4195: ato mahābhaiṣajye 'pi doṣasaṃjñitvāt paramacikitsakairmahāvaidyaistathāgataiḥ pratyākhyātā eva te /
T04canprasu:4205: ye hi kāśyapa śūnyatopalambhena śūnyatāṃ pratisaranti,
T04canprasu:4217: tasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya svayaṃ koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret /
T04canprasu:4218: tatkiṃ manyase kāśyapa api tu sa puruṣastato glānyānmukto bhavet?
T04canprasu:4221: yasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret /
T04canprasu:4222: bhagavānāha- evameva kāśyapa sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam /
T04canprasu:4225: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskāraparīkṣā nāma trayodaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:4236: tathā saṃjñā ca vedanā ca saṃsṛṣṭāvetau dharmau nāsaṃsṛṣṭāviti saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ /
T04canprasu:4242: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
T04canprasu:4247: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo nāsti /
T04canprasu:4251: ityevaṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo na bhavati /
T04canprasu:4253: yathā ca draṣṭavyadarśanadraṣṭaṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ sarvaśaśca saṃsargābhāvaḥ,
T04canprasu:4254: evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
T04canprasu:4264: te ete dveṣadviṣṭadveṣaṇīyādinā traidhena śrotraśrotṛśrotavyādinā ca // 2 //
T04canprasu:4270: tadā kṣīrodakayoriva anyena anyasya saṃsargaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:4276: na ca kevalaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitānāṃ draṣṭavyādīnāmanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:4282: iha yadetad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyaditi vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:4288: yacca paṭākhyaṃ vastu anyad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu pratītya anyadbhavati,
T04canprasu:4294: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
T04canprasu:4298: taṃ ca pṛthagbhūtaṃ paṭamapekṣya anyo ghaṭaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:4306: yadi hi etad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyasmādanyat syāt,
T04canprasu:4307: tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu anyasmādapi paṭākhyādṛte anyadbhavet,
T04canprasu:4308: tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet /
T04canprasu:4312: sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate /
T04canprasu:4315: na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam/
T04canprasu:4319: nanu idamapi tadā na saṃbhavati vaktum- yasmādanyatpratītya anyadanyadbhavatīti,
T04canprasu:4323: ata eva anyadityucyate laukike vyavahāre sthitvā /
T04canprasu:4325: yadi tarhi evamapyavidyamāne 'pyanyatve lokasaṃvṛtyā paṭādanyo ghaṭa iti vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:4326: atha kasmād bījāṅkurayorapi evamanyatvaṃ na vyapadiśyate? ucyate /
T04canprasu:4327: naiva hi loko ghaṭapaṭayoriva bījāṅkurayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate,
T04canprasu:4331: yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke- ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti,
T04canprasu:4333: atrāha- yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:4336: kiṃ tarhi iha anyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣo 'sti,
T04canprasu:4337: tadyatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārthāntaranirapekṣayāpi para ityucyate,
T04canprasu:4341: ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā?
T04canprasu:4347: sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva,
T04canprasu:4349: ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:4351: tatra ca anyatvaviruddhamekatvamastīti yataḥ virodhādananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:4352: yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte 'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:4355: tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo 'pi padārtho nāstīti siddham //
T04canprasu:4358: na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati,
T04canprasu:4362: tadā kutaḥ asati anyatve anyadvā tadeva vā bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:4367: iha darśanādīnāṃ yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāstīti pratipāditam,
T04canprasu:4368: tathāpi trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ saṃgatiḥ sparśa iti saṃsargo 'sti /
T04canprasu:4369: tataśca saṃsargasadbhāvād vidyanta eva darśanādaya iti /
T04canprasu:4371: syurevam, yadi teṣāṃ saṃsarga eva syāt /
T04canprasu:4375: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
T04canprasu:4377: sa ekatvena vā parikalpyeta anyatvena vā?
T04canprasu:4379: na hi ekakaṃ kṣīramudakanirapekṣamudakena saṃsṛjyata ityucyate /
T04canprasu:4381: na hi udakātpṛthagavasthitaṃ kṣīramudakena saṃsṛjyata iti kathyate /
T04canprasu:4382: evaṃ darśanādīnāṃ yadi ekatve sati saṃsargaḥ parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:4392: na ca saṃsargamantareṇa saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:4396: yasmādyadā saṃsarga eva nāstīti pratipāditam, asati ca (Pp_113)
T04canprasu:4404: sarvasayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam /
T04canprasu:4406: ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣu rūpa manorama citravicitram /
T04canprasu:4407: yena ca yogasamāśrita cakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci //
T04canprasu:4408: te parinirvṛta laukika śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
T04canprasu:4409: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅga vivarjiya sattva vinenti //
T04canprasu:4410: no pi ca sattva na jīviha kaści sattvahitaṃ ca karonti jinendrāḥ /
T04canprasu:4411: ............. sattvu na asti karonti ca artham //
T04canprasu:4415: bhāvitu mārga pavartitu jñāna śūnyaka dharma nirātmaka sarvi /
T04canprasu:4417: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃsargaparīkṣā nāma caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:4421: iha yannāsti na tasya niṣpādakahetupratyayopādānamasti yathā khapuṣpasya /
T04canprasu:4422: upādīyante ca bījāvidyādayo hetupratyayā aṅkarasaṃskārādīnāṃ niṣpādakāḥ,
T04canprasu:4427: yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:4430: atha syāt- naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo 'sti yato 'sya vidyamānatvādutpattivaiyarthyaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:4431: kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti /
T04canprasu:4434: atha syāt- iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam,
T04canprasu:4435: tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti,
T04canprasu:4437: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
T04canprasu:4439: iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ,
T04canprasu:4441: sa loke naiva svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:4446: tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ- yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt,
T04canprasu:4452: nanu ca gopālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti /
T04canprasu:4454: etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ- nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt /
T04canprasu:4455: avidyāviparyāsānugamāttu loko niḥsvabhāvameva bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvena pratipannaḥ /
T04canprasu:4456: yathā hi (Pp_115) taimirikāḥ timirapratyayādasantameva keśādisvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭāḥ,
T04canprasu:4457: evamavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā bālā niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭā yathābhiniveśaṃ lakṣaṇamācakṣate agnerauṣṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇam
T04canprasu:4459: bālajanaprasiddhayaiva ca bhagavatā tadevaiṣāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamabhidharme vyavasthāpitam /
T04canprasu:4462: tadā vitimiraiḥ taimirikopalabdhakeśādarśanavat bālajanamatiparikalpitānupalabdhasvabhāvairāryaiḥ pura ucyate parahitavyāpāraiḥ,
T04canprasu:4467: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna ca vastu na cālayaḥ /
T04canprasu:4470: svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate mayā sarvadharmā anutpannā ityuktāḥ //
T04canprasu:4472: atrāha- yadi khalu idamagnyāderauṣṇyādikaṃ hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvena kṛtakatvānniḥsvabhāvamityucyate,
T04canprasu:4473: kimidānīṃ tatsvabhāvasya lakṣaṇaṃ kaścāsau svabhāva iti vaktavyam / ucyate-
T04canprasu:4474: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca // 2 //
T04canprasu:4475: iha svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti yasya padārthasya yadātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tattasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate /
T04canprasu:4477: yattu kṛtrimaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā apāmauṣṇyam /
T04canprasu:4478: yacca yasyāyattaṃ tadapi tadātmīyaṃ tadyathā sve bhṛtyāḥ,
T04canprasu:4480: yattu yasya parāyattaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā tāvatkālikāyācitakamasvatantram /
T04canprasu:4481: yataścaivaṃ kṛtrimasya parasāpekṣasya ca svabhāvatvaṃ neṣṭam,
T04canprasu:4482: ata eva auṣṇyamagnerhetupratyayapratibaddhatvātpūrvaṃmabhūtvā paścādutpādena kṛtakatvānna svabhāva iti yujyate /
T04canprasu:4486: yacca hetupratyayasāpekṣaṃ na bhavati apāmauṣṇyavat pārāvāravat dīrghahrasvavadvā,
T04canprasu:4489: na tadasti, na cāpi nāsti svarūpataḥ /
T04canprasu:4491: tathāpi śrotṛṇāmuttrāsaparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā samāropya tadastīti brūmaḥ /
T04canprasu:4493: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
T04canprasu:4497: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate //
T04canprasu:4513: etaduktaṃ bhavati- avidyātimiraprabhāvopalabdhaṃ bhāvajātaṃ yenātmanā vigatāvidyātimirāṇāmāryāṇāmadarśanayogena viṣayatvamupayāti,
T04canprasu:4516: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
T04canprasu:4518: sa caiṣa bhāvānāmanutpādātmakaḥ svabhāva akiṃcittvena abhāvamātratvādasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā nāsti bhāvasvabhāva iti vijñeyam /
T04canprasu:4520: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
T04canprasu:4521: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim //
T04canprasu:4525: tadapratiṣedhāt sati ca parabhāve svabhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:4529: iha svabhāva eva hi loke kaścitsvabhāvāntarāpekṣayā para iti vyapadiśyate /
T04canprasu:4532: yadā tu mumukṣubhirvicāryamāṇasya kasyacitsvabhāva eva nāsti,
T04canprasu:4538: sa ca bhāvo bhavan svabhāvo vā bhavet,
T04canprasu:4542: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati // 4 //
T04canprasu:4543: bhāvo hi parikalpyamānaḥ svabhāvo vā bhavet,
T04canprasu:4558: iha hi yadi bhāvo nāma kaścidabhaviṣyat,
T04canprasu:4560: ghaṭādayo hi vartamānāvasthāyāḥ pracyutāḥ santaḥ anyathābhāvamāpannāḥ abhāvadhvanivācyā bhavanti loke /
T04canprasu:4564: tadevaṃ sarvathā svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāveṣu anupapadyamāneṣu avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītam-
T04canprasu:4565: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
T04canprasu:4566: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane // 6 //
T04canprasu:4575: vartamānāvasthaṃ ca vijñānādikaṃ bhāvatvena ye varṇayanti,
T04canprasu:4577: na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādasya tattvaṃ varṇayanti /
T04canprasu:4581: ata eva buddhānāmeva bhagavatāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇamityupavarṇayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ,
T04canprasu:4583: ata eva ca āptebhyaḥ prahīṇāśeṣadoṣebhya āgatatvāt,
T04canprasu:4585: āmimukhyādgamanādvā tadāśrayeṇa lokasya nirvāṇagamanāt saṃbuddhavacanasyaiva āgamatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T04canprasu:4593: yadbhūyasā kātyāyana ayaṃ loko 'stitāṃ vā abhiniviṣṭo nāstitāṃ ca /
T04canprasu:4606: tena bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā yasmādastitvaṃca nāstitvaṃ ca ubhayametat pratiṣiddham,
T04canprasu:4613: iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamāṃ pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā iti //
T04canprasu:4615: astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
T04canprasu:4616: tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ //
T04canprasu:4617: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /
T04canprasu:4618: vivādaprāptyā na duḥkhaṃ praśāmyati avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // iti /
T04canprasu:4619: atrāha- yadi punarevamagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvata evāstitvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:4623: api ca / yadi ayameṣāmagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:4624: tasya vidyamānasya sato na syāt punaranyathātvamiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:4627: tadā asya svabhāvasya prakṛtyā vidyamānasya punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt / yasmāt-
T04canprasu:4633: evamagnyādīnāmapi prakṛtyā vidyamānānāṃ punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt /
T04canprasu:4636: atrāha- yadi prakṛtyā vidyamānasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavādanyathātvasya ca upalabhyamānatvāt prakṛtireṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāstītyucyate,
T04canprasu:4639: kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:4644: yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate, evamapi-
T04canprasu:4646: kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:4647: tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā anyathātvāsaṃbhava eva /
T04canprasu:4652: tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ parikalpayati,
T04canprasu:4659: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
T04canprasu:4664: pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate /
T04canprasu:4668: nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā bhūdbhāvadarśanābhāvācchāśvatadarśanam,
T04canprasu:4671: yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate,
T04canprasu:4674: sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt /
T04canprasu:4675: viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ- na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti /
T04canprasu:4678: yo hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā paścānna santi rāgadveṣamohabhāvā iti bravīti,
T04canprasu:4683: tasya parikalpitasyāvidyamānatvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamānatvād astitvanāstitvadarśanadvayasyāpi upanipātāt kuto 'ntadvayaparihāraḥ?
T04canprasu:4693: tathāvidhavineyajanabodhānurodhāttu paramārthadarśanasya upāyabhūtatvāt neyārthatvena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāparatantratayā vijñānādivādo deśitaḥ
T04canprasu:4697: yasmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān //
T04canprasu:4699: bhāvābhāvadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo yāvat tāvatsaṃsāra ityavetya mumukṣubhiretaddarśanadvayanirāsena sadbhirmadhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvaditi
T04canprasu:4701: bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvi acintiya sarvi abhūtaṃ /
T04canprasu:4702: ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāḥ te dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu //
T04canprasu:4703: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānatī sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
T04canprasu:4704: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim // iti /
T04canprasu:4706: smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatīta adhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇamuttamaḥ /
T04canprasu:4708: sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarvāṇa dharmāṇabhāva deśayi /
T04canprasu:4709: tadānurūpaṃ kṛta nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñayī //
T04canprasu:4710: devāpi sarve pramumocu śabdaṃ abhāvanāmeti jino bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:4711: yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakraman abhāva dharmāṇa samaṃ prakāśayī //
T04canprasu:4712: buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ /
T04canprasu:4714: yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ /
T04canprasu:4715: tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya ravu niścarī lokavināyakasya // iti /
T04canprasu:4717: na vidyate sattā svabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāmityabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
T04canprasu:4722: sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ / ityādi /
T04canprasu:4724: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau svabhāvaparīkṣā nāma pañcadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:4728: iha saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsṛtiḥ gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāra ityucyate /
T04canprasu:4731: na hi avidyamānānāṃ vandhyāsūnusaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
T04canprasu:4732: tasmāt saṃsārasadbhāvāt vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti /
T04canprasu:4738: sa niyataṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vā bhavet sattvasya vā?
T04canprasu:4741: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
T04canprasu:4742: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // 1 //
T04canprasu:4744: kiṃ te nityāḥ saṃsaranti uta anityāḥ?
T04canprasu:4753: athāpi syāt- anityā eva santo hetuphalasaṃbandhaparaṃparayā avicchinnakramāḥ saṃtānena ca pravartamānāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti /
T04canprasu:4763: uttarasmin kṣaṇe utpanne pūrvaḥ saṃsaratīti cet,
T04canprasu:4768: kiṃ ca ekatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇavācyataiva na syāt /
T04canprasu:4769: na hi eko devadattaḥ ekadā pūrvaścottaraśceti vyapadiśyate /
T04canprasu:4770: evamihāpi ekatvāt pūrvottarakṣaṇavyapadeśa eva na syāt /
T04canprasu:4771: api ca pūrvakṣaṇo naṣṭa iti na syāduttarakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt /
T04canprasu:4792: yadā ca pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā kāryakāraṇavyavasthā ca nāsti,
T04canprasu:4794: tadabhāvānnāsti bhavatāṃ saṃsāra iti anityānāmapi saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti saṃsāra iti //
T04canprasu:4795: atraike varṇayanti- satyaṃ saṃskārā na saṃsaranti utpattividhuratvāt,
T04canprasu:4801: iti vicāryamāṇe ya eva saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇānupapattikramaḥ,
T04canprasu:4804: atrāha- naiva hi sattvasaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsārānupapattikramaḥ samo bhavitumarhati,
T04canprasu:4808: tasmādātmaiva saṃsaratīti na coktadoṣaprasaṅga iti / ucyate-
T04canprasu:4824: ityevaṃ pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati pūrvoditena nyāyena /
T04canprasu:4825: yaścedānīṃ skandhāyatanadhātuṣvevaṃ vicāryamāṇaḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:4833: yadi anupādānasya sato 'sya saṃsāro yuktaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:4834: kathaṃ punarasya anupādānatā prasajyata iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:4836: iha hi manuṣyopādānāddevopādānaṃ gacchan parityajya vā manuṣyopādānaṃ devopādānaṃ gacchedaparityajya vā?
T04canprasu:4838: tadā pūrvopādānasya parityāgāduttarasya cānupādānāttadantarāle vibhavaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:4844: yaśca anupādāno nirañjano 'vyakto nirhetukaḥ, kaḥ saḥ?
T04canprasu:4847: tasmiṃścāsati tadabhāvādeva upādānamapi nirupādātṛkaṃ nāstīti kiṃ saṃsariṣyati?
T04canprasu:4856: pūrvasyāparityāgāduttarasya ca grahaṇād yasmādekasyātmano dvayātmakatā syāt /
T04canprasu:4860: taiśca sopādānatvāt sopādānaṃ saṃsarato 'pi na vibhavatāprasaṅga iti /
T04canprasu:4870: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ yadantarābhavasaṃcāre 'tisāmīpyāt sūkṣmaṃ kālamanupādānaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:4871: na ca sarvātmanā ekasya padārthasya abhinnapadārthasya viṣaye yugapat tyāgopādāne dṛṣṭe /
T04canprasu:4872: na hi ekasya devadattasya sarvātmanā gṛhādgṛhaṃ saṃcarataḥ ekadā tyāgopādānakriye dve saṃbhavataḥ /
T04canprasu:4873: atha ekena pādena ekasya parityāgādaparasya copādānād yugapattyāgopādāne parikalpyete,
T04canprasu:4874: nanu evaṃ sati pādadvayavad dvayātmakatā ātmanaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:4876: tasmād yaugapadyenāpi tyāgopādāne na saṃbhavataḥ ityaparihāra evāyam /
T04canprasu:4877: tasmādantarābhavopādāne 'pi sa eva doṣaprasaṅga iti sarvathā ātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ //
T04canprasu:4894: tat parikalpyamānaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānāṃ vā parikalpyeta anityānāṃ vā?
T04canprasu:4896: anityānāmapi asaṃvidyamānānāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāditi sarvaṃ pūrveṇa tulyam /
T04canprasu:4899: tadapi nityasya vā anityasya vā pūrvavannopapadyate //
T04canprasu:4901: nanvevaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pyātmāstītyabhyupeta bhavati saṃsāra iva /
T04canprasu:4904: na ca nirvāṇe upādānamastīti kuto 'sya avācyatā?
T04canprasu:4906: api tu kimasau nirvāṇe 'sti uta nāsti?
T04canprasu:4907: yadi asti, tadā mokṣe 'pi tasya sadbhāvānnityatā syāt /
T04canprasu:4908: atha nāsti, tadā anitya ātmā syāt /
T04canprasu:4909: tataśca tattvānyatvāvācyatāvannityānityatvenāpi ātmanaḥ avaktavyateti na syāt /
T04canprasu:4913: na tarhi nirupādāno 'sāvātmā nirvāṇe vijñeyatvāt saṃsāra iva /
T04canprasu:4920: buddhadharmā āyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamā ityādi /
T04canprasu:4925: mana evamotarati yena vidu manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam //
T04canprasu:4927: nirodhasatyaṃ supinaṃ yathaiva svapnasvabhāvāmatha nirvṛtiṃ ca /
T04canprasu:4928: yeneha vācottari bodhisattvo ayaṃ khu so vuccati vācasaṃvaraḥ //
T04canprasu:4932: tasmād bandhamokṣasadbhāvād vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti /
T04canprasu:4938: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate // 5 //
T04canprasu:4939: iha ya ime rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ baddhānāmasvatantrīkaraṇe bandhanamiti vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:4940: yaiśca baddhāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ traidhātukaṃ nātikramantīti vyavasthāpyate,
T04canprasu:4941: tadetadrāgādikaṃ bandhanatvena parikalpyamānamudayavyayadharmiṇāṃ tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmutpādānantaradhvaṃsināṃ naṣṭānāmasattvānna saṃbhavati
T04canprasu:4944: yathā ca pūrvoktavidhinā saṃskārāṇāṃ bandhamokṣau na saṃbhavataḥ,
T04canprasu:4945: evaṃ pūrvavadeva sattvo 'pi na badhyate nāpi mucyate,
T04canprasu:4947: atrāha- yadyapi saṃskārāṇāṃ sattvasya vā bandho nāsti,
T04canprasu:4966: yaścaivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaḥ sopādāno nirupādāno vā na badhyate,
T04canprasu:4970: yadā caivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ bandhanaṃ na kaṃcidapi badhnāti,
T04canprasu:4971: tadā kaṃcidapyabadhnata upādānasya rāgādeḥ kuto bandhanatvamiti /
T04canprasu:4976: iha bandhyavyatirekeṇa bandhanaṃ nigaḍādikaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ sat bandhyaṃ devadattaṃ badhnātīti dṛṣṭam /
T04canprasu:4977: evaṃ yadi bandhyebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ pudgalādvā bandhyātpūrvaṃ rāgādikaṃ bandhanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:4978: tena pūrvasiddhena bandhanaṃ syāt saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā /
T04canprasu:4980: pūrvasiddhasya ca bandhanasya paścād bandhyena saha saṃbandhasya niṣprayojanatvāt /
T04canprasu:4981: (Pp_128) bandhyasya ca bandhanātpṛthaksiddhasya pūvabandhanāpekṣāniṣprayojanatvācca nāsti bandhyādbandhanasya pūrvasiddhiḥ /
T04canprasu:4983: na ca kaṃcidapyabadhnato bandhanatvaṃ yuktamiti nāsti bandhanam/
T04canprasu:4989: baddho na badhyate tāvadabaddho naiva badhyate /
T04canprasu:4993: tathāpi saṃsāracārakāgārāvabaddhānāmatrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikaistathāgataiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakarakandhatrayopadeśo yadarthamuktaḥ,
T04canprasu:4999: ihāyaṃ mokṣaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ baddhasya vā parikalpyeta abaddhasya vā?
T04canprasu:5002: baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
T04canprasu:5004: tatra baddhasya mokṣo na saṃbhavati baddhatvāt /
T04canprasu:5005: atha baddhasya paścādupāyena mokṣa iti kṛtvā baddha eva mucyate iti syāt,
T04canprasu:5006: na tarhi baddho mucyata iti vaktavyam,
T04canprasu:5010: tadā samīpe syāt yadā tu kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ mokṣe iṣyamāṇe baddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavena mokṣābhāvaḥ pratipipādayiṣita tadā kuto vartamānasamīpatā?
T04canprasu:5011: evaṃ tāvad baddho na mucyate iti sthitam //
T04canprasu:5015: muktānāṃ cārhatāṃ punarapi mokṣāpekṣatvād baddhataiva syāt,
T04canprasu:5017: atha syāt- abaddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavād baddha eva mucyate iti,
T04canprasu:5018: evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamāne baddhatvānmucyamānatvācca yaugapadyena bandhamokṣaṇe syātām /
T04canprasu:5035: ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate-
T04canprasu:5041: nanu tadeva ahaṃkāramamakārākhyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayupādānameṣāṃ mahāgraho bhavati,
T04canprasu:5046: tāvanniyatameva anupāyena nirvāṇaṃ prārthayatāṃ sarva evārambhā vyarthā bhavanti /
T04canprasu:5049: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtārthādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ
T04canprasu:5051: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
T04canprasu:5054: yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati,
T04canprasu:5056: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyantāparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate /
T04canprasu:5059: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
T04canprasu:5063: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ śīlavān,
T04canprasu:5079: tasya evamavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
T04canprasu:5083: sa ebhyo dharmebhya ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
T04canprasu:5090: sa eko rahogataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
T04canprasu:5091: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
T04canprasu:5092: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate,
T04canprasu:5100: tasya kāṅkṣā ca vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau /
T04canprasu:5103: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatiṃ cotpādayati //
T04canprasu:5104: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavaṃścatvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
T04canprasu:5114: sa na kalpayati na vikalpayati- ime kuśalā dharmāḥ,
T04canprasu:5123: tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati yaṃ parikalpayet /
T04canprasu:5124: bālapṛthagjanāstu etān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣanti ca muhyanti ca /
T04canprasu:5126: tasya evamanāvyūhato 'nirvyūhataḥ traidhātuke citta na sajjati,
T04canprasu:5131: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate // 10 //
T04canprasu:5132: yatra hi nāma paramārthasatye naivaṃ na nirvāṇasamāropaḥ na nirvāṇādhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:5136: kiṃ vā tatra nirvāṇaṃ yatprāpyarthaṃ vikalpyate? athavā /
T04canprasu:5137: yatra nirvāṇe kasyacit sattvasya saṃsārādapakarṣaṇamapanayanaṃ nirvāṇe ca samāropaṇaṃ prayatnavatāpi na śakyate kartuṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayorapyanupalabhyamānatvāt,
T04canprasu:5142: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma,
T04canprasu:5143: yanmāraḥ pāpīyānindrakīlabandhanabaddho dharaṇītalaprapatitaḥ utkrośati sma- gāḍhabandhanabaddho 'smi /
T04canprasu:5144: mañjuśrīrāha- asti pāpīyannetasmādbandhanādgāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ yena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase?
T04canprasu:5148: ato bandhanād gāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ na saṃvidyate /
T04canprasu:5151: āha- kiṃ tvaṃ pāpīyannāttamanā bhūyāḥ yadi mucyethāḥ /
T04canprasu:5154: atha khalu suyāmo devaputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- utsṛja mañjuśrīrmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsam /
T04canprasu:5156: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat- kenāsi pāpīyan baddho yadātmānamutsṛjasi?
T04canprasu:5157: āha- na jāne mañjuśrīḥ- kenāsmi baddhaḥ iti /
T04canprasu:5158: āha- yathā tvaṃ pāpīyan abaddho baddhasaṃjñī,
T04canprasu:5177: ata eva āgamād asadviparyāsakalpanāmātralatābandhanavicchedo vimokṣo nirvāṇamityucyate svapnopalabdhadahanajvālānirvāpaṇavat tadanilasalilairiti
T04canprasu:5178: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau bandhamokṣaparīkṣā nāma ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:5182: yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:5184: yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt /
T04canprasu:5185: saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare 'pi vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati /
T04canprasu:5187: kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate-
T04canprasu:5189: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca // 1 //
T04canprasu:5192: cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ /
T04canprasu:5194: ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam /
T04canprasu:5195: tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛttividhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate //
T04canprasu:5198: tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante /
T04canprasu:5200: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca //
T04canprasu:5204: kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti? netyāha /
T04canprasu:5205: kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ,
T04canprasu:5224: yattu sādhāraṇaṃ kṣityādi na tadbījaṃ kāraṇametat /
T04canprasu:5226: ihāpi iṣṭasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttau trividhaṃ ceto bhavati bījam /
T04canprasu:5228: kasmin punaḥ kāle bījasya phalaniṣpattirityāha- pretya ceha ca /
T04canprasu:5232: evaṃ tāvat cittātmakamevaikaṃ dharmaṃ vyavasthāpya punarapi dvividhaṃ bhagavatā-
T04canprasu:5235: paramaścāsau ṛṣiśceti paramarṣiḥ sarvākāratayā paramārthagamanāt śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhyo 'pi utkṛṣṭatvāt paramarṣiḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān /
T04canprasu:5244: manodvāreṇaiva niṣṭhāgamanāt kāyavākpravṛttinirapekṣatvācca manovijñānasaṃprayuktaiva cetanā mānasaṃ karmetyucyate /
T04canprasu:5248: evaṃ ca evaṃ ca kāyavāgbhyāṃ pravartiṣye ityevaṃ cetasā saṃcintya yat kriyate,
T04canprasu:5253: evaṃ ca trividham- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca // 3 //
T04canprasu:5254: etadapi trividhaṃ karma punarbhidyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ saṃjāyate,
T04canprasu:5255: ityevaṃ tasya karmaṇo bhagavatā bahuprakāro bhedo 'nuvarṇitaḥ /
T04canprasu:5260: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ // 5 //
T04canprasu:5263: tatra kuśalākuśalā vā vāk sarvaiva viratyaviratilakṣaṇā vijñaptisamutthāpikā sāmānyena vāgiti gṛhyate /
T04canprasu:5264: evaṃ kuśalo 'kuśalo vā viratyaviratilakṣaṇo vijñaptisamutthāpako viṣpandaḥ sāmānyena gṛhyate //
T04canprasu:5268: tatra aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ tadyathā adyaprabhṛti mayā prāṇinaṃ hatvā cauryaṃ
T04canprasu:5269: kṛtvā jīvikā parikalpayitavyeti pāpakarmābhyupagamātprabhṛti tadakāriṇo 'pi akuśalakarmābhyupagamahetukāḥ
T04canprasu:5271: kaivartādīnāṃca jālādiparikarmakālātprabhṛti tadakāriṇāmapi yā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
T04canprasu:5273: yathā caitāstathā anyāḥ viratilakṣaṇāḥ kuśalasvabhāvā avijñaptayaḥ /
T04canprasu:5275: taduttarakālaṃ pramattādyavasthasyāpi yāḥ kuśalopacayasvabhāvā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
T04canprasu:5277: etā rūpakriyāsvabhāvā api satyo vijñaptivat parānna vijñāpayantītyavijñaptayaḥ //
T04canprasu:5288: yathā yathā hi tatkīrtau prāṇino hanyante,
T04canprasu:5289: tathā tathā taddevakulādyupabhogāt tatkartṛṇāṃ saṃtāne paribhogānvayamapuṇyamapi jāyate,
T04canprasu:5292: saṃkṣepeṇa etatsaptavidhaṃ karma bhavati- kuśalākuśalā vāk,
T04canprasu:5299: ete ca sapta dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ karmatvenābhivyaktāḥ karmalakṣaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // 5 //
T04canprasu:5302: atha na tiṣṭhati utpattyanantaravināśitvāt? yadi tāvat-
T04canprasu:5305: yadi utpannaṃ sat karma āvipākakālaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate iti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:5306: tad iyantaṃ kālamasya nityatā āpadyate vināśarahitatvāt /
T04canprasu:5309: pūrvaṃ vināśarahitasya ākāśādivat paścādapi vināśena saṃbandhābhāvāt /
T04canprasu:5316: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati /
T04canprasu:5317: abhāvībhūtaṃ sat karma avidyamānasvabhāvatvānnaiva phalaṃ janayiṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ // 6 //
T04canprasu:5321: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati /
T04canprasu:5325: iha bījaṃ kṣaṇikamapi sat svajātīyabhāviphalaviśeṣaniṣpattisāmarthyaviśeṣayuktasyaiva saṃtānasya aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrādyabhidhānasya hetubhāvamapyupagamya nirudhyate /
T04canprasu:5327: tasmāt krameṇa sahakārikāraṇavaikalye sati svalpādapi hetorvipulaphalapracaya upajāyate /
T04canprasu:5328: ṛte bījāt vinā bījāt sa ca aṅkurādisaṃtānaḥ nābhipravartate /
T04canprasu:5329: tadevaṃ tadbhāve bhāvitvena tadabhāve ca abhāvitvena bījahetukatvamaṅkurādisaṃtānasya phalasyopadarśitaṃ bhavati // 7 //
T04canprasu:5340: yathā ca bīje ayaṃ kramo 'nuvarṇitaḥ, evam-
T04canprasu:5344: tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāparibhāvitāccittasaṃtānāt sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānāvaikalye sati iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ phalamupajāyate sugatidurgatiṣu /
T04canprasu:5345: ṛte tu taccitāt cittamantareṇa sa ca nābhipravartate // 9 //
T04canprasu:5349: yadi arhaccaramacittamiva taddhetuphalapāraṃparyāvicchinnakramavartino bhāvinaścittasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamanupagamya kuśalaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyeta,
T04canprasu:5355: tadatra yathoditakarmaprabhedavyākhyāne daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vyākhyātāḥ / te ca-
T04canprasu:5357: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca // 11 //
T04canprasu:5358: ta ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmasya sādhanopāyā niṣpattihetubhūtā ityarthaḥ //
T04canprasu:5365: pariniṣṭhitarūpā ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmaśabdavācyā bhavanti,
T04canprasu:5367: tadasya uktalakṣaṇasya ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā niṣpattau hetutvena vyavasthāpyante /
T04canprasu:5368: kathaṃ punaratra prakrānte karmavibhāge daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā iti? ucyate-
T04canprasu:5372: ityevaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathā atra vyākhyātāḥ /
T04canprasu:5373: te ca yathoditasya dharmasya niṣpattihetavo bhavanti /
T04canprasu:5374: asya ca dharmasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ /
T04canprasu:5379: tān prati apare doṣamudbhāvya anyākṣepaparihāraṃ varṇayantaḥ āhuḥ-
T04canprasu:5383: tadā bahavaśca doṣāḥ saṃkhyābahutvena mahāntaśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhena parapakṣe prāpruvanti /
T04canprasu:5385: yadi hi bījasaṃtānadṛṣṭāntena śālibījāt śālyaṅkurādisaṃtāna eva pravartate,
T04canprasu:5399: tataśca yo devaḥ sa deva eva syāt,
T04canprasu:5400: yo manuṣyaḥ sa manuṣya eva syādityādi /
T04canprasu:5401: tataśca akuśalamapi kurvatāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gatiyonivarṇabuddhīndriyabalarūpabhogādi vaicitryaṃ na syādapāyapatanaṃ ca /
T04canprasu:5403: evaṃ bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā yasmādbījasaṃtānasādharmyakalpanāyāṃ prasajyante,
T04canprasu:5405: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
T04canprasu:5410: iha kuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ sat utpādānantarameva nirudhyate,
T04canprasu:5413: tadā etasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśo nāma viprayukto dharmaḥ kartuḥ saṃtāne samupajāyate ṛṇapatrasthānīyaḥ /
T04canprasu:5414: tadevaṃ patraṃ yathā avipraṇāśaḥ tathā veditavyaḥ /
T04canprasu:5415: yasya ca asau avipraṇāśākhyo dharma utpadyate,
T04canprasu:5417: yathā ca ṛṇapatrāvasthānāt prayukte 'pi dhane dhanino na dhananāśo bhavati,
T04canprasu:5418: saṃbadhyata eva sa kālāntareṇa pañcamena dhanaskandhena,
T04canprasu:5419: tathā vinaṣṭe 'pi karmaṇi avipraṇāśākhyadharmāntarāvasthānāt tannimittakena phalena abhisaṃbadhyata eva kartā /
T04canprasu:5420: yathā ca ṛṇapatraṃ dāturdhanābhyāgamaṃ kṛtvā nirmuktaṃ sat punarapi vidyamānaṃ vā avidyamānaṃ vā na dhanābhyāgame samartham,
T04canprasu:5421: evamavipraṇāśo 'pi dattavipākaḥ san vidyamāno vā avidyamāno vā na śaknoti nirmuktapatravat kartuḥ punarapi vipākasaṃbandhaṃ kartum //
T04canprasu:5433: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
T04canprasu:5435: pārthagjanikāni karmāṇi darśanamārgeṇaiva prahīyante mā bhūdāryaḥ pṛthagjanakarmasamanvāgata iti /
T04canprasu:5437: kiṃ tu bhāvanāmārgeṇa vā tasyā prahāṇaṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:5442: yadi punarapi asya avipraṇāśasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇena prahāṇātprahāṇataḥ prahāṇaṃ syāt karmaṇaśca saṃkrameṇa karmaṇo vināśena karmāntarasaṃmukhībhāvena vināśaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:5451: evaṃ karmavadhādayo doṣāḥ prasajyante prahāṇataḥ praheyatvābhyupagame sati avipraṇāśasya /
T04canprasu:5457: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva sabhāgānāṃ ca viṣabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyadhātupratisaṃdhiṣu sarvakarmāpamardanaḥ eka eva avipraṇāśa utpadyate /
T04canprasu:5458: sa cāpi sadhātūnāṃ samānadhātukānāmeva utpadyate na viṣabhāgadhātukānām // 17 //
T04canprasu:5459: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
T04canprasu:5461: sa cāyamavipraṇāśākhyo dharmaḥ sarvasyaiva karmaṇaḥ cetanācetayitvāsvabhāvasya sāsravānāsravabhedena
T04canprasu:5462: vā dviprakārabhinnasya dṛṣṭe dharme ihaiva janmani karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ ekaiko 'vipraṇāśa utpadyate /
T04canprasu:5463: sa cāyamavipraṇāśo vipakke 'pi vipāke nāvaśyaṃ nirudhyate,
T04canprasu:5464: nirbhuktapatravacca vidyamāno 'pi san na śaknoti punarapi vipaktum // 18 //
T04canprasu:5466: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet // 19 //
T04canprasu:5470: pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnāmeka utpadyate tu saḥ / iti /
T04canprasu:5474: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam /
T04canprasu:5483: bījasaṃtānasādharmyaparikalpanābhāvācca nānāgatijātiyonidhātubhedabhinnaśca pāñcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vicitraḥ siddho bhavati /
T04canprasu:5488: evaṃ niravaśeṣāvidyānidrāpagamādvibuddhena bhagavatā yasmādayaṃ dharmo deśitaḥ,
T04canprasu:5491: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati // iti,
T04canprasu:5494: atrocyate- kimiha bhavanto gandharvanagaraprākārapatanātiśaṅkitayā atīvodvignāḥ tatparirakṣāpariśramāyāsamāpannāḥ,
T04canprasu:5495: ye nāma yūyaṃ karmaṇyanupapadyamāne tatphalanimittaṃ vipravadadhvam?
T04canprasu:5509: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // iti?
T04canprasu:5514: avaśyaṃ caitadevaṃ vijñeyam- niḥsvabhāvaṃ karmeti / anyathā hi-
T04canprasu:5516: akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam // 22 //
T04canprasu:5526: yacca vidyamānaṃ tasya karaṇānupapatteḥ tannaiva kāraṇamapekṣata iti // 22 //
T04canprasu:5527: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi akṛta eva sakalasya lokasya vipāko yasmāt, tataśca-
T04canprasu:5533: tasyāpi akṛtamapi sat tat karma astyeveti tenāpyasya saṃbandhādakṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:5538: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
T04canprasu:5540: ye hi ete kṛṣivāṇijyagorakṣādayaḥ kriyārambhāḥ phalārthamārabhyante,
T04canprasu:5549: ubhayorapi puṇyapāpakṛtoḥ akṛtayorapi puṇyapāpayoḥ pratyekaṃ vidyamānatvāt // 24 //
T04canprasu:5556: yasmāt tatkarma vyavasthitamasti tasmānniḥsaṃśayaṃ yathopavarṇitā doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti sasvabhāvatve /
T04canprasu:5572: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
T04canprasu:5573: na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham // 26 //
T04canprasu:5578: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmātkleśā na tattvataḥ // iti /
T04canprasu:5582: atrāha- vidyanta eva kleśā karmāṇi ca,
T04canprasu:5592: karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā // 27 //
T04canprasu:5595: tataśca karma kleśā yadā na santi,
T04canprasu:5596: tadā tatkāryāṇāṃ dehānāmasattve kā kathā bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:5605: sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ // 28 //
T04canprasu:5606: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamaḥ saṃmoha iti paryāyāḥ /
T04canprasu:5614: atha ca punaridaṃ pāpaṃ karma svayameva kṛtam,
T04canprasu:5615: asya svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti vacanāt /
T04canprasu:5621: atrocyate- syātkarmaṇaḥ kartā karmaphalasya copabhoktā yadi karmaiva syāt /
T04canprasu:5626: karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam /
T04canprasu:5627: asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati // 30 //
T04canprasu:5635: tadapi- hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca ityādinā karmakārakaparīkṣāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditam /
T04canprasu:5636: yataścaivaṃ pratyayasamutpannaṃ vā apratyayasamutpannaṃ vā karmedaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:5638: yadā caivaṃ karma ca kartā ca nāsti,
T04canprasu:5639: tadā nirhetukaṃ karmajaṃ phalaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti,
T04canprasu:5640: asati ca phale kuta eva phalabhoktā bhaviṣyatīti,
T04canprasu:5642: atrāha- yadi evaṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati,
T04canprasu:5643: yattarhi etaduktaṃ bhagavatā- svayaṃ kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti,
T04canprasu:5651: atha manyase- niḥsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vyāpārakaraṇānupapatteḥ tadavastha eva doṣa iti,
T04canprasu:5655: tathāhi niḥsvabhāvā eva santo ghaṭādayaḥ loke svakāryakṛt upalabhyante // 30 //
T04canprasu:5658: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ // 31 //
T04canprasu:5659: tadyathā- ekaṃ nirmitakaṃ śāstā buddho bhagavān ṛddhisaṃpadā ṛddhiprabhāveṇa nirmimīta,
T04canprasu:5660: sa cāpi nirmitakaḥ punaḥ yo 'yaṃ buddhena bhagavatā nirmitaḥ,
T04canprasu:5662: tatra ya eṣa nirmitakaḥ aparasya nirmitakasya nirmātā,
T04canprasu:5670: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam /
T04canprasu:5672: yo hyatra karmaṇaḥ kartā sa nirmitakākāraḥ svabhāvaśūnyaḥ /
T04canprasu:5673: tena ca svabhāvaśūnyena svatantrakartrā yat kiṃcit karma kriyate,
T04canprasu:5675: tadyathā nirmitakena anyo nirmitako nirmitaḥ tathā veditavyam /
T04canprasu:5681: yada sugatu kathāṃ katheti nātho vīthigatān manujān kṛpāyamānaḥ /
T04canprasu:5682: nirmita jinu tatra nirminitva vicarati teṣu praṇītabuddhadharmān //
T04canprasu:5684: kada vaya labhi jñānamevarūpaṃ āśaya jñātva jino 'sya vyākaroti //
T04canprasu:5685: raśmi śatasahasra aprameyān avasiri pādatalehi dharmarājā /
T04canprasu:5686: sarvi niraya śītalā bhavanti dukhamapanīya sukhaṃ ca vedayanti //
T04canprasu:5687: dharma daśabalaprabhāṣite 'tra marumanujāna viśuddha bhoti cakṣuḥ /
T04canprasu:5689: keci spṛha janenti tatra kāle parama acintya tehi labdhalābhā /
T04canprasu:5690: yehi jinu nimantrito narendro na ca pariyanta teṣu dakṣiṇāyā //
T04canprasu:5696: saṃtarpya prītyākāraṃ nāma mahāsamādhiṃ lambhayāmāsa / iti //
T04canprasu:5701: api ca amībhyo dṛṣṭāntebhyaḥ sphuṭaṃ naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratīyatāmiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:5702: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca /
T04canprasu:5714: pañca ca bhikṣuśatāni dhyānalābhīni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāmanavabudhyamānāni anavataranti anavagāhamānāni anadhimucyamānāni /
T04canprasu:5715: bhagavānāha- tathā hyete kāśyapa bhikṣavaḥ ābhimānikāḥ imāmanāsravāṃ śīlaviśuddhiṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante /
T04canprasu:5716: gambhīraḥ kāśyapa gāthābhinirhāro gambhīrā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ /
T04canprasu:5719: etāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni kāśyapasya tathāgatasya pravacane 'nyatīrthikaśrāvakā abhūvan /
T04canprasu:5720: taireva tasya kāśyapasya tathāgatasyāntikādupālambhābhiprāyaireṣā dharmadeśanā śrutā /
T04canprasu:5722: evaṃtairvāg bhāṣitā- āścaryaṃ yāvat madhurapriyamāṇī kāśyapastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
T04canprasu:5723: ta etenaikacittaprasādena pratilabdhena kālagatāḥ trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ /
T04canprasu:5725: tenaiva ca hetunā iha mama śāsane pravrajitāḥ /
T04canprasu:5726: tānyetāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni dṛṣṭipraskandhāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ
T04canprasu:5727: nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante
T04canprasu:5731: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma- gaccha subhūte,
T04canprasu:5733: subhūtirāha- bhagavata eva tāvadete bhāṣitaṃ vilomayanti,
T04canprasu:5735: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣāvo gacchanti sma,
T04canprasu:5736: tasmin mārge drau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma /
T04canprasu:5737: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena mārgeṇa tau dvau bhikṣū nirmitakau tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
T04canprasu:5741: ..... tānyapi pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan- vayamapyāyuṣmantau bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /
T04canprasu:5743: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ /
T04canprasu:5747: kaścitpunaratra kāyaḥ ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo va,
T04canprasu:5751: nirmitakāvavocatām- kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣayiṣyatha?
T04canprasu:5752: te 'vocan- na te adhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,
T04canprasu:5754: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmaphalaparīkṣā nāma saptadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:5756: atrāha- yadi kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca sarvametanna tattvam,
T04canprasu:5757: kevalaṃtu gandharvanagarādivadattatvameva sat tattvākāreṇa pratibhāsate bālānām,
T04canprasu:5760: ādhyātmikabāhyāśeṣavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvathā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ,
T04canprasu:5764: ātmānamasyā viṣayaṃ ca buddhā yogī karotyātmaniṣedhameva //
T04canprasu:5766: kāyadṛṣṭimūlakameva saṃsāramanupaśyan ātmānupalambhācca satkāyadṛṣṭiprahāṇaṃ tatprahāṇācca sarvakleśavyāvṛttiṃ samanupaśyan prathamataramātmānamevopaparīkṣate,
T04canprasu:5769: sa cāyamahaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavetskandhavyatirikto vā?
T04canprasu:5770: ādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāmapi ekatvānyatvapakṣe eva antarbhāvāt saṃkṣepeṇaiva ca vivakṣitatvādekatvānyatvapakṣadvayapratiṣedhenaiva ātmaniṣedhamārabdhukāma ācārya āha-
T04canprasu:5773: kimartha punaranyatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāmagnīndhanaparīkṣāyāṃ ca pañca pañca pakṣā upanyastāḥ,
T04canprasu:5775: yenaiva tatra prakaraṇadvaye pañca pañca pakṣā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
T04canprasu:5776: ata eva anyatra nirdiṣṭatvānna punariha nirdiśyante /
T04canprasu:5779: tadā udayavyayabhāg utpādī ca vināśī ca ātmā prāpnoti,
T04canprasu:5784: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ // iti /
T04canprasu:5789: skandhā ātmā cedatastadbahutvāt ātmānaḥ syuste 'pi bhūyāṃsa eva /
T04canprasu:5790: dravyaṃ cātmā prāpnuyāttādṛśaśca dravye vṛttau vaiparītye ca na syāt //
T04canprasu:5791: ātmocchedo nirvṛtau syādavaśyaṃ nāśotpādau nirvṛteḥ prāk kṣaṇeṣu /
T04canprasu:5793: ityādinā madhyamakāvatāre vistareṇa vihitavicārādapi pakṣo boddhavya iti neha punarvistaraprapañca ārabhyate //
T04canprasu:5794: evaṃ tāvat skandhā ātmā na bhavati /
T04canprasu:5798: yathā hi goranyo 'śvaḥ na golakṣaṇe bhavati,
T04canprasu:5801: tatra askandhalakṣaṇa ātmā bhavan bhavanmatena utpādasthitibhaṅgalakṣaṇāyuktaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:5803: saḥ avidyamānatvādasaṃskṛtatvādvā khapuṣpavannirvāṇabadvā naiva ātmavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate,
T04canprasu:5806: athavā / ayamanyo 'rthaḥ- yadi ātmā skandhavyatiriktaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:5809: ātmā ca rūpādiva vijñānaṃ skandhebhyo vyatirikta iṣyamāṇaḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇasiddhaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:5813: nanu ca tīrthikāḥ skandhebhyo vyatiriktamātmānaṃ pratipannā bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate,
T04canprasu:5815: yathā ca tīrthikā ātmano bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate tathoktaṃ madhyamakāvatāre-
T04canprasu:5816: ātmā tīrthyaiḥ kalpyate nityarūpo 'kartā bhoktā nirguṇo niṣkriyaśca /
T04canprasu:5817: kaṃcitkaṃcidvedamāśritya tasya bhedaṃ yātā prakriyā tīrthikānām //

T04canprasu:6285: mañjuśrīrāha- paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
T04canprasu:6287: paramārthato nirvāṇānānākaraṇā hi devaputra sarvadharmā atyantanirutpādatāmupādāya /
T04canprasu:6306: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
T04canprasu:6309: tadyathā śālibījaṃ pratītya pṛthivyādisāmagrīṃ ca śālyaṅkura upajāyate,
T04canprasu:6310: na hi tāvat tadeva taditi śakyate vaktum /
T04canprasu:6311: naiva yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ,
T04canprasu:6319: evaṃ tāvad yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ iti na yujyate /
T04canprasu:6326: yataścaivaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate,
T04canprasu:6329: tasmānna kāraṇamucchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatamiti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum /
T04canprasu:6332: yasmānnivartate bhāvastena nityo na jāyate // iti /
T04canprasu:6334: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro /
T04canprasu:6335: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
T04canprasu:6344: yathopavarṇitena nyāyena ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ śāśvatocchedavādavigataṃ ca vijñeyam /
T04canprasu:6349: tathāpi janmāntare 'pi avaśyameṣāṃ pūrvahetubalādeva niyatā siddhiḥ saṃpadyate /
T04canprasu:6364: ato 'rhati prājñaḥ prāṇānapi parityajya saddharmatattvaṃ paryeṣitumiti /
T04canprasu:6366: kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
T04canprasu:6367: evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat- sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena
T04canprasu:6368: mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa
T04canprasu:6370: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt- gaccha kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
T04canprasu:6372: tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi,
T04canprasu:6375: yāvat mā kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhā adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
T04canprasu:6383: tathā ca kulaputra gaccha yathā [nātmato] na satkāyataścalasi na rūpato na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānataścalasi /
T04canprasu:6392: yāvanmāreṇa pāpīyasā udake 'ntardhāpite athāsyaitadabhūt- yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhā ime pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /
T04canprasu:6395: mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre nipatet /
T04canprasu:6397: varaṃ khalu punarmama evaṃrūpayā kriyayā ātmabhāvasya vināśaḥ kṛto bhavet,
T04canprasu:6399: bahūni ca mama ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bhinnāni punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ,
T04canprasu:6401: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā samantādātmānaṃ viddhā samantatastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakena rudhireṇāsiñcadityādi
T04canprasu:6402: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanādeva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya
T04canprasu:6403: mahāsattvasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratyalabhata- tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya
T04canprasu:6405: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanā yaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā,
T04canprasu:6420: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau ātmaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:6426: yasmādutpanno niruddho hi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ atīta iti vyapadiśyate,
T04canprasu:6451: pradīpo 'pi andhakāreṇa pratidvandvitvena apekṣyate iti cet,
T04canprasu:6454: tadatra yadi atīte kāle vartamānānāgatau kālau iṣyete,
T04canprasu:6455: apekṣāsiddhayarthamevaṃ sati atīte kāle vidyamānatvāt atītakālātmavat tayorapyatītatvaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:6457: yasmāt vartamānāvasthātikrānto hi atītaḥ asaṃprāptaḥ anāgata iti syāt /
T04canprasu:6464: tatra atīte kāle yadi vartamānānāgatau kālau na staḥ iti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:6466: athāpi syāt- kālavādināṃ vidyate eva kālaḥ,
T04canprasu:6474: yataścaivam pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca tasmātkālo na vidyate iti vijñeyam // 3 //
T04canprasu:6475: yadā caivam atītamapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā pratyutpannānāgatayornāsti siddhiḥ,
T04canprasu:6476: evaṃ pratyutpannāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā atītānāgatayoḥ anāgatāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā
T04canprasu:6477: vā pratyutpannātītayoḥ asiddhau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tenaiva pratyutpannāgatayoḥ atītāpekṣayā
T04canprasu:6486: anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirna jātaṃ vidyate tayoḥ /
T04canprasu:6495: eṣa dvitīyaḥ kālaparivarta iti vyākhyānakārikā iti /
T04canprasu:6508: ekatvādīṃśca ityanena ādiśabdena dvitvabahutvayo grahaṇāt te eva uttamādayaḥ ekatvādayaśca kālatrayavyākhyānena vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ // 4 //
T04canprasu:6511: na tasya parimāṇavattvaṃ vidyate tadyathā kharaviṣāṇasya /
T04canprasu:6513: tasmāt, parimāṇavattvād vidyata eva kālaḥ iti /
T04canprasu:6518: nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
T04canprasu:6520: iha yadi kālo nāma kaścidavasthitaḥ kṣaṇādivyatiriktaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:6522: na tu avasthitaḥ kūṭasthaḥ kaścit kālo nāma asti,
T04canprasu:6526: athāpi syāt- nitya eva avasthitasvabhāvaḥ kālo nāma asti,
T04canprasu:6528: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
T04canprasu:6529: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ // iti /
T04canprasu:6532: evamapi sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyamāno gṛhyeta /
T04canprasu:6533: kasmāt punaḥ sthitaḥ kālo nāstīti cet,
T04canprasu:6535: api ca / ayaṃ kālaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvaḥ san astīti,
T04canprasu:6540: ityanena / tadevaṃ nāsti vyavasthitaḥ kālaḥ, yo gṛhyeta /
T04canprasu:6541: yaśca idānīṃ kālo na gṛhyate asthitatvādavidyamānasvarūpatvāt,
T04canprasu:6542: so 'gṛhyamāṇaḥ san kathaṃ kṣaṇādibhiḥ prajñapayituṃ bhāvataḥ pāryata ityāha- agṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate kathamiti /
T04canprasu:6544: atrāha- satyaṃ nāsti nityaḥ kālo nāma kaścid rūpādivyatiriktaḥ svabhāvasiddhaḥ,
T04canprasu:6545: kiṃ tarhi rūpādīneva sa saṃskārānupādāya prajñaptaḥ kālaḥ kṣaṇādivācyo bhavati,
T04canprasu:6549: yadyevaṃ bhāvaṃ pratītya kālo bhavatīti bhavatā vyavasthāpyate,
T04canprasu:6551: tadā niyataṃ taddhetuko 'pi kālo nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6554: yadā caivaṃ na kaścidbhāvo 'sti bhāvataḥ, tadā-
T04canprasu:6556: kālābhāvācca na santi kṣaṇalavamuhūrtādayaḥ kālabhedāḥ tatpariṇāmabhūtāḥ,
T04canprasu:6560: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvako /
T04canprasu:6561: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ // iti /
T04canprasu:6564: naiva ca dharma na cākṣara kṣīṇā nāsti samudbhavu tena akṣīṇā // iti /
T04canprasu:6566: utpādakāle hi tathāgatasya maitreyanāmā tviha yo bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:6567: bhaviṣyatīyaṃ kanakāvṛtā mahī tasyā idānīṃ kuta āgamo 'sau //
T04canprasu:6568: ullāpanāḥ kāmaguṇā hi pañca vibhrāmaṇā mohana moṣadharmiṇaḥ /
T04canprasu:6569: madhyāhnakāle hi yathaiva grīṣme jalaṃ marīcyāṃ hi tathaiva kāmāḥ //
T04canprasu:6570: ekena kalpena bhaveddhi loko ākāśabhūto gaganasvabhāvo /
T04canprasu:6572: ]ravaḥ kuta āgamaḥ kutra gatiśca teṣām // iti //
T04canprasu:6574: pañcemāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ yaduta atīto 'dhvā anāgato 'dhvā ākāśaṃ nirvāṇaṃ pudgalaśceti
T04canprasu:6575: // ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau kālaparīkṣā nāma ekonaviṃśaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:6583: iha bījāvanisalilajvalanapavanagaganābhidhānahetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya ayamaṅkura upajāyamānaḥ satyāmapi bījādipratyayasāmagryām,
T04canprasu:6589: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // iti //
T04canprasu:6598: iha bījādihetupratyayasāmagrīto 'ṅkurādiphalodaye parikalpyamāne vyavasthitasya vā phalasya sāmagryāṃ satyāṃtata utpādaḥ parikalpyeta avyavasthitasya
