T04canprasu:6602: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
T04canprasu:6603: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // 1 //
T04canprasu:6607: na hi kuṇḍe dadhi vidyamānaṃ kuṇḍena janyate /
T04canprasu:6610: abhivyaktiḥ sthaulyaṃ vā sūkṣmātmanā vidyamānasya kriyata iti cet,
T04canprasu:6616: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
T04canprasu:6617: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // 2 //
T04canprasu:6618: yadi hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti tatphalam,
T04canprasu:6622: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham /
T04canprasu:6626: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate // 3 //
T04canprasu:6630: yacca yatra nāsti na tattatra gṛhyate tadyathā sikatāsu tailam,
T04canprasu:6632: atha syāt- vidyamānā api padārthāḥ atisaukṣmyāt,
T04canprasu:6640: kuḍayādivyavahitaghaṭādivat siddhadevapiśācādiśarīravat viṣayāntaravyāpṛtasya viṣayāntaravanna gṛhyate iti cet,
T04canprasu:6646: yad rūpīndriyagrāhyaṃ tad ebhiḥ kāraṇairvidyamānamapi sanna gṛhyate,
T04canprasu:6649: kiṃ tarhi sāmānyenaiva yad brūmaḥ- gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāmiti //
T04canprasu:6658: asmādapyanumānādastitvamasya ayuktamiti kṛtvā nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti kiṃ na gṛhyate?
T04canprasu:6659: athāpi syāt- ubhyorapi pakṣayoranumānavirodhād yathā astitvaṃ na yuktam,
T04canprasu:6670: tadevaṃ na sāmagrītaḥ phalamutpadyate vidyamānasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt,
T04canprasu:6672: atha manyase- nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti, evamapi-
T04canprasu:6673: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam /
T04canprasu:6675: yathā hi jvālāṅgārādiṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā tasya te hetupratyayā na bhavanti,
T04canprasu:6676: eva vivakṣitānāmapi bījādīnāṃ hetupratyayatā na syāt teṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā /
T04canprasu:6677: na ca ahetu pratyayebhyaḥ phalapravṛttiryukteti nāsti svabhāvataḥ phalapravṛttiḥ //
T04canprasu:6678: atrāha- naiva hi sāmagryāḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyamasti yataḥ iyaṃ cintā syāt- kiṃ sāmagryāṃ phalamasti utāho nāstīti /
T04canprasu:6681: sa hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetuṃ datvā nirudhyate,
T04canprasu:6682: tena ca hetunā anugṛhyamāṇaṃ phalamutpadyate iti /
T04canprasu:6685: na cāpyajātasya bandhyātanayasyeva kenacitkiṃcinmātraṃ kartuṃ śakyamityayuktaiṣā kalpanā // 4 //
T04canprasu:6689: yadi hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetukaṃ kāraṇaṃ datvā nirudhyata iti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:6690: evaṃ sati yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca tadātmabhāvadvayaṃ hetoḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:6693: atha hetorātmabhāvadvayaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ sarvātmanā nirodha iṣyate phalasyotpattyarthaṃ kiṃcidapyadatvā, evamapi-
T04canprasu:6697: nanu tasmin hetau niruddhe yatphalamutpadyate tat āhetukaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:6700: atrāha- yadi evaṃ phalasya hetorutpattau doṣaḥ,
T04canprasu:6701: evaṃ sati sahotpannaiva sāmagrī phalasya janikā astu,
T04canprasu:6709: atrāhureke- naiva hi abhūtvā bhāvānāmutpattiryuktā ākasmikatvaprasaṅgāt /
T04canprasu:6710: tasmād hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva tat phalamanāgatāvasthāyāṃ vyavasthitamanāgatātmanā /
T04canprasu:6716: yadi bhavatāmabhīpsitaṃ sāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva phalaṃ svarūpataḥ syāditi,
T04canprasu:6722: anye punarvarṇayanti- hetureva phalaṃ janayati na sāmagrī /
T04canprasu:6724: yasmāt na hi anyohetuḥ anyat phalam /
T04canprasu:6725: yataḥ, kiṃ hetuṃ datvā phalasya heturnirudhyate uta adatvaiveti vicāraḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:6726: api tu hetureva niruddhaḥ phalātmanā vyavasthitaḥ iti /
T04canprasu:6728: niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
T04canprasu:6733: naṭasya veṣāntaraparityāgena veṣāntarasaṃcāravat hetoḥ saṃkramaṇa mātrameva syāt,
T04canprasu:6740: kiṃ ca / etasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ pūrvajātasya ca hetoḥ punarjanma prāpnoti /
T04canprasu:6741: na ca jātasya punarapi [janma] yujyate niṣprayojanatvāt,
T04canprasu:6743: atha manyase- yenātmanā vidyamāno na tenaivātmanā jāyate,
T04canprasu:6744: yena cātmanā avidyamānaḥ tenaiva jāyata iti /
T04canprasu:6746: aparityaktahetusvabhāvasya hetusvarūpasya phalamiti saṃjñāmātrabhedādavasthābhedācca dravyābhedasya sādhayitumaśakyatvāt /
T04canprasu:6747: phalāvasthāyāṃ ca parityaktahetusvabhāvasya phalaśabdavācyatvād hetuḥ phalātmanā tiṣṭhatīti yatkiṃcidetat // 9 //
T04canprasu:6748: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
T04canprasu:6754: [yadi tāvata niruddhaḥ astaṃgataḥ hetuḥ utpannaṃ sat vidyamānaṃ phalaṃ janayatīti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:6757: kathaṃ niruddhaḥ asaṃvidyamānaḥ hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet?
T04canprasu:6760: phalaṃ ca sad vidyamānamapi janmanirapekṣamapi kathaṃ heturjanayi ṣyati?
T04canprasu:6762: kiṃ tu tiṣṭhanneva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti /
T04canprasu:6764: ] tiṣṭhannapi heturavikṛtarūpo vidyamānena phalena vṛtaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet? iha hi-
T04canprasu:6766: iti kāraṇābhāvaṃ pratipadyamānasya hetoravaśyaṃ vikāreṇa bhavitavyam /
T04canprasu:6771: atha manyase- vidyamānasya phalasya punarjanayitumaśakyatvāt avṛta eva asaṃbaddha eva hetuḥ phalena phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti,
T04canprasu:6778: kiṃ cānyat / yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
T04canprasu:6781: na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam // 11 //
T04canprasu:6787: evaṃ tāvad hetuḥ phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā na janayati,
T04canprasu:6790: atha kimidaṃ darśanaṃ kiṃ vā adarśanamiti? ucyate /
T04canprasu:6792: nanu etad bījādiṣu nirindriyeṣu na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:6795: tatra yaḥ utpādavādī brūyāt- dṛṣṭvā janayatīti,
T04canprasu:6796: sa vaktavyaḥ- na dṛṣṭametalloke yadbījādikaṃ paśyatīti /
T04canprasu:6802: aniṣṭāpattyā hi vayaṃ parakalpanāṃ vicārayāmaḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāragiridarīprapātaduḥkhamālāsamākulāmā tāmīva /
T04canprasu:6803: buddhipūrvakartṛkaṃ ca puruṣādikāraṇino jagadabhyupagacchanto nirgranthāścaikendriyaṃ bījādikaṃ pratipannāḥ prasaṅgānna vyativartanta iti /
T04canprasu:6805: kiṃ cānyat- yadi yuṣmadabhimataṃ hetoḥ phalasya ca anyonyaḍhaukanalakṣaṇaṃ saṃgamanaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:6807: yasmāt na hi parasparāsaṃgatayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇa yorjanyajanakabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti /
T04canprasu:6809: sā ca kālatraye 'pi vicāryamāṇā na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:6814: atītasya tāvat phalasya atītena hetunā saha jātu kadācidapi saṃgatirnāsti,
T04canprasu:6816: nāpi ajātena hetunā atītasya phalasya saṃgatirjātu vidyate,
T04canprasu:6819: nāpi jātena vartamānena hetunā saha atītasya phalasya saṃgatiḥ saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:6822: yathā ca atītasya phalasya atītena anāgatavartamānena hetunā saha na kadācit saṃgatirasti,
T04canprasu:6823: evaṃ vartamānasyāpi phalasya traikālikena hetunā saha nāsti saṃgatiriti tat pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6824: na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
T04canprasu:6826: jātasya phalasya bhinnakālatvādajātena ca atītena ca hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti /
T04canprasu:6827: nāpi vartamānasya vartamānena hetunā saha saṃgatirasti,
T04canprasu:6830: kiṃ hi vidyamānayoḥ parasparanirapekṣayoḥ punaḥ saṃgatyā prayojanamiti nāsti saṃgatiḥ // 13 //
T04canprasu:6831: idānīmanāgatasyāpi phalasya yathā atītānāgatapratyutpannena hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:6832: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
T04canprasu:6835: tasya bhinnakālena vartamānena atītena ca hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanaṃ bhinnakālatvāt /
T04canprasu:6838: yadā caivaṃ sarvathā hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatirnāsti, tadā-
T04canprasu:6839: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
T04canprasu:6840: naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati saṃgateravidyamānatvāt vandhyāputramivetyabhiprāyaḥ //
T04canprasu:6841: athāpi syāt- satyāmeva saṃgatau hetuḥ phalaṃ janayatīti,
T04canprasu:6844: athāpi kathaṃcid hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatiḥ parikalpyate, evamapi-
T04canprasu:6845: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam // 15 //
T04canprasu:6851: yo 'yaṃ phalasya hetuḥ phalasya janaka iṣyate,
T04canprasu:6852: sa tena śūnyo vā bhavan phalamutpādayet, aśūnyo vā?
T04canprasu:6853: tatra hetuḥ śūnyaḥ phalena rahitaḥ phalaṃ na janayati,
T04canprasu:6855: phalena aśūnyo 'pi hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati,
T04canprasu:6858: evaṃ tāvat phalaśūnyo vā phalāśūnyo vā hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati // 16 //
T04canprasu:6865: tadevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ naivotpatsyate svabhāvasyānapāyitvācca na nirotsyate /
T04canprasu:6878: na hi svabhāvena avidyamānasya ākāśādeḥ udayavyayau dṛṣṭau /
T04canprasu:6880: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
T04canprasu:6884: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
T04canprasu:6885: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate // 19 //
T04canprasu:6889: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:6893: evaṃ tāvad hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ nāsti //
T04canprasu:6896: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca bhavanmatenābhimatamanyatvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:6897: tadā paratra nirapekṣatvād hetunirapekṣameva phalaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:6899: ityataḥ anyatvamapi hetoḥ phalasya ca na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:6903: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
T04canprasu:6904: sa tatphalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ vā janayet,
T04canprasu:6909: tatra yat phalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānam,
T04canprasu:6921: sasvabhāvaśca na kaścit padārtho nāma astīti pratidvandvayabhāvāt niḥsvabhāvo 'pi padārtho nāstīti kuto 'naikāntikatā?
T04canprasu:6922: na hi asmākaṃ pratibimbakaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ nāpi niḥsvabhāvam,
T04canprasu:6924: na hi āryāḥ pratibimbakaṃ nāma kiṃcit niḥsvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ vā upalabhanta iti //
T04canprasu:6925: tatra pūrvaṃ phalaṃ notpatsyate ityādinā ślokadvayena sākṣādutpattikriyākartṛtvaṃ phalasya niṣiddham /
T04canprasu:6930: na ca asati phale hetorhetutvaṃ sidhyati,
T04canprasu:6935: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ hetorhetutvaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:6937: na ca hetumantareṇa phalaṃ yuktamiti phalasadbhāvād heturapi bhaviṣyatīti /
T04canprasu:6942: atrāha- naiva hi kevalasya hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāyāḥ prayojakatvam,
T04canprasu:6943: kiṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate iti /
T04canprasu:6946: api ca, iyaṃ hetupratyayasāmagrī yadi phalasya janiketi kalpyate,
T04canprasu:6947: kiṃ sāsvayameva tāvadātmānaṃ janayati, utāho na?
T04canprasu:6950: na hi alabdhātmabhāvasya prayojakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityataḥ sāmagryā avaśyaṃ labdhātmabhāvayā bhavitavyam /
T04canprasu:6951: na ca labdhātmabhāvāyāḥ punaḥ svātmotpāde prayojakatvaṃ yuktam,
T04canprasu:6956: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam /23 //
T04canprasu:6957: pratyayānāṃ hetūnāṃ ca yeyaṃ sāmagrī sā tāvadātmanaiva ātmānaṃ notpādayati,
T04canprasu:6962: na hi bandhyāduhitā ātmānaṃ janayitumaśaktā satī putraṃ janayiṣyatīti yujyate /
T04canprasu:6963: evaṃ sāmagryapi svātmājanikā phalaṃ janayatīti na yujyate // 23 //
T04canprasu:6966: athāpi syāt- yadi sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:6967: evaṃ tarhi asāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, ucyate-
T04canprasu:6972: atha syāt- yadyapi nāsti phalaṃ svabhāvataḥ,
T04canprasu:6974: na ca phalamantareṇa hetupratyayasāmagrī saṃbhavatīti phalamapi saṃbhaviṣyatīti /
T04canprasu:6978: yadā tu yathoditena nyāyena phalameva nāsti, tadā-
T04canprasu:6979: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā // 24 //
T04canprasu:6980: phalābhāve sati nirhetukā hetupratyayasāmagrī api nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
T04canprasu:6982: kaṇṭhoṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihvaparivarti ravanti akṣarāḥ /
T04canprasu:6983: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaikaśa nopalabhyate //
T04canprasu:6984: sāmagri pratītyataśca sā vāca manabuddhivaśena niścarī /
T04canprasu:6987: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tadā dṛśī sarva vāca pratiśrutakopamā //
T04canprasu:6989: iha śāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā /
T04canprasu:6990: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭhā eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena /
T04canprasu:6991: pravrajitva gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ /
T04canprasu:6992: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ //
T04canprasu:6993: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
T04canprasu:6994: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭupadeśita yukti jinena // iti /
T04canprasu:6996: tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam
T04canprasu:6997: na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabuddhatve na samyaksaṃbuddhatve sthātavyam // iti //
T04canprasu:6998: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau sāmagrīparīkṣā nāma viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:7002: iha kaṃcit kālaviśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati,
T04canprasu:7005: vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām- ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ,
T04canprasu:7008: syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām /
T04canprasu:7012: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
T04canprasu:7013: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai // 1 //
T04canprasu:7019: tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti,
T04canprasu:7021: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
T04canprasu:7022: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā // 2 //
T04canprasu:7023: saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:7036: evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7038: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // 3 //
T04canprasu:7039: yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:7041: na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti /
T04canprasu:7042: tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam // 3 //
T04canprasu:7043: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
T04canprasu:7044: evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7045: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā
T04canprasu:7046: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate // 4 //
T04canprasu:7047: naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate /
T04canprasu:7048: yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate,
T04canprasu:7049: kiṃ tarhi sarvadaiva vidyate / uktaṃ hi-
T04canprasu:7051: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // iti /
T04canprasu:7053: tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi?
T04canprasu:7054: ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti /
T04canprasu:7063: yadapi nirdiṣṭam- bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā bhāvādutpāda ucyate,
T04canprasu:7068: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
T04canprasu:7069: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ // iti /
T04canprasu:7078: api ca / kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:7084: yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati,
T04canprasu:7093: idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
T04canprasu:7096: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // 5 //
T04canprasu:7097: yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt,
T04canprasu:7101: atha syāt- yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
T04canprasu:7110: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // 6 //
T04canprasu:7111: sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:7117: anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti /
T04canprasu:7120: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmakṣayadharmiṇo vā?
T04canprasu:7123: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca // 7 //
T04canprasu:7124: tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ /
T04canprasu:7125: akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ /
T04canprasu:7132: yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo bhāvasya saṃbhavataḥ,
T04canprasu:7144: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
T04canprasu:7146: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate // 8 //
T04canprasu:7148: tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti pratiṣiddhau /
T04canprasu:7150: tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:7151: bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau //
T04canprasu:7152: apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate /
T04canprasu:7163: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate /
T04canprasu:7166: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate //
T04canprasu:7168: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpamānau śūnyasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmaśūnyasya vā?
T04canprasu:7174: kiṃ cānyat- iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
T04canprasu:7186: āgopālāṅganādiko hi janaḥ yasmāt saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca paśyati,
T04canprasu:7188: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ śakyo draṣṭumiti / evamapi-
T04canprasu:7191: na hi yad yad lokenopalabhyate tasya tasya astitvam /
T04canprasu:7192: tathā hi āgopālāṅganādiko jano gandharvanagaramāyāsvapnālātacakramarīcikāsalilādikamavidyamānamapi paśyati indriyopaghātāt,
T04canprasu:7195: atha kasmāt punaretadevaṃ niścīyate- avidyamānasvarūpāvimau saṃbhavavibhavau mohādeva vāralokena dṛśyete iti /
T04canprasu:7198: iha yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma bhavet,
T04canprasu:7205: bhāvāt tāvat saṃbhavākhyād bhāvasya saṃbhavākhyasya utpādo na vidyate,
T04canprasu:7213: yadi syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:7231: athavā / ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ- iha hi yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
T04canprasu:7233: tau ca bhāvābhāvau sarvathā vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ /
T04canprasu:7242: api ca / yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma syāt,
T04canprasu:7244: na ca kaścid bhāvaḥ svarūpato 'sti kharaviṣāṇavat svabhāvānutpannatvāt /
T04canprasu:7247: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
T04canprasu:7250: etacca ādya eva prakaraṇe vyākhyātattvānna punarvyākhyāyate /
T04canprasu:7251: yaścaivaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa jāyate sa idānīṃ kuto jāyate?
T04canprasu:7253: avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam- sarvathā nāsti bhāvasyotpāda iti // 13 //
T04canprasu:7258: sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet // 14 //
T04canprasu:7262: yasmāt sa bhāvaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nityo vā bhavedanityo vā /
T04canprasu:7281: sa eva saṃsāraḥ yo 'yaṃ hetuphalāvicchinnakramavartī utpādavyayānuprabandhaḥ saṃskārāṇāmiti /
T04canprasu:7287: yo hi hetukṣaṇaḥ phalasyotpattau hetubhāvamupetya nirudhyate,
T04canprasu:7289: tavāyaṃ kathaṃ na doṣa iti cet,
T04canprasu:7294: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
T04canprasu:7296: ityuktam, tatrāpi amunā nyāyena naiḥsvābhāvyameva bhāvānāṃ pratipāditam /
T04canprasu:7297: anyathā hi sati bhāvasvarūpe bījāṅkurayoḥ kathamanyatvaṃ na syāt?
T04canprasu:7299: evaṃ tāvad bhāvamabhyupapannasya hetoḥ punaranutpādāducchedadarśanaprasaṅgamudbhāvya idānīṃ śāśvatavāde doṣaprasaṅgamudbhāvayannāha-
T04canprasu:7301: yadi hi hetoḥ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:7302: tasya paścādasadbhāvo na syāt svabhāvasyā napāyitvāt /
T04canprasu:7321: anayośca bhavayoḥ saṃsāra iti saṃjñā kṛtā // 17 //
T04canprasu:7322: atra ca idaṃ vicāryate- ya eṣa prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavasthāpyate,
T04canprasu:7323: sa kiṃ carame bhave niruddhe upajāyate,
T04canprasu:7327: sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavatīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7328: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
T04canprasu:7329: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ // 18 //
T04canprasu:7330: tatra yadi carame bhave niruddhe prathamo bhavo jāyate iti parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:7334: tasmāccarame niruddhe prathamo bhavo na yujyate //
T04canprasu:7335: idānīmaniruddhe 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo na yujyate /
T04canprasu:7342: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
T04canprasu:7344: idānīṃ nirudhyamāne 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7354: jāyamānaścāpara iti yaugapadyenaiva dvau bhavau prāpnutaḥ /
T04canprasu:7355: na caikasya yugapad dvau bhavau saṃbhavataḥ ityuktametat // 19 //
T04canprasu:7358: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate // 20 //
T04canprasu:7361: yadā evaṃ yathoditanyāyena niruddhe carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7362: aniruddhe 'pi carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7363: sārdhaṃ caikasmiśca kāle caramena bhavena saha prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7364: tat kimidānīṃ yeṣu eva skandheṣu mriyate teṣu eva jāyate iti syāt /
T04canprasu:7367: na hi mriyamāṇo jāyate iti dṛṣṭam // 20 // tat-
T04canprasu:7371: carame bhave niruddhe 'niruddhe nirudhyamāne yasmāt prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7373: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ // 21 //
T04canprasu:7374: yā ca idānīṃ triṣu kāleṣu nāsti,
T04canprasu:7375: kutaḥ sā anyenātmanā bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā nāsti bhavanmatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ /
T04canprasu:7379: tataśca bhāvābhyupagame sati sa eva śāśvatocchedavādaprasaṅgo durnivāro bhavatām,
T04canprasu:7380: ityato nāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvata utpattiriti siddham /
T04canprasu:7383: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
T04canprasu:7384: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
T04canprasu:7386: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra anucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
T04canprasu:7391: jāyate cyavate cāpi na ca jātirna ca cyutiḥ /
T04canprasu:7392: yasya vijānata eṣa samādhirnāsya durlabhaḥ // iti/
T04canprasu:7394: sūsukhitā sada te nara loke yehi acintiya jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
T04canprasu:7395: na ca dharma adharma vikalpo cittapapañca vibhāvita sarvi //
T04canprasu:7396: bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvamacintayi sarvamabhūtam /
T04canprasu:7397: ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāste dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu //
T04canprasu:7398: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ /
T04canprasu:7399: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāste ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ //
T04canprasu:7400: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ /
T04canprasu:7401: cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān //
T04canprasu:7403: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃbhavavibhavaparīkṣā nāma ekaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:7411: svecchāta upabhogyatāmātmānamupagamayatā mahākālena sārvajñaṃ sarvākāraparicchedi padamadhigatam /
T04canprasu:7412: sa evamadhigatasarvajñajñāno bhagavān yathā dharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tathaiva aśeṣato gatatvād buddhatvāt tathāgata ityucyate /
T04canprasu:7415: na hi ekena janmanā śakyaṃ tathāgatatvamanuprāptum /
T04canprasu:7419: bhavadīyameva hi idamatimahadajñānaṃ bhavasaṃtānasya avicchedavartitāṃ ca atidīrghakālaṃ ca gamayati,
T04canprasu:7422: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit syāt svabhāvataḥ,
T04canprasu:7424: na ca tathāgato nāma kaścid bhāvasvabhāvata upalabhyate /
T04canprasu:7425: kevalaṃ tu bhavānavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā dvicandrakeśamaśakādivanmithyā tathāgataṃ nāma svabhāvata upalabhate /
T04canprasu:7428: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
T04canprasu:7430: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit padārtho 'malo niṣprapañcaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:7435: pūrvakā eva pañca skandhāḥ sattvaprajñaptinimittatvādiha vicāre parigṛhyante nottare,
T04canprasu:7440: tathāgato vā skandhavān bhavet dhanavāniva devadattaḥ?
T04canprasu:7443: tatra tāvat skandhā eva na tathāgataḥ /
T04canprasu:7470: skandheṣvātmā vidyate naiva cāmī santi skandhā ātmanītīha yasmāt /
T04canprasu:7471: satyanyatve syādiyaṃ kalpanā vai taccānyatvaṃ nāstyataḥ kalpanaiṣā //
T04canprasu:7474: iṣṭo nātmā rūpavānnāsti yasmādātmā vattvārthopayogo hi nātaḥ /
T04canprasu:7475: bhede gomān rūpavānaṣyabhede tattvānyatve 'rūpato nātmanaḥ staḥ //
T04canprasu:7476: tattvānyatvapakṣe eva tu pañcāpi pakṣā antargatā vastutaḥ /
T04canprasu:7477: satkāyadṛṣṭipravṛttyapekṣayā tu pañca pakṣāḥ samupavarṇyante ācāryeṇeti vijñeyam /
T04canprasu:7478: yaścaivaṃ skandheṣu pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo nāsti tathāgataḥ,
T04canprasu:7480: sarvathā na saṃbhavatyeva tathāgata iti bhāvasvabhāvādapaśyanta ācāryapādāḥ prāhuḥ- katamo 'tra tathāgata iti /
T04canprasu:7483: atraike vadanti- naiva hi skandhāstathāgata iti brūmaḥ,
T04canprasu:7493: kiṃ tarhi skandhānamalānupādāya tattvānyatvādyavācyaṃ tathāgataṃ vyavasthāpayāmaḥ /
T04canprasu:7496: svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ // 2 //
T04canprasu:7497: yadi hi buddho bhagavānamalān skandhānupādāya tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaḥ prajñapyate,
T04canprasu:7500: yaśca idānīṃ svabhāvato nāsti ātmīyena svarūpeṇa,
T04canprasu:7501: sa kathamavidyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti?
T04canprasu:7502: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ parabhāvamapekṣya bhavatīti yujyate // 2 //
T04canprasu:7503: atha syāt- yathaiva hi pratibimbakaṃ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānamapi parabhāvaṃ mukhādarśādikamapekṣya bhavati,
T04canprasu:7504: evaṃ ca tathāgato 'pi svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ anāsravān pañca skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti, evamapi-
T04canprasu:7506: yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ // 3 //
T04canprasu:7507: yadi pratibimbavat parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ iṣyate,
T04canprasu:7514: kiṃ cānyat- iha yadi tathāgatasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:7515: tadā tatsvabhāvāpekṣayā skandhasvabhāvaḥ parabhāva iti syāt,
T04canprasu:7516: taṃ ca parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:7517: yadā tu tathāgatasya svabhāva eva nāsti,
T04canprasu:7518: tadā kutaḥ skandhānāṃ paratvaṃ syāditi pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7519: yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
T04canprasu:7520: yadā caivaṃ svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tadā
T04canprasu:7524: tābhyāṃ tu vinā ko 'sau aparaḥ padārtho 'sti,
T04canprasu:7530: yadi manyase- skandhebhyastattvānyatvena avaktavyastathāgataḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate iti,
T04canprasu:7532: yadi skandhānanupādāya agṛhītvā pūrvaṃ kaścittathāgato nāma bhavet,
T04canprasu:7534: vyatirikta eva hi pūrvasiddho dhanād devadatto dhanasyopādānaṃ kurute,
T04canprasu:7535: tadvadetān skandhānanupādāya yadi kaścit tathāgataḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:7544: tadā skandhānupādāya tathāgato nāma bhaviṣyatīti nopapadyate // 6 //
T04canprasu:7545: yadā caivaṃ tathāgataḥ upādānātpūrvamavidyamānatvāt na kiṃcidupādatte,
T04canprasu:7546: tadā tadupādānasyāpi kenacidapi anupādīyamānasya upādānatvaṃ na saṃbhavatyeveti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7555: yo hi tathāgato vicāryamāṇo mṛgyamāṇaḥ tattvenaskandhebhya ekatvena nāsti,
T04canprasu:7556: anyatvena skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvena ca yo nāsti,
T04canprasu:7558: yo nāsti, sa kathamatyanto 'saṃvidyamānastathāgataḥ upādānena śakyaḥ prajñapayitum?
T04canprasu:7560: na kevalamanena vicāreṇa tathāgata eva nāsti,
T04canprasu:7566: athāpi syāt- yadyapi svabhāvataḥ upādānaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:7570: na hi bandhyāsūnuḥ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ śakyaḥ parabhāvena prajñapayitumiti /
T04canprasu:7575: atha yadyapi upādātṛnirapekṣamupādānaṃ svabhāvasiddhaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7588: naiva tatsaṃbhavati yadavidyamānena avidyamānasya tathāgatasya prajñaptiḥ syāditi /
T04canprasu:7589: tasmāt skandhānupādāya tathāgataḥ prajñapyate iti nopapadyate //
T04canprasu:7590: atrāhuḥ- aho vata hatā pratyāśā asmākam,
T04canprasu:7604: ityādinā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ vruvatā bhavatā hatā asmākaṃ mokṣapratyāśā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyāgamābhilāṣaḥ iti /
T04canprasu:7607: asmākameva hatā pratyāśā bhavadvidheṣvabudhajaneṣu ye hi nāma bhavantaḥ mokṣakāmatayā
T04canprasu:7608: anyatīrthyamatāni parityajya bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamapi aviparītaṃ paramaśāstāraṃ
T04canprasu:7612: na hi tathāgatāḥ kadācidapyātmanaḥ skandhānāṃ vā astitvaṃ prajñapayanti /
T04canprasu:7615: buddhadharmā apyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ // iti //
T04canprasu:7617: dharma svabhāvatu śūnya vivikto bodhi svabhāvatu śūnya viviktā /
T04canprasu:7618: yo hi caretsa pi śūnyasvabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya // iti /
T04canprasu:7619: na ca vayaṃ sarvathaiva niṣprapañcānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāstitvaṃ brūmaḥ,
T04canprasu:7621: api ca / niḥsvabhāvaṃ hi tathāgataṃ vyācakṣāṇena aviparītārthābhidhitsunā yogināṃ satā sarvathā-
T04canprasu:7625: kiṃ tu anukte yathāvadavasthitaṃ svabhāvaṃ pratipattā pratipattuṃ na samartha ityato vayamapi āropato vyavahārasatye eva sthitvā vyavahārārthaṃ vineyajanānurodhena (Pp_193)
T04canprasu:7629: naiva śūnyaṃ nāśūnyamityapi brūmaḥ / ata evāha
T04canprasu:7637: atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tītaṃ rūpamabhyanandiṣyat /
T04canprasu:7641: evaṃ yāvat atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo vijñānaṃ nābhaviṣyat- ityādi pūrvavat //
T04canprasu:7648: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmātsarvaṃ vidhīyate /
T04canprasu:7654: nātmā na sattva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ //
T04canprasu:7659: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretanirayeṣu gatāḥ /
T04canprasu:7660: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ teṣāṃ pradarśayasi mārgavaram // iti /
T04canprasu:7661: sarvāstvetāḥ kalpanā niṣprapañce tathāgate na saṃbhavanti // 11 //
T04canprasu:7662: na ca kevalaṃ śūnyatvādikameva catuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, api ca-
T04canprasu:7678: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
T04canprasu:7679: naiva bhavati na na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
T04canprasu:7684: tatra yathopavarṇitena nyāyena yathā śūnyatvādikaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ prakṛtyā śānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7686: asaṃbhavādeva ca catuṣṭayaṃ vandhyāputrasya śyāmagauratvādivat na vyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā lokasya /
T04canprasu:7687: yathā ca etaccatuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7689: idānīṃ bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt ityādikasyāpi kalpanācatuṣṭayasya pravṛttyasaṃbhava mudbhāvayannāha-
T04canprasu:7692: yena hi ghanataro mahatābhiniveśena asti tathāgataḥ iti grāho gṛhītaḥ,
T04canprasu:7701: yasya tu na kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatvāt tathāgatasya astitvanāstitvam,
T04canprasu:7704: paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā // 14 //
T04canprasu:7706: tadevaṃ prakṛtiśānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate sarvaprapañcātīte mandabuddhitayā śāśvatāśāśvatādikayā nityānityāstināstiśūnyāśūnyasarvajñāsarvajñādikayā
T04canprasu:7708: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam // 15 //
T04canprasu:7714: tamitthaṃvidhaṃ tathāgataṃ svotprekṣitamithyāparikalpamalamalinamānasatayā vividhairabhūtaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣaiḥ ye buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ prapañcayanti,
T04canprasu:7716: tataśca śavabhūtāḥ etasmin pravacane na paśyanti tathāgataṃ jātyandhā ivādityam /
T04canprasu:7718: ye māṃ rūpeṇa adrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa anvayuḥ /
T04canprasu:7719: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ //
T04canprasu:7720: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
T04canprasu:7721: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum //
T04canprasu:7723: tadatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ sattvalokaḥ sakalaḥ sasurāsuranarādiḥ parīkṣitaḥ /
T04canprasu:7733: anupādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ /
T04canprasu:7734: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayaḥ asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke //
T04canprasu:7735: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
T04canprasu:7736: naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarva loke // iti /
T04canprasu:7738: atha khalu te devaputrāḥ āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocan- kiṃ punarāryasubhūte māyopamāste sattvāḥ, na te māyā?
T04canprasu:7739: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ,
T04canprasu:7741: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayameta dadvaidhīkāram /
T04canprasu:7754: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan- samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti,
T04canprasu:7756: subhūtirāha- nirvāṇamapi devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi,
T04canprasu:7758: devaputrā āhuḥ- nirvāṇamapyāryasubhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
T04canprasu:7759: subhūtirāha- yadyapi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:7761: iti hi māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramiti //
T04canprasu:7762: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau tathāgataparīkṣā nāma dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:7772: tasmāt kāryabhūtāpi janmamaraṇaparaṃparā avicchedaprabandhena bhavasaṃtatirapi bhaviṣyatīti /
T04canprasu:7783: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase /
T04canprasu:7784: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi //
T04canprasu:7790: tatra hi śubhamākāraṃ pratītya rāga utpadyate,
T04canprasu:7803: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ // 2 //
T04canprasu:7817: atha syāt- yadi astitvanāstitve ātmano na staḥ,
T04canprasu:7819: yatasteṣāmapi astitvanāstitve na staḥ iti? ucyate-
T04canprasu:7820: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
T04canprasu:7821: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit // 4 //
T04canprasu:7822: iha amī rāgādayaḥ kuḍayaṃ citravat phalaṃ pakvatādivacca utpattau āśrayamapekṣante /
T04canprasu:7825: sa ca āśrayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ ātmā vā cittaṃ vā bhavet /
T04canprasu:7827: taṃ ca kaṃcidāśrayaṃ vinā kasya kleśā bhavantu?
T04canprasu:7830: āho vinā kaṃcit santi kleśā na kasyacit // 4 //
T04canprasu:7831: atrāha- naiva hi kleśānāṃ kaścidāśrayaḥ pūrvaṃ siddho 'bhyupagamyate /
T04canprasu:7835: kiṃ tarhi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ pratītya kleśā upajāyante,
T04canprasu:7838: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
T04canprasu:7842: yatheyaṃ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇā svakāye na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:7843: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
T04canprasu:7845: ityanena / evaṃ kliṣṭe 'pi kleśā vicāryamāṇāḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavanti /
T04canprasu:7846: tatra kliśyantīti kleśā kliśyate iti kliṣṭam /
T04canprasu:7847: tatra yadeva kliṣṭaṃ tadeva kleśā iti na yujyate dagdhṛdāhyayorapyekatvaprasaṅgāt /
T04canprasu:7852: ata eva ca ekatvānyatvābhāvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāṃ ca abhāvānna kleśeṣu kliṣṭam,
T04canprasu:7855: ityevaṃ kliṣṭe pañcadhā vicāryamāṇāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti /
T04canprasu:7856: yathā ca kliṣṭahetukāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti,
T04canprasu:7857: evaṃ kleśahetukamapi kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣu vicāryamāṇaṃ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:7862: na ca kliṣṭe kleśāḥ na ca kleśeṣu kliṣṭam,
T04canprasu:7864: ityevaṃ svakāyadṛṣṭivadeva kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi pañcadhā nāsti /
T04canprasu:7874: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā-
T04canprasu:7877: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā-
T04canprasu:7891: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate // 7 //
T04canprasu:7897: rūpaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāśceti /
T04canprasu:7900: tena śabdena śabdyante prakāśyante padārthā iti śabdaḥ /
T04canprasu:7901: gandhyante hiṃsyante yatra prāptāḥ tato 'nyatrāgamanād gandhāḥ /
T04canprasu:7910: āghātaḥ sattvaviṣayo 'sattvaviṣayo vā dūṣyate vā anena citamiti doṣaḥ /
T04canprasu:7913: tadeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ rūpādikaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu ālambanaṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:7914: tatra śubhākārādhyāropeṇa yathā rūpādibhyo rāga upajāyate,
T04canprasu:7918: kiṃ tu avidyamānasvabhāvasattākametad rāgādīnāmālambanatvena parikalpyate bhavatā taimirikairiva asatkeśamaśakamakṣikādvicandrādikamiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7925: yathā gandharvanagarādiprakhyā ete kevalaṃ viparyāsādupalabhyante, tadā-
T04canprasu:7926: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:7930: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ //
T04canprasu:7938: iha yadi śubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt,
T04canprasu:7946: yadaśubhaṃ pratītya yadaśubhamapekṣya śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi vyavasthāpayemahi /
T04canprasu:7949: yataśca evaṃ śubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyamaśubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:7956: yadi hi aśubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt,
T04canprasu:7969: yataścaivamaśubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:7972: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:7974: śubhāśubhanimittakayo rāgadveṣayoḥ śubhāśubhanimittābhāve sati nirhetukatvānnāsti saṃbhava ityabhiprāyaḥ // 12 //
T04canprasu:7975: tadevaṃ śubhāśubhanimittābhāvena rāgadveṣayorabhāvamupapādya viparyāsasvabhāvābhāvapratipādanena mohasyāpyadhunā svabhāvābhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:7977: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ // 13 //
T04canprasu:7979: tadyathā- anitye pratikṣaṇavināśini skandhapañcake yo nityamiti grāhaḥ,
T04canprasu:7981: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham /
T04canprasu:7985: tasmādduḥkhātmake skandhapañcake yaḥ sukhamiti viparīto grāhaḥ,
T04canprasu:7990: yaḥ śayīta sa nārīṇāṃ śayīta jaghanodare // ityādi /
T04canprasu:7998: atredānīṃ vicāryate- yadi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaṃ svabhāvaśūnyeṣu nityagrāho viparyāsa ityevaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
T04canprasu:7999: nanu ca svabhāvaśūnyeṣu skandheṣu anityatvamapi nāsti, iti
T04canprasu:8000: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ /
T04canprasu:8001: anityatvaṃ hi viparītamapekṣya nityatvaṃ viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate /
T04canprasu:8004: tadā kutastadvirodhi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaviparyāso bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
T04canprasu:8006: yathā ca anityatvaṃ śūnye na saṃbhavati bhāvasvabhāvarahite sasvabhāvena anutpanne,
T04canprasu:8016: avidyayā naiva kadāci vidyate avidyata pratyayasaṃbhavaśca /
T04canprasu:8017: avidyamāneyamavidya loke tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā //
T04canprasu:8023: nanu evaṃ sati svabhāvena avidyamāne padārthe anityamityapi grāho na saṃbhavati iti asāvapi kasmānna viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8025: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ // 14 //
T04canprasu:8026: yadā ca ubhayasyāpi vaiparītyaṃ nityasya anityasya ca,
T04canprasu:8027: tadā tadvayatiriktaṃ tṛtīyamaparaṃ nāsti yanna viparyayaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:8032: yathā ca anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyāso na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:8035: bhagavānāha- kimetat kulaputra tasya bhavati yo mārgeṇa niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣate?
T04canprasu:8036: na kulaputra tathāgatena rañjanīyān dharmān parivarjya rāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam,
T04canprasu:8037: evaṃ na doṣaṇīyān mohanīyāna dharmān parivarjya tathāgatena doṣamohaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam /
T04canprasu:8039: na kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kasyaciddharmasya utsargāya vā pratilambhāya vā dharmaṃ deśayanti
T04canprasu:8040: na parijñāyai na prahāṇāya na sākṣātkriyāyai nābhisamayāya na saṃsāracaraṇatāyai
T04canprasu:8053: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāgacittamutpādayet /
T04canprasu:8055: so 'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasi kuryādanityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasi kuryāt /
T04canprasu:8056: bhagavānāha- evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ,
T04canprasu:8061: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare svagṛhe rājabhāryāṃ paśyet /
T04canprasu:8067: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputra api nu sa puruṣo bhītasrastaḥ palāyamānastato rājabhāryānidānabhayātparimucyeta?
T04canprasu:8070: tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa astriyāṃ strīsaṃjñā utpāditā,
T04canprasu:8072: bhagavānāha- evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ,
T04canprasu:8073: ye arāge rāgasaṃjñāmutpādya rāgabhayabhītā rāganiḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
T04canprasu:8078: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sa puruṣaḥ abhaye bhayasaṃjñāmutpādayedasatsamāropeṇa /
T04canprasu:8079: evameva kulaputra sarvabālapṛthagjanā rāgakoṭiṃ virāgakoṭimaprajānanto rāgakoṭibhayabhītā virāgakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
T04canprasu:8081: mohakoṭiṃ śūnyatākoṭimaprajānanto mohakoṭibhayabhītāḥ śūnyatākoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
T04canprasu:8082: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputra mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi /
T04canprasu:8085: atrāha- yadyapi anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyayo na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:8088: tasya ca avaśyaṃ sādhanena karaṇena bhavitavyaṃ sādhakatamena nityatvādinā /
T04canprasu:8089: kartrā ca bhavitavyaṃ svatantreṇa nityātmanā cittena vā /
T04canprasu:8091: satyāṃ ca bhāvakaraṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ siddhau sarvasiddheriṣṭasiddhiḥ syādasmākamiti /
T04canprasu:8095: yena gṛhṇāti yogrāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
T04canprasu:8097: iha hi kaścid grahītā yena viśeṣeṇa nityatvādinā karaṇabhūtena kiṃcit karmabhūtaṃ rūpaśabdādikaṃ vastu gṛhṇāti,
T04canprasu:8098: tadyathā na saṃbhavati tathā pūrvaṃ pratipāditam /
T04canprasu:8101: ityādinā yathā nityatvādikaṃ karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:8110: tadā kuto nirhetuko grāho bhaviṣyati? tataśca-
T04canprasu:8111: yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
T04canprasu:8116: athavā / pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ prakaraṇairyasmāt sarveṣāmeva karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ sarvathānutpādaḥ pratipāditaḥ,
T04canprasu:8121: iha hi viparyāsānugato devadatto nāma vidyate /
T04canprasu:8122: na ca vinā viparyāsaiḥ sa viparyāsānugataḥ saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:8125: iha asmābhiḥ karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāmabhāvāt sarvathā grāha eva nāstīti pratipāditam / tataśca-
T04canprasu:8126: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā /
T04canprasu:8128: samyagvā mithyā vā kasyacit kiṃcidapyagṛhṇataḥ kuto viparītatvamaviparītatvaṃ veti /
T04canprasu:8130: api ca / ime viparyayāḥ kasyacidiṣyamāṇāḥ viparītasya parikalpyeran,
T04canprasu:8151: ardhaviparīto hi nāma yasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ kiṃcidaviparītam /
T04canprasu:8152: tatra yadasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ tadviparyāso na viparyāsayati,
T04canprasu:8159: bhavānidānīṃ vimṛśatu svayaṃ prajñayā madhyasthaḥ san kasya saṃbhavanti viparyāsā iti /
T04canprasu:8165: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
T04canprasu:8173: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃna sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
T04canprasu:8174: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ // 21 //
T04canprasu:8175: yadi etāni ātmaśucinityasukhāni viparyāsā iti vyavasthāpyante,
T04canprasu:8183: viparyāsapratibandhyabhāvādanātmādīnāmapi aviparyāsādīnāṃ nāsti sadbhāva iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8184: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
T04canprasu:8185: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate // 22 //
T04canprasu:8186: yadi ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca na vidyate iti manyase,
T04canprasu:8188: evaṃ sati ātmādīnāmapyabhāvād yadi etadanātmādikamaviparyāsatvena gṛhītam,
T04canprasu:8192: tadā tadapi svarūpato 'vidyamānatvāt ātmādivat kathaṃ na viparyāsaḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:8194: asya ca yathopavarṇitaviparyāsavicārasya avidyādiprahāṇahetutvena mahārthatāṃ pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8197: yadā ayaṃ yogī yathoditena nyāyena viparyāsān nopalabhate,
T04canprasu:8198: tadā evaṃ viparyāsānupalambhanena taddhetukā avidyā nirudhyate /
T04canprasu:8200: avidyā hi sakalasyaiva saṃkleśagaṇasya jātyādiduḥkhasya ca hetubhūtā /
T04canprasu:8201: yathā hi kāyendriyahetukāni sarvāṇi rūpīndriyāṇi kāyendriye nirudhyamāne nirudhyante,
T04canprasu:8202: evamavidyāhetukāni saṃskārādīni bhavāṅgāni pravartamānāni niyatamavidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ nirudhyante iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8205: asti tarhi avidyā yasyā evaṃ viparyāsanirodhānnirodho bhavati /
T04canprasu:8213: yo hi nāma sarvātmanā atyantaduḥkhāyāsakleśāsamañjase saṃsāre nirantaraphullaphalapradasaṃkleśaviṣavṛkṣe
T04canprasu:8219: api ca / yadi avidyādīnāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavet,
T04canprasu:8222: yadi syāt, tadā tattvarūpato vidyamānānāṃ vā syāt,
T04canprasu:8225: tatra yadi svarūpataḥ sadbhatānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamiṣyate,
T04canprasu:8228: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
T04canprasu:8229: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati // 24 //
T04canprasu:8230: svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ na śakyaḥ svabhāvo vinivartayitum /
T04canprasu:8232: evaṃ yadi ime kleśāḥ svabhāvataḥ sadbhūtāḥ syuḥ /
T04canprasu:8237: kasmātpunaḥ na te prahīyante ityāha- kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyatīti /
T04canprasu:8244: abhūtā api kleśāḥ svabhāvena avidyamānāḥ aśakyā eva prahātum /
T04canprasu:8246: evamime 'pi kleśāḥ kecid yadi kasyacit svabhāvato na vidyante,
T04canprasu:8251: ato yaduktam- vidyanta eva avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ,
T04canprasu:8263: sa taṃ dharmamasamanupaśyan anupalabhamāno 'rakto 'duṣṭo 'mūḍho 'viparyastacittaḥ samāhita ityucyate /
T04canprasu:8268: ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam /
T04canprasu:8269: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo //
T04canprasu:8270: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /
T04canprasu:8271: mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // ityādi /
T04canprasu:8273: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam /
T04canprasu:8275: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /
T04canprasu:8276: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ na sa labhyate //
T04canprasu:8278: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate /
T04canprasu:8279: śabdaścāpi nirvāṇaṃ ca ubhayaṃ tanna labhyate /
T04canprasu:8281: nirvāṇaṃ nivṛttireva nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate /
T04canprasu:8286: jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyatāṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi /
T04canprasu:8287: vyāhāramātreṇa hi vyāharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi //
T04canprasu:8289: parinirvṛta loki te śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
T04canprasu:8290: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅgu vivarjiya sattva vinenti //
T04canprasu:8292: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau viparyāsaparīkṣā nāma trayoviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:8295: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
T04canprasu:8297: yadi yuktyā nopapadyate iti kṛtvā sarvamidaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ bhāvajātaṃ śūnyamiti pratipāditam,
T04canprasu:8298: nanu ca evaṃ sati bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā bhavata āpadyante /
T04canprasu:8307: iha hi pūrvahetujanitāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca pratikūlavartitvācca pīḍātmakatvena duḥkhamityucyate /
T04canprasu:8308: etacca duḥkhamāryā eva viparyāsaprahāṇe sati duḥkhamiti saṃjānate,
T04canprasu:8312: yathā hi viparyastendriyāṇāṃ madhurasvabhāvamapi guḍaśarkarādikaṃ tiktatayā upalabhamānānāṃ jvarādirogāturāṇāṃ tiktataiva satyaṃ tajjñānāpekṣayā,
T04canprasu:8319: ataḥ āryāṇāmeva duḥkhātmatā satyamiti kṛtvā duḥkhamāryasatyamityucyate /
T04canprasu:8320: nanu ca anāryairduḥkhā vedanā duḥkhamiti paricchidyate iti,
T04canprasu:8322: na hi duḥkhaiva vedanā kevalaṃ duḥkhasatyam,
T04canprasu:8324: ityataḥ āryāṇāmeva tat satyamiti kṛtvā āryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate / yathoktam-
T04canprasu:8325: ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vi(ve?)
T04canprasu:8327: akṣigataṃ tu tadeva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍāṃ ca //
T04canprasu:8333: yadā tu śūnyatvānna kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate,
T04canprasu:8337: samudeti samutpadyate sa hetuḥ tṛṣṇākarmakleśalakṣaṇaḥ samudaya ityucyate /
T04canprasu:8340: duḥkhasya ca vigamaḥ apunarutpādaḥ nirodha ityucyate /
T04canprasu:8345: asati ca duḥkhanirodhe kuto duḥkhanirodhagāminī āryāṣṭāṅgamārgānugā pratipad bhaviṣyatīti mārgasatyamapi nāstīti /
T04canprasu:8346: tadevaṃ śūnyatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ bruvataḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prasajyate // 1 //
T04canprasu:8348: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
T04canprasu:8351: duḥkhasamudayasya ca prahāṇaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminyāśca pratipado bhāvanā duḥkhanirodhasya
T04canprasu:8357: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ // 3 //
T04canprasu:8358: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
T04canprasu:8360: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:8365: iha kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ phalākhyaṃ pratilabhate /
T04canprasu:8366: tadyathā- saṃyojanatrayaprahāṇe sati ṣoḍaśe mārge anvayajñānakṣaṇe yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tat srotaāpattiphalam /
T04canprasu:8367: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyamṛdūnāṃ prakārāṇāṃ punaradhimātramadhyamṛduprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānānāṃ nava prakārā bhavanti /
T04canprasu:8368: tatra kāmāvacaraṣaṣṭhakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam /
T04canprasu:8369: teṣāmeva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ navamaprakārakleśaparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tadanāgāmiphalam /
T04canprasu:8370: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārabhedabhinnānāṃ
T04canprasu:8379: yadā tu duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:8380: tadā na santi tāni catvāri phalāni /
T04canprasu:8381: caturṇā ca phalānāmabhāve sati ye teṣu vyavasthitāḥ phalasthāścatvāra āryapudgalāḥ, te na santi /
T04canprasu:8382: ata eva ca pratipannakā api catvāra āryapudgalā na saṃvidyante //
T04canprasu:8383: iha hi ṣoḍaśāt mārge 'nvayajñānakṣaṇāt pūrve ye pañcadaśa kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ,
T04canprasu:8389: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
T04canprasu:8390: evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktāṣṭādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ duḥkhādyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ /
T04canprasu:8396: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣayo dvitīyaḥ /
T04canprasu:8403: kāmāvacaraduḥkha nirodhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ /
T04canprasu:8404: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
T04canprasu:8405: etaireva ākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ
T04canprasu:8406: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ /
T04canprasu:8411: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
T04canprasu:8414: evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ āryaḥ srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ ityucyate /
T04canprasu:8415: ṣoḍaśe tu mārge 'nvayajñānasthitaḥ sa srotaāpanna ityucyate //
T04canprasu:8416: ta ete aṣṭāśītiranuśayāḥ satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa bhāvanāmanapekṣyaiva prahīyante iti kṛtvā darśanaprahātavyā ityucyante /
T04canprasu:8417: yathādṛṣṭasatyākārabhāvanayā tu ye paścātprahīyante te bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ /
T04canprasu:8421: ārūpyāvacarāśca trayaḥ ete eveti daśa bhavanti /
T04canprasu:8422: ete ca yathoktena nyāyena bhūmau bhūmau navadhā bhidyante,
T04canprasu:8425: ekaikasya ca kleśaprakārasya prahāṇārthamānantaryavimuktimārgabhedena dvau dvau jñānakṣaṇau vyavasthāpyete kleśakṣaṇaviparyayeṇa /
T04canprasu:8430: tatra darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaṣaṣṭhakleśaprakārapratipakṣavimuktimārgākhyajñānakṣaṇādarvāg jñānakṣaṇāvasthitaḥ āryaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate /
T04canprasu:8434: ṣaṣṭhāt kṣaṇādūrdhva navamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate /
T04canprasu:8444: catvāraśca phalasthāḥ ityete aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalā bhavanti /
T04canprasu:8450: sukṣetraṃ te pravakṣyāmi yatra dattaṃ mahatphalam //
T04canprasu:8453: yadi catvāri āryasatyāni na santi teṣāṃ ca parijñānāni,
T04canprasu:8456: tatra (Pp_213) adhigamadharmeṇa pratyakṣadharmatayā sarvamārairapi buddhe bhagavati abhedyatvādavetya prasādalābhena saṃghaḥ, sa na syāt /
T04canprasu:8458: āryasatyānāṃ ca abhāvāt saddharmo 'pi na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:8466: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddhao bhaviṣyati //
T04canprasu:8468: tadā taddharmapratipattyā sarvākārasarvadharmābhisaṃbodhād buddho bhavatīti yuktaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:8470: tadā tadupadeśairupacīyamānajñānasaṃbhāraḥ taddānamānaśaraṇagamanādibhiśca upacīyamānapuṇyasaṃbhāraḥ kramād buddho bhavet //
T04canprasu:8473: avaśyaṃ hi pūrvaṃ bhagavatā kasmiṃścit phale vyavasthātavyam /
T04canprasu:8474: tatra ca phale vyavasthitaḥ saṃghāntaḥpātyeva bhagavān bhavati /
T04canprasu:8475: saṃghe cāsati niyataṃ nāsti bhagavān buddhaḥ /
T04canprasu:8477: tathā ca buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ ityabhidhānāt saṃghāntargata eva bhagavān iti kecidvarṇayanti /
T04canprasu:8479: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /iti /
T04canprasu:8480: madhyoddeśikāśca mahāvastūpadiṣṭabhūmivyavasthayā prathamabhūmisthitaṃ bodhisattvamutpannadarśanamārgaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ saṃghāntaḥpātinaṃ vyācakṣate
T04canprasu:8481: tadā saṃghe cāsati bodhisattvo 'pi nāstīti kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyatīti spaṣṭamevaitat / tad-
T04canprasu:8483: śūnyatāmityevaṃ vadan buddhadharmasaṃghākhyāni trīṇyapi durlabhatvāt kadācideva utpattitaḥ alpapuṇyānāṃ ca tadaprāpteḥ mahārghamūlyatvād ratnāni pratibādhase // 5 //
T04canprasu:8490: tadā sarvāntaḥ pātitvāt dharmādharmau saha taddhetukena iṣṭāniṣṭaphalena na saṃbhavataḥ /
T04canprasu:8491: sarva eva cāmī laukikā vyavahārāḥ- kuru,
T04canprasu:8496: āgaccha ityevamādayo 'pi sarvāntargatatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca śūnyatvānnaiva yujyante iti /
T04canprasu:8498: atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam /
T04canprasu:8499: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase // 7 //
T04canprasu:8500: sa bhavān svavikalpanayaiva nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārtha ityevaṃ viparītamadhyāropya “yadi
T04canprasu:8501: sarvamidaṃ śūnyamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ” ityādinopālambhaṃ bruvāṇo 'smāsu mahāntaṃ
T04canprasu:8503: na tvayamasmābhiratra śāstre śūnyatārthaṃ upavarṇito yastvayā parigṛhītaḥ,
T04canprasu:8513: bhavāṃstu nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ parikalpayan prapañcajālameva saṃvardhayamāno na śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanaṃ vetti //
T04canprasu:8518: ataḥ prapañcanivṛttisvabhāvāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ kuto nāstitvamiti śūnyatāmapina jānāti bhavān /
T04canprasu:8523: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
T04canprasu:8524: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnyu ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
T04canprasu:8535: ata ācāryaḥ karuṇayā parasya mithyāpravacanārthāvabodhanirāsārthaṃ bhagavatpravacanopadiṣṭāviparītasatyadvayavyavasthāmeva tāvadadhikṛtyāha-
T04canprasu:8538: iha hi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ satyadvayamāśritya dharmadeśanā pravartate /
T04canprasu:8541: skandhātmā loka ākhyātastatra loko hi niśritaḥ /
T04canprasu:8542: iti vacanātpañca skandhānupādāya prajñapyamānaḥ pudgalo loka ityucyate /
T04canprasu:8549: kiṃ punaralokasaṃvṛtirapyasti yata evaṃ viśiṣyate lokasaṃvṛtiriti?
T04canprasu:8559: na hi paramārthata ete vyavahārāḥ saṃbhavanti / tatra hi-
T04canprasu:8562: iti kṛtvā kutastatra paramārthe vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ kuto vā jñānasya?
T04canprasu:8563: sa hi paramārtho 'parapratyayaḥ śāntaḥ pratyātmavedya āryāṇāṃ sarvaprapañcātītaḥ /
T04canprasu:8574: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane // 9 //
T04canprasu:8575: atrāha- yadi tarhi paramārtho niṣprapañcasvabhāvaḥ sa evāstu,
T04canprasu:8583: anadhigamya ca paramārthaṃ na śakyaṃ nirvāṇamadhigantumiti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8587: tadevaṃ yaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthalakṣaṇasatyadvayasya vyavasthāmapākṛtya śūnyatāṃ varṇayati,
T04canprasu:8590: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā // 19 //
T04canprasu:8591: saṃvṛtisatyaṃ hi ajñānamātrasamutthāpitaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ buddhā tasya paramārthalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratipadyamāno yogī nāntadvaye patati /
T04canprasu:8592: kiṃ tadāsīdyadidānīṃ nāstītyevaṃ pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt paścādapi nāstitāṃ na pratipadyate /
T04canprasu:8596: yastu evaṃ satyadvayavibhāgamapaśyan śūnyatāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ paśyati,
T04canprasu:8597: sa śūnyatāṃ paśyan mumukṣurnāstitāṃ vā saṃskārāṇāṃ parikalpayed,
T04canprasu:8600: ubhayathā cāsya durdṛṣṭā śūnyatā niyataṃ vināśayet /
T04canprasu:8602: yadi tāvatsarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ nāstīti parikalpayet,
T04canprasu:8607: tadā niyatamasya śūnyatāyāḥ pratikṣepa āpadyate- kathaṃ hi nāma amī bhāvāḥ sakalasurāsuranaralokairupalabhyamānā api śūnyā bhaviṣyanti?
T04canprasu:8609: ityevaṃ pratikṣipya saddharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena pāpakena karmaṇā niyatamapāyānvayāt /
T04canprasu:8613: evaṃ tāvadabhāvena gṛhyamāṇā śūnyatā grahītāraṃ vināśayati /
T04canprasu:8617: tadevaṃ bhāvarūpeṇāpi śūnyatā gṛhyamāṇā grahītāraṃ vināśayati //
T04canprasu:8618: nanu ca yadupakārakaṃ tadanyathā [kriyamāṇamakāloptamiva bījaṃ na phalāya kalpate,
T04canprasu:8620: evameva maṇimantrauṣadhādibhi] rgṛhyamāṇaḥ [sarpaḥ] mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhamāvahati śiromaṇigrahaṇāt,
T04canprasu:8624: yathā ca yathopadeśaṃ prasādhitā vidyā sādhakamanugṛhṇāti,
T04canprasu:8626: evamihāpi yathopadeśaṃ śūnyatā mahatī vidyā sādhyamānā gṛhyamāṇā bhāvābhāvādigrāhatiraskāreṇa
T04canprasu:8629: yathopadeśaviśeṣavigamena tu gṛhyamāṇā niyataṃ yathoditena nyāyena grahītārameva vināśayati //
T04canprasu:8634: yasmādayaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇo dharmo mandamedhasamalpaprajñaṃ sattvaṃ viparyāsagrahaṇādvināśayati,
T04canprasu:8635: ata eva asya dharmasya mandairduravagāhatāṃ matvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvadhātuṃ cāvalokya dharmasya cātigāmbhīryam,
T04canprasu:8636: saddharmaṃ deśayituṃ cittaṃ pratinivṛttaṃ munerbuddhasya bhagavato mahopāyajñānaviśeṣaśālinaḥ /
T04canprasu:8638: atha bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhasyaitadabhavat- adhigato mayā dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ
T04canprasu:8650: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
T04canprasu:8651: ityādinā, sa yasmāt satyadvayavyavasthānabhijñena satā śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ śūnyatāprayojanaṃ ca yathāvadabuddhā upakṣiptaḥ,
T04canprasu:8654: ato yaṃ bhavān doṣaprasaṅgaṃ śūnyatāyāmudbhāvayan śūnyatāyāmadhilayamadhikṣepaṃ nirākaraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṃ karoti,
T04canprasu:8656: abhāvārthaṃ hi śūnyatārthamadhyāropya prasaṅga udbhāvito bhavatā /
T04canprasu:8661: api khalu sarvameva satyādi vyavasthānaṃ sutarāmupapadyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8662: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
T04canprasu:8663: sarvaṃna yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate // 14 //
T04canprasu:8667: yasmāt pratītyasamutpādaṃ hi vayaṃ śūnyateti vyācakṣmahe-
T04canprasu:8668: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
T04canprasu:8669: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
T04canprasu:8677: yasmāt pratītyasamutpannaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ bhavati nāpratītyasamutpannam /
T04canprasu:8679: sati ca duḥkhe duḥkha samudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī ca pratipad yujyate /
T04canprasu:8680: tataśca duḥkhaparijñānaṃ samudayaprahāṇaṃ nirodhasākṣātkaraṇaṃ mārgabhāvanā ca yujyate /
T04canprasu:8685: āryasatyānāṃ ca sadbhāve sati saddharmo 'pi yujyate /
T04canprasu:8686: sati ca saddharme saṃghe ca buddho 'pi yujyate /
T04canprasu:8689: dharmādharmaṃ tatphalaṃ sugatidurgatiḥ laukikāśca sarvasaṃvyavahārā yujyante / tadevam-
T04canprasu:8690: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
T04canprasu:8694: yasya tu śūnyatā yathoditā na yujyate,
T04canprasu:8699: atisthūle atyāsanne tadviruddhe ca svakīye pakṣe doṣavati atimogho yathāvadavasthitau guṇadoṣāvapaśyan-
T04canprasu:8711: yadi tvaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānān bhāvān paśyasi,
T04canprasu:8712: tadā svabhāvasya hetupratyayanirapekṣatvāt ahetupratyayān avidyamānahetupratyayān padārthān bāhyādhyātmikabhedabhinnān nirhetukān tvamevaṃ sati paśyasi // 16 //
T04canprasu:8714: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām /
T04canprasu:8715: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase // 17 //
T04canprasu:8718: tadā asya svabhāvato vidyamānasya kiṃ mṛdādibhirhetupratyayaiḥ prayojanamiti teṣāmabhāvaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:8723: iti sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvametat kāryādikaṃ pratibādhase /
T04canprasu:8724: tadevaṃ bhavataḥ sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvameva na yujyate // 17 //
T04canprasu:8734: yaḥ pratyatyairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
T04canprasu:8735: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ // iti /
T04canprasu:8736: tathā āryalaṅkāvatāre- “svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti mayā deśitāḥ” //
T04canprasu:8745: saiva svabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipaditi vyavasthāpyate /
T04canprasu:8749: ato bhāvābhāvāntadvayarahitatvāt sarvasvabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipat,
T04canprasu:8765: pratītya dharmānadhigacchate vidū na cāntadṛṣṭīya karoti niśrayam /
T04canprasu:8766: sahetu sapratyaya dharma jānati ahetu apratyaya nāsti dharmatā //
T04canprasu:8780: anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate // 21 //
T04canprasu:8786: anityaṃ ca duḥkhamuktaṃ bhavagatā- yadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti /
T04canprasu:8788: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham /
T04canprasu:8789: tasmādanityaṃ yatsarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ taditi jāyate // iti /
T04canprasu:8792: evaṃ tāvat sasvabhāvatve sati bhāvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ na yujyate /
T04canprasu:8793: na ca kevalaṃ duḥkhameva na yujyate,
T04canprasu:8794: sati sasvabhāvābhyupagame samudayo 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8797: iha samudetyasmādduḥkhamiti duḥkhasya hetu [taḥ] samudaya ityucyate /
T04canprasu:8798: tadasya duḥkhasya śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya sasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya punarutpādavaiyarthyāt taddhetukalpanāvaiyarthyameva,
T04canprasu:8799: ityevaṃ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya samudayo 'pi bhavato na yujyate // 22 //
T04canprasu:8800: svābhāvikameva duḥkhamabhyupagacchato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8801: na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
T04canprasu:8805: evaṃ svabhāvaparyavasthānāt svabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā pratyavatiṣṭhamāno duḥkhanirodhamapi pratibādhase // 23 //
T04canprasu:8806: idānīmāryamārgo 'pi sasvabhāvavādino yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8808: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate // 24 //
T04canprasu:8810: tadā mārgo 'pi sasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā abhāvita evāsāvasti /
T04canprasu:8813: atha asya mārgasya bhāvanā abhyupagamyate bhavatā,
T04canprasu:8814: evaṃ tarhi svabhāvatā āryamārgasya na syāt,
T04canprasu:8816: api ca- duḥkhasya nirodhaprāptyarthaṃ samudayasya ca prahāṇārthaṃ bhāvanā mārgasyeṣyate /
T04canprasu:8818: yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate /
T04canprasu:8824: idānīṃ duḥkhādiparijñānādikamapi yathā parasya na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:8828: yadi pūrvaṃ duḥkhamaparijñātasvabhāvaṃ tat paścāt parijñāyata iti kalpyate,
T04canprasu:8837: tadā pūrvamaparijñātasvabhāvasya duḥkhasya paścādapi parijñānaṃ nopapadyata iti /
T04canprasu:8842: yadetat samudayasya prahāṇaṃ nirodhasya ca sākṣātkaraṇam,
T04canprasu:8843: te ete dve prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe yā ca mārgasya bhāvanā, eṣāpi /
T04canprasu:8845: samudayasya svabhāvenāprahīṇasya svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt paścādapi prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate /
T04canprasu:8847: na ca kevalaṃ parijñānādikameva na saṃbhavati sasvabhāvavāde, api ca-
T04canprasu:8849: yathā svabhāvenāparijñātasya duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ na yuktam,
T04canprasu:8850: evaṃ svabhāvenāvidyamānasya pūrvaṃ srotaāpattiphalasya paścādastitvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:8853: na ca kevalametāni phalāni parijñāvanna yujyante,
T04canprasu:8854: kiṃ tarhi adhigamo 'pyeṣāṃ na yujyata iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8859: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
T04canprasu:8860: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ // 29 //
T04canprasu:8862: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati // 30 //
T04canprasu:8865: apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
T04canprasu:8866: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate // 31 //
T04canprasu:8867: yadi hi svabhāvato buddho nāma kaścid bhāvaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:8869: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
T04canprasu:8876: iha hi buddhatvātpūrvamabuddhasvabhāvasya sataḥ pudgalasya satyāmapi bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhyarthaṃ ghaṭamānasyāpi naiva bodhiḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:8879: na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati /
T04canprasu:8880: kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi // 33 //
T04canprasu:8881: sati hi svabhāvavādābhyupagame dharmādharmayoḥ karaṇaṃ nopapadyate /
T04canprasu:8885: vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
T04canprasu:8886: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate // 34 //
T04canprasu:8890: yadā ca vinā dharmādharmaṃ phalaṃ tavāsti,
T04canprasu:8891: tadā dharmādharmajaṃ phalaṃ tava na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:8893: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate / iti /
T04canprasu:8896: dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
T04canprasu:8909: tadbādhanācca sarva eva laukikā vyavahārā bādhitā bhavantīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:8917: yadi hi svarūpaśūnyāḥ padārthā na bhaveyuḥ,
T04canprasu:8919: tadā svabhāvasya vidyamānatvānna kenacit kasyacit kiṃcit kartavyaṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:8930: tadā svabhāvasyākṛtrimatvādavyāvartanatvācca sarvamidaṃ jagadajātamaniruddhaṃ ca syāt /
T04canprasu:8934: syādyadi kiṃcidaśūnyaṃ na vadejjinu tasya vyākaraṇam /
T04canprasu:8935: tathāhi sthitaṃ tat svake svake bhāve /
T04canprasu:8936: kūṭasthamavikāraṃ na tasya vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ // iti //
T04canprasu:8938: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvakaḥ /
T04canprasu:8939: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ // iti // 38 //
T04canprasu:8940: na ca kevalaṃ sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame laukikā eva vyavahārā nopapadyante,
T04canprasu:8945: yadi hi aśūnyaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ sarvametat syāt,
T04canprasu:8947: iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptirna syāt /
T04canprasu:8948: tadā duḥkhaparyantakāraṇaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nābhūditi sāṃpratamapi na syāt /
T04canprasu:8949: sarveṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ pūrvaṃ prahāṇaṃ nābhūditi paścādapi prahāṇaṃ na syāt // 39 //
T04canprasu:8950: tadevaṃ yasmāt sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame sati sarvametanna yujyate, ataḥ-
T04canprasu:8952: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // 40 //
T04canprasu:8953: yo hi sarvadharmapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samyak paśyati,
T04canprasu:8954: sa catvāri āryasatyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ /
T04canprasu:8966: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇā mañjuśrīrāryasatyānāṃ
T04canprasu:8968: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti?
T04canprasu:8969: bhagavānāha- ātmātmīyopalambhato mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
T04canprasu:8971: yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati,
T04canprasu:8973: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjano 'tyantaparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate,
T04canprasu:8976: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
T04canprasu:8980: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ śīlavān,
T04canprasu:8996: tasyaiva mavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
T04canprasu:9000: sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
T04canprasu:9009: sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
T04canprasu:9010: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
T04canprasu:9011: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate /
T04canprasu:9018: tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau /
T04canprasu:9021: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati //
T04canprasu:9022: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
T04canprasu:9032: sa na kalpayati- ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ,
T04canprasu:9041: tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate yaṃ parikalpayet /
T04canprasu:9042: bālapṛthagjanāstvetān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca /
T04canprasu:9045: ajātaṃ sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamam //
T04canprasu:9046: evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān paśyan anunayapratidhāpagato bhavati sarvasattveṣu /
T04canprasu:9048: tathāhi sa tān dharmān nopalabhate yatrānunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā /
T04canprasu:9049: sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati,
T04canprasu:9052: sarvadharmān śūnyāniti samanupaśyan na kvaciddharme vicikitsāmutpādayati /
T04canprasu:9055: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau āryasatyaparīkṣā nāma caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:9058: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
T04canprasu:9060: iha hi bhagavatā uṣitabrahmacaryāṇāṃ tathāgataśāsanapratipannānnāṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiyuktānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dvividhaṃ nirvāṇamupavarṇitaṃ sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ ca /
T04canprasu:9061: tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyārāgādikasya kleśagaṇasya prahāṇāt sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇamiṣyate /
T04canprasu:9075: abhedi kāyo nirodhi saññā vedanā pi ti dahaṃsu sabbā /
T04canprasu:9081: etacca dvividhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ yujyate yadi kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca nirodho bhavati?
T04canprasu:9091: svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānāṃ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto nivṛttiḥ,
T04canprasu:9094: na ca śūnyatāvādinaḥ skandhanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kleśanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vā nirvāṇamicchanti yatasteṣāmayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi /
T04canprasu:9096: yadi khalu śūnyatāvādinaḥ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ necchanti,
T04canprasu:9105: tat kutastasminnitthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśakalpanā yeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirvāṇaṃ bhavet?
T04canprasu:9111: atha syāt- yadyapi nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ,
T04canprasu:9117: yasmānnirvāṇādarvāk svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ na punarabhāvaḥ śakyate kartum /
T04canprasu:9120: nivāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
T04canprasu:9122: tadevaṃ nirvāṇe na kasyacit prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam /
T04canprasu:9125: nirvṛtti dharmāṇa ca asti dharmā ye neha astī na te jātu asti /
T04canprasu:9126: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati // iti /
T04canprasu:9127: asyā gāthāyā ayamarthaḥ- nivṛtau nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau dharmāṇāṃ kleśakarmajanmalakṣaṇānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā sarvathā astaṃgamādastitvaṃ nāsti,
T04canprasu:9129: ye tarhi dharmā iha nirvṛtau na santi,
T04canprasu:9132: na te dharmāḥ kleśakarmajanmādilakṣaṇāḥ kasmiṃścit kāle saṃsārāvasthāyāmapi tattvato (Pp_229) vidyante /
T04canprasu:9133: na hi rajjuḥ andhakārāvasthāyāṃ svarūpataḥ sarpo 'sti,
T04canprasu:9135: kathaṃ tarhi saṃsāraḥ iti cet, ucyate /
T04canprasu:9136: ātmātmīyāsadgrahagrastānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāmasatsvarūpā api bhāvāḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsante taimirikāṇāmiva asatkeśamaśakādaya iveti / āha-
T04canprasu:9137: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati / iti /
T04canprasu:9140: tadanyeṣāṃ ca atītānāgatasaṃsthānāṃ vijñaptiviprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ nāstivādināṃ tadanyadastivādinām,
T04canprasu:9143: evamastināstivādināmevaṃ caratāṃ na duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ śāmyatīti / tathā-
T04canprasu:9144: yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjña abhyupeti no cāpi koṣṭha gantu āviṣṭa papadyate /
T04canprasu:9145: evameva bālu 'pagato ..... jāyi mriyate sadā abhūto // iti /
T04canprasu:9146: tadevaṃ na kasyacinnirvāṇe prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam /
T04canprasu:9149: na cābhāvo 'pi nirvāṇaṃ kuta evāsya bhāvanā /
T04canprasu:9152: ye tu sarvakalpanopaśamarūpaṃ nirvāṇamapratipadyamānāḥ bhāvābhāvatadubhayānubhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parikalpayanti,
T04canprasu:9155: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // 4 //
T04canprasu:9156: tatraike bhāvato nirvāṇamabhiniviṣṭā evamācakṣate- iha kleśakarmajanmasaṃtānapravṛttiniyatarodhabhūto jalapravāharodhabhūtasetusthānīyo nirodhātmakaḥ
T04canprasu:9158: na ca avidyamānasvabhāvo dharmaḥ evaṃ kāryakārī dṛśyate /
T04canprasu:9159: nanu ca yo 'syā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇamityuktam,
T04canprasu:9160: na ca kṣayamātraṃ bhāvo bhavitumarhati / tathā-
T04canprasu:9162: ityuktam / na ca pradyotasya nivṛttirbhāva ityupapadyate /
T04canprasu:9164: naitadevaṃ vijñeyaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ iti /
T04canprasu:9165: kiṃ tarhi tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo 'sminniti nirvāṇākhye dharme sati bhavati,
T04canprasu:9168: tatrāpi yasmin sati cetaso vimokṣo bhavatīti veditavyamiti //
T04canprasu:9169: evaṃ bhāve nirvāṇa vyavasthāpite ācāryo nirūpayati- bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇam /
T04canprasu:9176: tāmeva ca jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇavyabhicāritāṃ spaṣṭayannāha- asti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vineti /
T04canprasu:9182: bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet /
T04canprasu:9183: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana // 5 //
T04canprasu:9190: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana /
T04canprasu:9196: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate // 6 //
T04canprasu:9207: vyatirekakāraṇamāha- nānupādāya kaścidbhāvo hi vidyate iti // 6 //
T04canprasu:9208: atrāha- yadi bhāvo hi na nirvāṇam,
T04canprasu:9213: yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:9214: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate // 7 //
T04canprasu:9229: tatra abhāvaḥ anityatā vā bhāvamupādāya prajñapyate,
T04canprasu:9233: ataḥ parasparāpekṣikyāṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇapravṛttau kuto lakṣyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya anityatā bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:9239: etadeva spaṣṭayannāha- na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti //
T04canprasu:9248: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
T04canprasu:9258: tataśca sthitameva na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti // 8 //
T04canprasu:9259: atrāha- yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ na bhavati,
T04canprasu:9266: sa cāyamājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ kadāciddhetupratyayasāmagrīmāśritya astīti prajñapyate dīrghahrasvavat /
T04canprasu:9269: yadi vā pratītya jāyata iti vyavasthāpyate,
T04canprasu:9270: sarvathāsya janmamaraṇaparaṃparāprabandhasya apratītya vā anupādāya vā apravṛttistannirvāṇamiti (Pp_232)
T04canprasu:9272: na ca apravṛttimātraṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti parikalpitu pāryata iti /
T04canprasu:9275: teṣāṃ pratītya pratītya ya utpādaśca vināśaśca,
T04canprasu:9278: teṣāṃ tasya nityānityatvenāvācyasya tattadupādānamāśritya ya ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ sa upādāya pravartate,
T04canprasu:9279: sa evopādāyopādāya pravartayamānaḥ sannidānīmanupādāyāpravartayamāno nirvāṇamiti vyapadiśyate /
T04canprasu:9280: na ca saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā apravṛttimātrakaṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti śakyaṃ parikalpayitum /
T04canprasu:9281: ityato 'pi na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate // 9 //
T04canprasu:9285: tatra sūtra uktam- ye kecidbhikṣavo bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante vibhavena vā,
T04canprasu:9288: ubhayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ bhave tṛṣṇā vibhave tṛṣṇā ca /
T04canprasu:9295: yeṣāmapi kleśajanmanostatrābhāvādabhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svayaṃ ca bhāvarūpatvādbhāvarūpamityubhayarūpam,
T04canprasu:9301: tadā bhāvaśca abhāvaśca mokṣa iti syāt /
T04canprasu:9302: tataśca yaḥ saṃskārāṇāmātmalābhaḥ tasya ca vigamaḥ,
T04canprasu:9304: na ca saṃskārā eva mokṣa iti yujyate /
T04canprasu:9305: ata evāha- tacca na yujyate iti // 11 //
T04canprasu:9316: iti kṛtvā ubhayametad bhāvaṃ ca abhāvaṃ ca upādāyaiva bhavati,
T04canprasu:9323: asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau // 13 //
T04canprasu:9332: athāpi syāt- naiva hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpam,
T04canprasu:9338: bhāvābhāvayorapi parasparaviruddhayorekatra nirvāṇe nāsti saṃbhava iti, ataḥ,
T04canprasu:9341: idānīṃ yathā naiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yujyate,
T04canprasu:9344: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati // 15 //
T04canprasu:9345: yadi hi bhāvo nāma kaścit syāt,
T04canprasu:9346: tadā tatpratiṣedhena naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamityeṣā kalpanā,
T04canprasu:9351: tasmānnaiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yā kalpanā,
T04canprasu:9355: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate /
T04canprasu:9356: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate // 16 //
T04canprasu:9357: yadi etannirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvarūpaṃ naiva bhāvarūpamastīti kalpyate,
T04canprasu:9358: kena tadānīṃ taditthaṃvidhaṃ nobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇamastīti ajyate gṛhyate prakāśate vā?
T04canprasu:9359: kiṃ tatra nirvāṇe kaścidevaṃvidhaḥ pratipattāsti, atha nāsti?
T04canprasu:9360: yadi asti, evaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pi tavātmā syāt /
T04canprasu:9377: kathaṃ tenāvidyamānasvarūpeṇa naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti gṛhyate,
T04canprasu:9379: tasmānna kenacinnirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvo naiva bhāva ityajyate /
T04canprasu:9381: sarvathā yathā ca nirvāṇe etāścatasraḥ kalpanā na saṃbhavanti,
T04canprasu:9382: evaṃ nirvāṇādhigantaryapi tathāgate etāḥ kalpanā naiva saṃbhavantīti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:9384: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate // 17 //
T04canprasu:9387: nāstīti vā kalpayan sa nirvṛtasya vikalpayet /
T04canprasu:9388: evaṃ tāvat paraṃ nirodhādbhavati tathāgato na bhavati ceti nohyate /
T04canprasu:9391: na ca kevalaṃ paraṃ nirodhāccaturbhiḥ prakārairbhagavānnohyate, api ca-
T04canprasu:9394: yathā nājyaṃ na cohyaṃ tathā tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ pratipāditam // 18 //
T04canprasu:9400: ata eva saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ parasparato nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
T04canprasu:9402: yaccāpīdamuktaṃ bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti,
T04canprasu:9406: nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
T04canprasu:9408: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya nirvāṇenāviśiṣṭatvāt pūrvāparakoṭikalpanā na saṃbhavati, yā apyetāḥ-
T04canprasu:9413: tatra paraṃ nirodhādityanenopalakṣaṇena catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ parigṛhyante /
T04canprasu:9416: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
T04canprasu:9417: naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi /
T04canprasu:9425: tatra ātmano lokasya vā anāgatamutpādamapaśyan antavān loka ityevaṃ kalpayan aparāntamālambya pravartate/
T04canprasu:9426: evamanāgatamutpādaṃ paśyan anantavān loka ioti pravartate/
T04canprasu:9434: tatra ātmano lokasya vā atītamutpādaṃ paśyan śāśvato loka iti pratipadyate,
T04canprasu:9437: naiva paśyannaivāpaśyan naivaśāśvato nāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate pūrvāntamāaśritya /
T04canprasu:9445: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ // 23 //
T04canprasu:9446: caturdaśāpyetāni avyākṛtavastūni asati bhāvasvarūpe naiva yujyante/
T04canprasu:9447: yastu bhāvasvarūpamadhyāropya tadvigamāvigamataḥ etā dṛṣṭīrutpādya abhiniviśate,
T04canprasu:9450: atrāha- yadi evaṃ bhavatā nirvāṇamapi pratiṣiddham,
T04canprasu:9451: nanu ca ya eṣa bhavagatā anantacaritasattvarāśyanuvartakena viditāviparītasakalajagadāśayasvabhāvena
T04canprasu:9454: sa evaṃ sati vyartha eva jāyate/
T04canprasu:9455: ucyate- yadi kaściddharmo nāma svabhāvarūpataḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:9457: kaścidvā deśitā buddho bhagavānnāma bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:9462: iha hi sarveṣāṃ prapañcānāṃ nimittānāṃ ya upaśamo 'pravṛttistannirvāṇam /
T04canprasu:9468: yadā caivaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvaprapañcopaśāntarūpe nirvāṇe śive 'sthānayogena
T04canprasu:9469: nabhasīva haṃsarājāḥ sthitāḥ svapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapakṣapātavāte vātagagane vā gaganasyākiṃcanatvāt,
T04canprasu:9470: tadā sarvanimittānupalambhānna kvaciddeveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā na kasyaciddevasya vā manuṣyasya vā na kaściddharmaḥ sāṃkleśiko vā vaiyavadāniko vā deśita iti vijñeyam /
T04canprasu:9471: yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre- “yāṃ ca rātriṃ śāntamate tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
T04canprasu:9473: atrāntare tathāgatenaikamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na vyāhṛtaṃ nāpi pravyāharati nāpi pravyāhariṣyati /
T04canprasu:9474: atha ca yathādhimuktāḥ sarvasattvā nānādhātvāśayāstāṃ tāṃ vividhāṃ tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti /
T04canprasu:9475: teṣāmevaṃ pṛthak pṛthagbhavati- ayaṃ bhagavānasmabhyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
T04canprasu:9477: tatra tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
T04canprasu:9482: ya evaṃ jānati dharmān kumāro buddha socyate //
T04canprasu:9483: yadi tarhyevaṃ na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ,
T04canprasu:9484: tatkathamime ete vicitrāḥ pravacanavyavahārāḥ prajñāyante? ucyate /
T04canprasu:9485: avidyānidrānugatānāṃ dehināṃ svapnāyamānānāmiva svavikalpābhyudaya eṣaḥ- ayaṃ bhagavān sakalatribhuvanasurāsuranaranāthaḥ imaṃ dharmamasmabhyaṃ deśayatīti /
T04canprasu:9487: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
T04canprasu:9488: naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke // iti /
T04canprasu:9490: tataśca nirvāṇārthaṃ dharmadeśanāyā abhāvāt kuto dharmadeśanāyāḥ sadbhāvena nirvāṇasyāstitvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
T04canprasu:9495: tathā- na teṣāṃ bhagavan saṃsārasamatikramo ye nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante /
T04canprasu:9497: nirvāṇamiti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarvanimittānāmuparatiḥ sarveñjitasamiñjitānām /
T04canprasu:9498: tadime bhagavan mohapuruṣā ye svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya tīrthikadṛṣṭau nipatitā nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tadyathā tilebhyastailaṃ kṣīrātsarpiḥ /
T04canprasu:9499: atyantaparinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu ye nirvāṇaṃ mārganti tānahamābhimānikān tīrthikāniti vadāmi /
T04canprasu:9500: na bhagavan yogācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā karoti,
T04canprasu:9502: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau nirvāṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:9511: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // iti,
T04canprasu:9516: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamo yathābhūtārthapracchādakaṃ stimitatā /
T04canprasu:9517: avidyayā nivṛtaḥ chāditaḥ pudgalaḥ punarbhavāya punarbhavārthaṃ punarbhavotpattyarthamabhisaṃskaroti utpādayati yān kuśalādicetanāviśeṣāṃste punarbhavābhisaṃskārāt saṃskārāḥ /
T04canprasu:9518: te ca trividhāḥ- kuśalā akuśalā ānejyāśca,
T04canprasu:9521: taiśca saṃskārairabhisaṃskṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ karmasaṃjñitaiḥ taddhetukāṃ gatiṃ gacchati // 1 //
T04canprasu:9524: kṛtopacitasaṃskārasyāsya pudgalasya saṃskārānurūpāyāṃ gatau devādikāyāṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate praviśati upapadyate saṃsārānarthabījabhūtam
T04canprasu:9532: idaṃ ca rūpaṃ pūrvakaṃ ca nāma,
T04canprasu:9535: skandheṣu nirudhyamāneṣu ekasminneva kṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyenaiva aupapattyāṃśikāḥ (Pp_239)
T04canprasu:9541: tathā samānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca /
T04canprasu:9542: hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ // iti /
T04canprasu:9543: na tu punaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvarūpavicakṣaṇānāmevaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate sāhacaryāditvamekakṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmadṛṣṭānteneti /
T04canprasu:9544: janmonmukhaṃ na sadidaṃ yadi jāyamānaṃnāśonmukhaṃ sadapi nāma nirudhyamānam /
T04canprasu:9545: iṣṭaṃ tadā kathamidaṃ tulayā samānaṃ kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā //
T04canprasu:9548: tathā anyasyāpi bhāvasya utpādasamanantaradhvaṃsinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na yuktam /
