T04canprasu:9549: yataḥ jātijarāsthityanityatākhyāni catvāri saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni utpadyamānasya bhāvasya bāhyasya ādhyātmikasya vā ekasminneva kṣaṇe bhavantītyabhidharmapāṭhaḥ
T04canprasu:9550: tatra jātijarayoḥ parasparavirodhāt sthityanityatayośca ekasminneva bhāve na yugapatsaṃbhava iṣyate sadbhiḥ /
T04canprasu:9558: na ca jātimaraṇayoḥ parasparabhinnalakṣaṇayoḥ ekasmin kṣaṇe saṃbhavo bhavet,
T04canprasu:9565: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha /
T04canprasu:9567: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
T04canprasu:9569: iti pratiṣedhāt kutaḥ samānakālatā bhāvānāṃ maraṇabhavopapattibhavayoriti?
T04canprasu:9571: tena naikasminneva kṣaṇe nāmonnāmau tulāyāḥ saṃbhavataḥ nāmonnāmayoḥ kālabhedāt /
T04canprasu:9574: tathāpi atra utpalapatraśatasahasravedhaḥ sūcyagreṇa kramaśo vedho 'vaseyaḥ kṣaṇānāmatisūkṣmatvāt /
T04canprasu:9580: iti pāṭhādutpādanirodhayorasaṃbhava eva pratipāditaḥ śāstre madhyamake /
T04canprasu:9585: sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā // ityādi /
T04canprasu:9591: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ /
T04canprasu:9594: ataḥ phenapiṇḍādīnāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya pratītya samutpannānāṃ sāravastuvigatānāṃ kutaḥ kṣaṇikākṣaṇikacinteti?
T04canprasu:9596: supinopamā bhavagatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate /
T04canprasu:9597: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato //
T04canprasu:9598: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
T04canprasu:9599: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
T04canprasu:9600: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ svaputra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃca paśyati /
T04canprasu:9601: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasyitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
T04canprasu:9602: yathaiva grāmāntari lekhadarśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubhāśubhāḥ /
T04canprasu:9603: na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
T04canprasu:9605: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra 'nucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
T04canprasu:9606: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
T04canprasu:9607: na ca anyu tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
T04canprasu:9608: yatha muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
T04canprasu:9609: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikasu nāsti vartanā //
T04canprasu:9618: tadevaṃ bimbapratibimbādinyāyena mātuḥ kukṣau vijñāne saṃmūrcchite vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate,
T04canprasu:9620: yadi iha gatau vijñānaṃ na saṃmūrchitaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:9629: abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāgajaṃ dvevajaṃ mohajaṃ karma karotītyādinā duḥkhotpattāvāyadvāratvaṃ ṣaṇṇāmāyatanānām /
T04canprasu:9634: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
T04canprasu:9638: cakṣurindriyaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi ca samanvāhāraṃ ca pratītya manaskāraṃ viṣayādivilakṣaṇaṃ samanantarapratyayaṃ vijñānabījabhūtaṃ cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate
T04canprasu:9642: tadevameṣāmindriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ sahotpādaḥ anyonyopakāreṇa tulyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ,
T04canprasu:9648: yathā caiṣāṃ rūpavijñānacakṣuṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātalakṣaṇaṃ sparśamāgamya (Pp_243)
T04canprasu:9663: sa tasyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate /
T04canprasu:9667: tasyā api nityamaparibhraṃśārthaṃ paritṛṣyate / sa evam-
T04canprasu:9669: sa evaṃ vedanāsvabhiniviṣṭaḥ saktaḥ tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ kāmadṛṣṭiśīlavratātmavādopādānākhyaṃ caturvidhaṃ karmākṣepakāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T04canprasu:9675: caturvidhasya yathoktasya upādānasya upādātā grahītā utpādayitā /
T04canprasu:9678: yasmāt, yo hi anutpāditavedanātṛṣṇaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena tṛṣṇāmasvīkurvan,
T04canprasu:9679: caturvidhamupādānaṃ pravihāya upādātā amalādvayajñānasaṃmukhībhāvāt syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta saḥ /
T04canprasu:9685: trividhamapi kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasikaṃ ca karma bhavatyasmādanāgataṃ skandha pañcakaṃ bhavaḥ iti vyapadiśyate /
T04canprasu:9686: tatra kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma rūpaskandhasvabhāvaṃ karmavijñaptitvāt /
T04canprasu:9688: evaṃ sa bhavaḥ pañca skandhā iti vijñeyam / tasmāt-
T04canprasu:9699: mriyamāṇasya vigacchataḥ saṃmūḍhasya sāmiṣaṅgo hṛdayasaṃtāpaḥ śokaḥ /
T04canprasu:9714: tatra saṃsārasya vijñānādipravṛttilakṣaṇasya mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃskārāḥ /
T04canprasu:9716: avidyānugato yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣavaḥ puṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti,
T04canprasu:9724: tattvadarśanāt tattvadarśane hi sarvapadārthanāmevānupalambhāt nāsti kiṃcid yadālambya karma kuryāditi // 10 //
T04canprasu:9735: sa eva svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāmavatīrṇo na kiṃcidvastu upalabhate bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ vā /
T04canprasu:9744: pūrvasya pūrvasya aṅgasya nirodhena utarasyottarasya aṅgasya nirodho bhavatīti vijñeyam /
T04canprasu:9745: anayā cānupūrvyā ayaṃ yogī ātmātmīyādyadarśanāyāsanirastaḥ kārakavedakavirahitaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyaṃ duḥkharāśiṃ punaranutpattyā samyaṅnirodhayati
T04canprasu:9762: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
T04canprasu:9769: evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
T04canprasu:9771: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇābhinirvṛtti rbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
T04canprasu:9777: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
T04canprasu:9789: yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam,
T04canprasu:9795: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
T04canprasu:9801: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamemiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
T04canprasu:9802: atha ca punaḥ satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpatti rbhavati /
T04canprasu:9803: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit
T04canprasu:9805: na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit //
T04canprasu:9807: yā eṣāmevaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāyamaiksaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
T04canprasu:9833: ye cāpyanye evamādaya upakleśāste upāyāsā iti //
T04canprasu:9852: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ /
T04canprasu:9853: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T04canprasu:9857: vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vedanādayo 'rūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhāstatra tatra bhave nāmayantīti nāma /
T04canprasu:9858: saharūpaskandhena ca nāma rūpaṃ ceti nāmarūpamucyate /
T04canprasu:9863: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
T04canprasu:9865: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,
T04canprasu:9867: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam
T04canprasu:9870: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,
T04canprasu:9876: nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno
T04canprasu:9877: nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo
T04canprasu:9880: atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
T04canprasu:9882: yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
T04canprasu:9891: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
T04canprasu:9892: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti /
T04canprasu:9893: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
T04canprasu:9895: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati /
T04canprasu:9897: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ
T04canprasu:9900: anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati
T04canprasu:9904: yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
T04canprasu:9914: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T04canprasu:9915: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T04canprasu:9916: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti /
T04canprasu:9917: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T04canprasu:9923: tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate,
T04canprasu:9929: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate,
T04canprasu:9930: na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati asti ca candramaṇḍalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt
T04canprasu:9936: mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
T04canprasu:9944: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
T04canprasu:9946: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
T04canprasu:9949: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpyaniruddheṣu /
T04canprasu:9951: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnābhāvanāmavat candrabimbapratibimbavat /
T04canprasu:9965: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
T04canprasu:9975: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate /
T04canprasu:9979: pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate /
T04canprasu:9980: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ / tadyathā-
T04canprasu:9995: tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate,
T04canprasu:10001: athavā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ- yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā /
T04canprasu:10003: ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā,
T04canprasu:10006: ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ // 1 //
T04canprasu:10009: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate /
T04canprasu:10015: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ / tadyathā-
T04canprasu:10022: bhaviṣyāmi ca na bhaviṣyāmi ca, naiva (Pp_250)
T04canprasu:10025: kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha /
T04canprasu:10026: kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ /
T04canprasu:10027: tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ,
T04canprasu:10028: kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ,
T04canprasu:10030: tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ,
T04canprasu:10033: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam // 3 //
T04canprasu:10034: tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva,
T04canprasu:10040: iha hi pūrvaṃ yadi narakādigatiko bhūtvā idānīṃ karmavaicitryāt manuṣyeṣu upapannaḥ evaṃkalpayet- ahamevāsau nāraka āsam iti,
T04canprasu:10042: kathaṃ hi nāma manuṣyaḥ san nārakādikaḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:10043: yattarhi idaṃ paṭhayate sūtre- ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena māndhātā nāma rājā cakravartī abhūvam iti,
T04canprasu:10046: ata eva hi nānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayeneti paṭhayate /
T04canprasu:10047: yadi punaḥ sa evāyamiti pūrvakasya cādhunātanasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:10052: yadi sa eva pūrvaka ātmāyamidānīṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:10053: tadā upādānasya pañcaskandhalakṣaṇasya viśeṣo na syāt upādāturaviśeṣātpūrvāvasthāyāmiva /
T04canprasu:10055: kiṃ tarhi viśiṣyata eva upādānamupādātuḥ karmabhedāt kārakabhedācca /
T04canprasu:10056: tataśca upādānaviśeṣāt sa evāyamātmeti na yujyate //
T04canprasu:10064: na caitad bhedena darśayituṃ śakyam- ayamasāvātmā,
T04canprasu:10068: yadā caivamupādānavinirmukta ātmā darśayituṃ na śakyate,
T04canprasu:10069: tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmāviśeṣa iti na śakyate kalpayitum // 4 //
T04canprasu:10076: yathā tāvadupādānamevātmā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:10081: na caivamātmā pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca /
T04canprasu:10082: ātmā skandhebhyastattvānyatvādinā ca nityānityatvenāpyaśakya eva vaktum,
T04canprasu:10095: na caitad dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:10099: kiṃ tarhi upādānavyatirikta eva ātmā bhaviṣyati /
T04canprasu:10103: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate // 7 //
T04canprasu:10114: atha syāt- yadi ātmā upādānasvarūpo na bhavati,
T04canprasu:10117: sa hi anyo 'pi na bhavati upādānamanapekṣya bhedena grahaṇaprasaṅgāt /
T04canprasu:10124: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate /
T04canprasu:10125: kathaṃ sati upādāne upādātā nāstīti yujyate /
T04canprasu:10129: ihāpi ca pūrvameva sthānasthāneṣu kṛtā vyavastheti na punariha tadvayavasthāne yatna āsthīyate // 8 //
T04canprasu:10131: idānīṃ nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityedapi yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:10133: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam // 9 //
T04canprasu:10134: yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya adhunātanasya ātmano 'nyatvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:10138: yadi punaḥ pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:10140: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
T04canprasu:10141: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ // 10 //
T04canprasu:10142: yadi hi ayamadhunātana ātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anyaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:10143: tadā taṃ pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya parityajya tannirapekṣaḥ ataddhetuka eva syāt /
T04canprasu:10145: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:10146: tadā anyatvād ghaṭotpāde paṭāvināśavat pūrvasyātmanā uttarasminnapi ātmani samutpadyamāne 'pi anirodhaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:10149: tenaiva prakāreṇa tathaiva sa tatrāvatiṣṭheta tathaivāvatiṣṭheteti /
T04canprasu:10152: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet / iti,
T04canprasu:10162: iha ca anyasyaiva cotpādanātpūrvakasyātmana ucchedaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:10165: atha pūrvakenātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ uttareṇātmanā phalaparibhogaḥ parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:10166: tathāpi anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya anyenopabhogaḥ syāt / tataśca-
T04canprasu:10169: api ca / yadi ayamātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anya eva atropapannaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:10174: iti / yadi hi ātmā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpannaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:10178: vyatiriktasya ca tanniṣpādakasya karturabhāvāt kutaḥ kṛtakatvamātmano yojyeta?
T04canprasu:10179: kṛtake cātmani parikalpyamāne ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādeva,
T04canprasu:10186: pūrvaṃ hi ātmā nāstīti akṛtako nirhetukaḥ syāt /
T04canprasu:10188: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā yadi vā nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannābhyupeyam /
T04canprasu:10195: evaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena abhūmatītamadhvānamiti yā dṛṣṭiḥ,
T04canprasu:10200: ekaikasya ca pṛthakpṛthagabhāvāt kutastatsamāhāra iti ubhayamapi na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:10203: tadevaṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya asaṃbhavamudbhāvya idānīmaparāntasamāśritasya pratiṣedhamāha-
T04canprasu:10209: aiṣyajanmani yo bhāvo sa eva na bhavatyayam //
T04canprasu:10213: aiṣya janmani yo bhāvo tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam //
T04canprasu:10216: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
T04canprasu:10217: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam // 15 //
T04canprasu:10218: iha hi kaścinmanuṣyagatisthaḥ kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā devagatiṃ gacchati /
T04canprasu:10219: tatra yadi sa eva devaḥ sa eva manuṣya iti evamubhayoraikyaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:10221: na caitadevaṃ yadeva eva manuṣyo bhavediti /
T04canprasu:10232: idānīmaśāśvatamapi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:10235: yadi hi anyo devo 'nyaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:10236: tadā pūrvakasya manuṣyātmanastatra naṣṭatvādiha ca anyasyaivotpādāt sa pūrvako manuṣyātmā tatra vinaṣṭa ityaśāśvataṃ syāt /
T04canprasu:10240: tadā yathā nimbasya na āmratarusaṃtāno bhavati,
T04canprasu:10241: evaṃ manuṣyasya devaḥ ekasaṃtānapatito na syāt /
T04canprasu:10246: asti ceyaṃ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ devasya manuṣyaḥ ekasaṃtānapatita iti /
T04canprasu:10247: tasmāt saṃtānābhāvaprasaṅgāt devādanyo manuṣyo na bhavati /
T04canprasu:10252: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavettacca na yujyate // 17 //
T04canprasu:10253: yadi ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ aṃśena manuṣyatāṃ vijahyāt,
T04canprasu:10257: etacca ayuktaṃ yadekasya divyagatisaṃgṛhītaḥ ekadeśaḥ syāt,
T04canprasu:10259: tasmācchāśvataṃ ca aśāśvataṃ ca etadubhayaṃ nopapadyate // 17 //
T04canprasu:10270: atha syāt- anādijanmamaraṇaparaṃparāpravṛttamavicchinnakamaṃ saṃsāraprabandhamupalabhya śāśvata mātmānaṃ parikalpayāmaḥ /
T04canprasu:10272: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti /
T04canprasu:10277: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ // 19 //
T04canprasu:10278: yadi hi saṃskārāṇāmātmano va kutaścidgatyantarād gamanaṃ gatyantaramāgamanaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:10279: tataśca gantyantarāt punaḥ kvacid gamanaṃ syāt,
T04canprasu:10283: na cāpi itaḥ punaḥ kasyacit kvacid gamanaṃ saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:10286: tadā kuto janmamaraṇaparaṃparāyā atidīrghatvena ādyanupalambhādanādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt?
T04canprasu:10287: saṃsarturabhāvāt kutaḥ anādimattvamādimatvaṃ vā saṃsārasya saṃbhavet?
T04canprasu:10290: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti,
T04canprasu:10295: yadā caivaṃ śāśvata eva padārtho na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:10298: tasmādevaṃ śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvānte saṃsārasya na saṃbhavati // 20 //
T04canprasu:10301: antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
T04canprasu:10305: tadā paraloko na syāt asti ca paraloka iti antavāṃlloka iti nopapadyate /
T04canprasu:10311: idānīmantavattvamanantavatvaṃ ca ubhayametallokasya yathā na saṃbhavati,
T04canprasu:10326: atha yadi pūrvakāḥ skandhā na naśyeṣuḥ,
T04canprasu:10327: tān pratītya uttare phalabhūtāḥ skandhā notpadyeran tadā ananto 'vināśī lokaḥ syāt svarūpādapracyutatvāt /
T04canprasu:10328: yadā tu pūrvakāḥ skandhā nirudhyante taddhetukāścāpare skandhā uttarakālaṃ jāyante,
T04canprasu:10338: ataḥ antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca loka iti na yujyate // 25 //
T04canprasu:10339: kasmāt punarekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:10341: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate // 26 //
T04canprasu:10342: iha ekadeśasya vināśe ekadeśasya cāvasthāne parikalpyamāne yadi vā upādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ avasthānaṃ vā parikalpyeta,
T04canprasu:10344: tatra yadi tāvadupādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ parikalpyate,
T04canprasu:10349: naiva hi atra kācidupapattirasti yayā ekadeśasya vināśamekadeśasya cāvināśaṃ parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ /
T04canprasu:10353: sa ca skandheṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo na saṃbhavati /
T04canprasu:10357: ata evāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
T04canprasu:10358: athavā yadi upādāturekadeśo naśyedekadeśaśca na naśyet,
T04canprasu:10360: na caitadiṣyate ityāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
T04canprasu:10362: idānīmupādānasyāpi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:10366: tadevamubhayadarśanāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ yathā nobhayamapi na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
T04canprasu:10370: ataḥ antavattve ca anantavattve ca ubhayasminnapratīte kasya pratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti dṛṣṭisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi // 28 //
T04canprasu:10371: evaṃ tāvat sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibimbākāramupādātāramupādānaṃ cābhyupetyāpi śāśvatādidṛṣṭayasaṃbhavaṃ
T04canprasu:10376: iha sarvabhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt śūnyatvaṃ sakalena śāstreṇa pratipāditam /
T04canprasu:10377: tataśca sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt katamāstāḥ sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ śāśvatādyā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti,
T04canprasu:10379: tathā kiṃ vā ālambanaṃ yat sarvabhāvānantargataṃ yatraitā dṛṣṭaya utpatsyante yatraitā dṛṣṭīrnivārayiṣyāmaḥ?
T04canprasu:10380: katamaścāsau bhāvaḥ pudgalo vā sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ yasyaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ utpatsyante yaṃ dṛṣṭibhyo nivārayiṣyāmaḥ?
T04canprasu:10381: kiṃ vā dṛṣṭīnāmutpattikāraṇamālambananimittaṃ sarvabhāvabāhyaṃ yasmānnimittādutpadyamānāḥ śāśvatādikāḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vārayiṣyāmaḥ?
T04canprasu:10383: śūnyatvācca sarve eva hi te padārthā nopalabhyanta iti,
T04canprasu:10389: asaṃbhave ca sati āsāṃ parikalpanaiva notpadyate ityayuktā evaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ // 29 //
T04canprasu:10400: prapañcopaśamaṃ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñayā hi deśitavān sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇārthaṃ
T04canprasu:10407: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ
T04canprasu:10409: paśyati asatastucchataḥ riktato 'sārato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ,
T04canprasu:10415: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, (Pp_259)
T04canprasu:10419: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvidaṃ kathaṃ nvidaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ ayaṃ sattvaḥ kutaṃ āgataḥ,
T04canprasu:10420: sa itaścyutaḥ kutra gamiṣyatīti yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthagloke dṛṣṭigatāni
T04canprasu:10422: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi //
T04canprasu:10423: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ,
T04canprasu:10425: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dṛṣṭiparīkṣā nāma saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
